zh: 气促（是/否），如果已测量：血氧饱和度和呼吸频率
pert_zh: 气促，如果已测量：血氧饱和度和呼吸频率
bt_pert_zh: Shortness of breath, if measured: oxygen saturation and respiratory rate

en: Recent travel (Y/N); if yes, countries visited in last 14 days
zh: 近期旅行史（是/否）；如果是，最近 14 天内到访的国家
pert_zh: 近期旅行史；如果是，最近 14 天内到访的国家
bt_pert_zh: Recent travel history; if yes, countries visited in the last 14 days

en: Contact with a named person with confirmed COVID-19 (Y/N) with a free text comment about the level of certainty
zh: 与已确诊 COVID-19 患者的接触史（是/否），并提供有关确定性水平的自由文字注释
pert_zh: 与 COVID-19 患者的接触史（是/否），并提供有关确定性水平的自由文字注释
bt_pert_zh: History of contact with COVID-19 patients (yes/no) with free text comments on level of certainty

en: These codes will be grouped ontologically into “definite”, “probable”, “possible”, and “not a case” using our standard approach to grouping codes (Table 5), which has been used previously across disease areas.
zh: 使用我们以前用于各疾病领域的标准分组编码方法（表 5），将这些编码在本体上分为“确定的病例”、“很可能的病例”、“可能的病例”和“不是病例”。
pert_zh: 使用我们以前用于各疾病领域的标准分组编码方法（表 5），这些编码在本体上分为“很可能的病例”、“可能的病例”和“不是病例”。
bt_pert_zh: Using the standard group coding method that we have previously used for each disease area ( Table 5 ), these codes were ontologically divided into “probable case,” “possible case,” and “not a case.”

en: The RCGP RSC definition for ILI is shown in Multimedia Appendix 2.
zh: RCGP RSC 对 ILI 的定义见多媒体附录 2。
pert_zh: RCGP 对 ILI 的定义见多媒体附录 2。
bt_pert_zh: The RCGP definition of ILI is provided in Multimedia Appendix 2.

en: Public Presentation of Data Using an Observatory and Dashboards
zh: 使用天文台和仪表板公开展示数据
pert_zh: 使用仪表板公开展示数据
bt_pert_zh: Present data publicly using dashboards

en: We will develop an observatory to present data nationally and a dashboard for feedback to practices about their data quality and collection of virology and serology samples.
zh: 我们将建立一个天文台，用于在全国范围内展示数据，并建立一个仪表板，用于向诊所反馈有关其数据质量以及病毒学和血清学样本采集的信息。
pert_zh: 我们将建立一个天文台，用于在全国范围内展示数据，并建立一个仪表板，用于向诊所反馈有关病毒学和血清学样本采集的信息。
bt_pert_zh: We will establish an observatory to display data at a national level and a dashboard to provide feedback to clinics on virology and serology sample collection.

en: This is based on coding described in Table 4.
zh: 这基于表 4 中描述的编码。
pert_zh: 这基于表中描述的编码。
bt_pert_zh: This is based on the encoding described in the table.

en: Definite case will be presented on our dashboard as “cases” of COVID-19.
zh: 在我们的仪表板上，确定的病例将显示为 COVID-19 “病例”。
pert_zh: 在我们的仪表板上，确定的病例将显示为“病例”。
bt_pert_zh: On our dashboard, confirmed cases will appear as “Cases.”

en: Possible cases will be presented as “Under investigation” (investigating).
zh: 可能的病例将显示为“正在调查”（调查中）。
pert_zh: 可能的将显示为“正在调查”（调查中）。
bt_pert_zh: Possible ones will be shown as "Under Investigation" (under investigation).

en: “Not a case” will be presented as “Excluded”.
zh: “不是病例”将显示为“已排除”。
pert_zh: “病例”将显示为“已排除”。
bt_pert_zh: The "Case" will be shown as "Excluded".

en: Online data has been established within the initial few weeks in the COVID-19 Observatory (Figure 5), indicating the overall number of patients and rate per 10,000 patients of cases confirmed or under investigation, as well as where the virus is excluded.
zh: 已经在创建 COVID-19 天文台的最初几周内建立了在线数据（图 5），表明已确诊或正在调查的病例总数和每 10,000 名患者的比率，以及已排除该病毒的地点。
pert_zh: 已经在创建 COVID-19 天文台的几周内建立了在线数据（图 5），表明已确诊或正在调查的病例总数和每 10,000 名患者的比率。
bt_pert_zh: Online data ( Figure 5 ) indicating the total number of confirmed or under investigation cases and the rate per 10,000 patients were already established within a few weeks of the creation of the COVID-19 Observatory.

en: We have the option to move to twice weekly surveillance reports with a scope to change this to daily reporting.
zh: 我们可以选择每周两次提交监测报告，并且可以将其更改为每日报告。
pert_zh: 我们可以选择每周两次提交监测报告，并且可以将其更改为每日报告。
bt_pert_zh: We have the option to submit monitoring reports twice a week and can change it to daily reports.

en: We will continue virology sampling from our sentinel practices, rather than discontinuing as seasonal influenza declines.
zh: 我们将持续从预警诊所进行病毒学采样，而不是随着季节性流感的减少而终止。
pert_zh: 我们将持续从预警诊所进行病毒学采样，而不是随着季节性流感的减少而终止。
bt_pert_zh: We will continue virological sampling from the alert clinics rather than discontinuing it as seasonal influenza decreases.

en: Additionally, we will recruit more surveillance practices.
zh: 此外，我们将招募更多的监测诊所。
pert_zh: 此外，我们将招募更多监测诊所。
bt_pert_zh: Additionally, we will be recruiting more surveillance clinics.

en: The RCGP RSC virology practices will aim to undertake 200-300 nasopharyngeal swabs per week across the RCGP RSC sentinel network, collecting specimens across all age bands.
zh: RCGP RSC 病毒学监测诊所的目标是每周在 RCGP RSC 预警网络中进行 200-300 次鼻咽拭子采集，从而采集各个年龄段的标本。
pert_zh: RCGP RSC 病毒学监测诊所的目标是每周在 RCGP RSC 预警网络中进行 200-300 次鼻咽拭子采集，从而采集各个年龄段的标本。
bt_pert_zh: The RCGP RSC Virology Surveillance Clinic aims to collect specimens from all age groups by carrying out 200-300 nasopharyngeal swabs per week across the RCGP RSC Alert Network.

en: In addition to the inclusion criteria for influenza virology surveillance (ILI, acute bronchitis/bronchiolitis), participating practices will take nasopharyngeal swab samples from any people showing acute symptoms of LRTI if the onset of symptoms is within 7 days.
zh: 除了流感病毒学监测的纳入标准（ILI、急性支气管炎/细支气管炎）之外，如果在 7 天内出现 LRTI 急性症状，参与诊所还将从任何出现症状的患者中采集鼻咽拭子样本。
pert_zh: 除了流感病毒学监测的纳入标准（ILI、急性支气管炎/细支气管炎）之外，如果在 7 天内出现 LRTI 急性症状，诊所还将从任何出现症状的患者中采集鼻咽拭子样本。
bt_pert_zh: In addition to the inclusion criteria for influenza virological surveillance (ILI, acute bronchitis/bronchiolitis), the clinic will collect nasopharyngeal swab specimens from any symptomatic patient if acute symptoms of LRTI develop within 7 days.

en: RCGP RSC research officers and practice liaison staff will manage practices to achieve a total national sample of 200-300 swabs per week.
zh: RCGP RSC 研究人员和诊所联络人员将管理相关诊所，以实现每周 200-300 个拭子的全国样本总数。
pert_zh: RCGP 研究人员和诊所联络人员将管理相关诊所，实现每周 200-300 个拭子的全国样本总数。
bt_pert_zh: RCGP researchers and clinic liaison staff will manage the relevant clinics to achieve a national sample total of 200-300 swabs per week.

en: This could be increased if PHE modelers require more samples.
zh: 如果 PHE 建模人员需要更多样本，此数量可能会增加。
pert_zh: 如果 PHE 建模人员更多样本，此数量可能会增加。
bt_pert_zh: This number could increase if PHE modelers had more samples.

en: Samples from each practice would be spread across the following age groups: < 5 years, 5-17 years, 18-64 years, and 65 years and older
zh: 每个诊所的样本采集将分布在以下年龄段：<5 岁、5-17 岁、18-64 岁和 65 岁及以上
pert_zh: 每个诊所的样本采集将分布在以下年龄段：5-17 岁、18-64 岁和 65 岁及以上
bt_pert_zh: Sample collection at each clinic will be distributed among the following age groups: 5-17 years, 18-64 years, and 65 years and older

en: Samples (swabs or serum) collected will be sent via prepaid envelopes addressed to the appropriate PHE laboratory for analysis.
zh: 采集的样本（拭子或血清）将通过预付信封发送到适当的 PHE 实验室进行分析。
pert_zh: 采集的样本将通过预付信封发送到适当的 PHE 实验室进行分析。
bt_pert_zh: The collected samples will be sent via prepaid envelope to the appropriate PHE laboratory for analysis.

en: All samples collected will be tested for the presence of influenza and COVID-19.
zh: 将对采集的所有样本进行流感和 COVID-19 检测。
pert_zh: 将对采集的所有样本进行流感检测。
bt_pert_zh: All samples collected will be tested for influenza.

en: Additionally, PHE will retrospectively test any influenza virology samples collected between early and mid-February 2020 for COVID-19.
zh: 此外，PHE 还将对 2020 年 2 月上旬至中旬期间采集的所有 COVID-19 流感病毒学样本进行回顾性检测。
pert_zh: 此外，PHE 还将对 2020 年 2 月上旬至中旬期间采集的 COVID-19 流感病毒学样本进行回顾性检测。
bt_pert_zh: In addition, PHE will retrospectively test COVID-19 influenza virology samples collected between early and mid-February 2020.

en: Practices will still follow the PHE protocol for COVID-19 with respect to people at risk of infection who should be signposted down the containment pathway, rather than physically attend their practice.
zh: 诊所将继续遵循 PHE 制定的 COVID-19 方案，有感染风险者应转诊至控制通道，而不是亲自前往诊所就诊。
pert_zh: 诊所将继续遵循 PHE 制定的 COVID-19 方案，有感染风险者应转诊至控制通道，而亲自前往诊所就诊。
bt_pert_zh: The clinic will continue to follow the COVID-19 protocols set out by PHE and those at risk of infection should be referred to a controlled pathway and attend the clinic in person.

en: Direct testing of those who attend surgery remains permitted, but we have also rolled out self-swabbing at home.
zh: 仍然允许对前往诊室的患者进行直接检测，但我们也已经推出家庭自我拭子采集。
pert_zh: 仍然允许对患者进行直接检测，但我们也已经推出家庭自我拭子采集。
bt_pert_zh: Direct testing of patients is still permitted, but we have also rolled out at-home self-swab collection.

en: Summary of processes are detailed in Multimedia Appendix 3.
zh: 流程总结详见多媒体附录 3。
pert_zh: 流程详见多媒体附录 3。
bt_pert_zh: The process is detailed in Multimedia Appendix 3.

en: Everyone with an ILI or a respiratory illness who contacts a GP (eg, phones for an appointment) should be asked specifically about recent travel to China and other countries flagged in current PHE advice, or if they have had contact with other people with COVID-19.
zh: 对于每个与 GP 联系（例如，电话预约）并且患有 ILI 或呼吸道疾病的个人，都应该具体询问他们最近前往中国以及 PHE 建议中标记的其他国家的旅行史，或者他们是否与其他 COVID-19 患者有过接触。
pert_zh: 对于每个与 GP 联系患有 ILI 或呼吸道疾病的个人，都应该具体询问他们最近前往中国以及 PHE 建议中标记的其他国家的旅行史，或者他们是否与其他 COVID-19 患者有过接触。
bt_pert_zh: Every individual who contacts their GP with ILI or respiratory illness should be asked specifically about their recent travel history to China and other countries flagged in PHE advice, or if they have had contact with other people with COVID-19.

en: If these screening enquiries are positive, the patient would be advised to not come to the practice but instead to follow the PHE flow sheet.
zh: 如果这些筛查询问得到了肯定的答复，则建议患者不要前往诊所，而是应该遵循 PHE 流程图。
pert_zh: 如果这些筛查询问得到了肯定的答复，则建议患者应该遵循 PHE 流程图。
bt_pert_zh: If these screening inquiries are answered affirmatively, the patient is advised that the PHE flow chart should be followed.

en: This can be by a reception or clinician staff, depending on individual practice protocol.
zh: 这可以由接待人员或临床工作人员决定，具体取决于个体诊所规程。
pert_zh: 这可以由接待人员决定，具体取决于个体诊所规程。
bt_pert_zh: This can be determined by reception staff, depending on individual clinic protocols.

en: These calls should be coded into the GP CMR system and can be reported as part of the RCGP RSC weekly return.
zh: 这些电话应编码至 GP CMR 系统，并可以作为 RCGP RSC 每周回报的一部分进行报告。
pert_zh: 这些电话应编码至 GP CMR 系统，并可以作为每周回报的一部分进行报告。
bt_pert_zh: These calls should be coded to the GP CMR system and can be reported as part of weekly returns.

en: We have developed training material to support this coding (Multimedia Appendix 4).
zh: 我们已经开发出支持该编码的培训材料（多媒体附录 4）。
pert_zh: 我们已经开发出该编码的培训材料。
bt_pert_zh: We have developed training materials for this coding.

en: These include prompt cards for:
zh: 这些包括以下提示卡：
pert_zh: 这些包括提示卡：
bt_pert_zh: These include cue cards:

en: Practice reception or triage staff: for coding of any patients calling the practice with symptoms of acute respiratory infection with a history of travel to important areas based on PHE advice
zh: 诊所接待或分诊人员：根据 PHE 建议，对所有致电诊所并存在急性呼吸道感染症状以及重要地区旅行史的患者进行编码
pert_zh: 诊所接待或分诊人员：根据 PHE 建议，对所有致电诊所并存在急性呼吸道感染症状以及重要地区旅行史的患者进行编码。
bt_pert_zh: Clinic reception or triage staff: All patients calling the clinic with symptoms of acute respiratory infection and a history of travel to a significant area should be coded in line with PHE advice.

en: Administrative staff or clinicians who code: to encourage consistent coding of results for any suspected cases, including coding of negative results for exclusion
zh: 负责编码的行政人员或临床医生：鼓励对任何疑似病例进行一致的结果编码，包括对阴性结果进行排除编码
pert_zh: 负责编码的行政人员或临床医生：鼓励对任何疑似病例进行一致的编码，包括对阴性结果进行排除编码。
bt_pert_zh: Administrators or clinicians responsible for coding: Encourage consistent coding for any suspected case, including rule-out coding for negative results.

en: Practices participating in virology surveillance will opportunistically collect blood samples from patients coming into the practice for a routine blood test.
zh: 参加病毒学监测的诊所将适时从前往诊所进行常规血液检查的患者那里采集血样。
pert_zh: 参加病毒学监测的诊所将适时从前往诊所进行常规血液检查的患者采集血样。
bt_pert_zh: Clinics participating in virological surveillance will collect blood samples from patients who visit the clinic for routine blood tests, as appropriate.

en: Patients who attend their practice for a routine blood test will be asked to provide an additional sample for serology.
zh: 前往诊所进行常规血液检查的患者将被要求提供额外的血清学样本。
pert_zh: 前往诊所进行常规血液检查的将被要求提供额外的血清学样本。
bt_pert_zh: Those visiting the clinic for routine blood work will be asked to provide an additional serology sample.

en: We have conducted initial searches within the RCGP RSC database to look at the number of full blood count (FBC) results and overall rates in adults and children (Figures 6-​-9).9).
zh: 我们已经在 RCGP RSC 数据库中进行了初步检索，以查看成人和儿童的全血细胞计数 (FBC) 结果的数量和总体比率（图 6--9).9）。
pert_zh: 我们已经在 RCGP RSC 数据库中进行了初步检索，以查看成人和儿童的全血细胞计数结果的数量和总体比率。
bt_pert_zh: We have conducted a preliminary search of the RCGP RSC database to look at the number and overall ratio of complete blood count results for adults and children.

en: An FBC is one of the most common tests performed, and we hope this will give an approximate indication of overall numbers of blood tests performed.
zh: FBC 是最常进行的检测项目之一，我们希望这能大致显示出进行血液检测的总数。
pert_zh: FBC 是最常进行的检测项目之一，我们希望这能显示出进行血液检测的总数。
bt_pert_zh: FBC is one of the most commonly performed tests and we hope this shows the total number of blood tests performed.

en: The sampling rate, per 100,000 patients was highest for children 15-17 years of age and 60 year or older in adults, with the lowest rates in children 0-4 years of age and 18-29 years of age in adults (Figures 6-​-99).
zh: 每 10 万名患者的采样率在 15-17 岁的儿童以及 60 岁或以上成人中最高，而在 0-4 岁的儿童以及 18-29 岁的成人中最低（图 6--99）。
pert_zh: 每 10 万名患者的采样率在 15-17 岁的儿童以及 60 岁或以上成人中最高，而在 18-29 岁的成人中最低（图 6--99）。
bt_pert_zh: The sampling rate per 100,000 patients was highest among children aged 15-17 years and adults aged 60 years or older and lowest among adults aged 18-29 years (Figure 6--99).

en: We will provide 1000 serology baseline samples across all ages that reflect the varying rates of attendance by age.
zh: 我们将提供 1000 个不同年龄段的血清学基线样本，用于反映各年龄段到场率的差异。
pert_zh: 我们将提供 1000 个不同年龄段的血清学基线样本，用于反映到场率的差异。
bt_pert_zh: We will provide 1000 serological baseline samples of different age groups to reflect the differences in attendance rates.

en: Additionally, we will test if we can obtain these all from virology practices to enhance the yield.
zh: 此外，我们将测试能否从病毒学监测诊所中获得所有这些信息以提高产出。
pert_zh: 此外，我们将测试能否从病毒学监测诊所中获得这些信息以提高产出。
bt_pert_zh: In addition, we will test whether this information can be obtained from virological surveillance clinics to improve output.

en: A good geographical spread is important, so PHE can advise on areas where serology will most usefully be collected.
zh: 合理的地域分布非常重要，因此 PHE 可以对采集血清学样本最有用的区域提供建议。
pert_zh: 合理的地域分布非常重要，因此可以对采集血清学样本最有用的区域提供建议。
bt_pert_zh: Appropriate geographical distribution is important so that recommendations can be made regarding areas where serological sampling would be most useful.

en: This will be followed by 800 samples monthly.
zh: 随后每月将提供 800 个样本。
pert_zh: 随后每月将提供样本。
bt_pert_zh: Samples will be provided monthly thereafter.

en: The sample will be stratified with 200 specimens for prepandemic survey (100 for monthly) in the following age groups: < 5 years, 5-17 years, 18-64 years, and 65 years or older.
zh: 样本将按照以下年龄组对用于疫情前调查（每月 100 个）的 200 个样本进行分层：<5 岁、5-17 岁、18-64 岁和 65 岁或以上。
pert_zh: 样本将按照年龄组对用于疫情前调查（每月 100 个）的 200 个样本进行分层：<5 岁、5-17 岁、18-64 岁和 65 岁或以上。
bt_pert_zh: The sample of 200 used for the pre-pandemic survey (100 per month) will be stratified by age groups: <5 years, 5-17 years, 18-64 years, and 65 years or older.

en: The younger patients, in many practices younger than 14 years, and in nearly all for children younger than 8 years will require pediatric serology surveillance.
zh: 在许多诊所中，年龄小于 14 岁的年轻患者以及几乎所有 8 岁以下的儿童都需要进行儿科血清学监测。
pert_zh: 在许多诊所中，年龄小于 14 岁的年轻患者以及几乎所有 8 岁以下的儿童都需要进行血清学监测。
bt_pert_zh: In many clinics, young patients younger than 14 years of age and almost all children younger than 8 years of age require serological monitoring.

en: We will develop a new request form for practices to capture recent travel and exposure to COVID-19.
zh: 我们将为诊所开发新的申请表，以记录近期旅行史和 COVID-19 暴露情况。
pert_zh: 我们将为诊所开发新的申请表，以记录 COVID-19 暴露情况。
bt_pert_zh: We will be developing new request forms for clinics to document COVID-19 exposures.

en: We will pilot a scheme for collecting convalescent serology from people with confirmed cases and who have had an acute virology sample at the time of their infection.
zh: 我们将试行一项计划，从已确诊病例以及在感染时已获得急性病毒学样本的患者中采集康复期血清学样本。
pert_zh: 我们将试行一项计划，从已确诊病例以及在感染时已获得急性病毒学样本的患者采集康复期血清学样本。
bt_pert_zh: We will pilot a program to collect convalescent serological samples from confirmed cases and from patients for whom acute virological samples were obtained at the time of infection.

en: This is to identify a carrier state in patients who have recovered from the virus but may continue shedding the virus.
zh: 这是为了确定已经康复但可能继续释放病毒的患者的携带者状态。
pert_zh: 这是为了确定已经康复但可能继续释放病毒的携带者状态。
bt_pert_zh: This is to determine the status of carriers who have recovered but may continue to shed the virus.

en: If there are a small number of cases, this may assist in developing a test kit for patients to take to their own GP and explore its acceptability to patients.
zh: 如果病例数量很少，这可能有助于为患者开发一套检测试剂盒，以带给他们自己的 GP 并探讨其对患者的可接受性。
pert_zh: 如果病例数量很少，这可能有助于为患者开发一套检测试剂盒，以带给 GP 并探讨其对患者的可接受性。
bt_pert_zh: If the number of cases is low, this may help to develop a test kit for patients to take to GPs and explore its acceptability to patients.

en: If there are a large number of COVID-19 cases nationally, convalescent samples could be collected from RCGP RSC practices where there are confirmed cases, with the ability to link to the full medical record.
zh: 如果在全国范围内有大量 COVID-19 病例，则可以从已确诊病例并具有与完整病历关联能力的 RCGP RSC 诊所中采集康复期样本。
pert_zh: 如果在全国范围内有大量 COVID-19 病例，则可以从已确诊病例中采集康复期样本。
bt_pert_zh: If there are a large number of COVID-19 cases across the country, convalescent samples can be collected from confirmed cases.

en: This process may include checking pseudonymized NHS numbers for positive individuals at RCGP RSC practices, checking current PHE guidance regarding considerations of infectiousness for confirmed cases, and offering the patient an appointment following the previously mentioned process.
zh: 该过程可能包括核对 RCGP RSC 诊所内阳性个体的匿名化 NHS 编号，核对有关已确诊病例传染性考虑因素的现行 PHE 指南，以及按照上述流程为患者提供预约。
pert_zh: 该过程可能包括核对 RCGP RSC 诊所内阳性个体的匿名化 NHS 编号，核对有关已确诊病例传染性考虑因素的现行 PHE 指南，以及按照流程为患者提供预约。
bt_pert_zh: This process may include checking the anonymised NHS number of the positive individual within the RCGP RSC clinic, checking current PHE guidance on infectiousness considerations for confirmed cases, and offering the patient an appointment in accordance with the process.

en: This needs to be carefully coordinated nationally across the network and may require PHE to ensure individuals are not contacted by multiple agencies.
zh: 这需要在整个网络内进行周密地全国性协调，并可能要求 PHE 确保不会由多个机构联系个人。
pert_zh: 这需要在整个网络内进行周密地全国性协调，并可能要求确保不会由多个机构联系个人。
bt_pert_zh: This will require careful national coordination across the network and may require ensuring that individuals are not contacted by more than one agency.

en: RCGP RSC could provide a useful structure to channel the initial contact once PHE has made a request.
zh: 一旦 PHE 发出申请，RCGP RSC 即可提供一种有用的结构来引导初始联系人。
pert_zh: 一旦 PHE 发出申请，RCGP RSC 即可提供一种结构来引导初始联系人。
bt_pert_zh: Once a PHE has made an application, the RCGP RSC can provide a structure to direct the initial contact.

en: The RCGP RSC practices participating in the annual influenza virology surveillance have started sampling from patients showing symptoms of a LRTI.
zh: 参与年度流感病毒学监测的 RCGP RSC 诊所已经开始从存在 LRTI 症状的患者中取样。
pert_zh: 参与年度流感病毒学监测的 RCGP 诊所已经开始从存在 LRTI 症状的患者中取样。
bt_pert_zh: RCGP clinics participating in the annual influenza virology surveillance have begun taking samples from patients with LRTI symptoms.

en: All samples received are being tested for influenza and COVID-19.
zh: 收到的所有样本正在进行流感和 COVID-19 检测。
pert_zh: 收到的所有样本正在进行 COVID-19 检测。
bt_pert_zh: All samples received are being tested for COVID-19.

en: The RCGP RSC will explore ways to collect convalescent samples from any patients tested positive for COVID-19 through the extension of the virological surveillance.
zh: RCGP RSC 将探索通过扩大病毒学监测从任何 COVID-19 检测结果呈阳性的患者中采集康复期样本的方法。
pert_zh: RCGP RSC 将探索通过扩大病毒学监测从 COVID-19 检测结果呈阳性的患者中采集康复期样本的方法。
bt_pert_zh: The RCGP RSC will explore ways to collect convalescent samples from patients who test positive for COVID-19 through expanded virological surveillance.

en: From the start, we will be carefully curating data to ensure that it can be used for future studies.
zh: 从一开始，我们就将仔细整理数据以确保可用于将来的研究。
pert_zh: 从一开始，我们就将仔细整理数据以确保可用于将来。
bt_pert_zh: From the outset, we will carefully organize the data to ensure that it is usable for the future.

en: Our clinical data will be linked to virology.
zh: 我们的临床数据将与病毒学样本相关联。
pert_zh: 我们的临床数据将与样本相关联。
bt_pert_zh: Our clinical data will be associated with the samples.

en: We will curate our data using the Findable, Accessible, Interoperable, Reusable principles.
zh: 我们将使用“可查找、可访问、可共同操作、可重新使用”的原则来整理数据。
pert_zh: 我们将使用“可查找、可访问、可重新使用”的原则来整理数据。
bt_pert_zh: We will organize data using the principles of “findable, accessible, and reusable”.

en: To facilitate this our data set is listed with Health Data Research UK and the European Health Data Evidence Network.
zh: 为此，我们的数据集已在“英国健康数据研究中心”和“欧洲健康数据证据网络”中列出。
pert_zh: 为此，我们的数据集已在“欧洲健康数据证据网络”中列出。
bt_pert_zh: For this purpose, our dataset is listed in the European Health Data Evidence Network.

en: The statistical methodology is in support of a policy approach to widespread disease outbreak, where so-called nonpharmaceutical interventions (NPIs) are used to respond to an emerging pandemic to produce disease suppression.
zh: 统计方法学支持针对广泛疾病爆发的政策方法，其中使用所谓的非药物干预措施 (NPI) 应对新出现的疫情以产生疾病抑制效果。
pert_zh: 统计方法学支持针对广泛疾病爆发的政策方法，其中使用非药物干预措施 (NPI) 应对新出现的疫情以产生疾病抑制效果。
bt_pert_zh: Statistical methodology supports policy approaches to widespread disease outbreaks, where non-pharmaceutical interventions (NPIs) are used to respond to emerging outbreaks to produce disease suppression effects.

en: This policy aims to reduce contact rates in the population and thereby reduce transmission of the virus.
zh: 该政策旨在降低人群中的接触率，从而减少病毒的传播。
pert_zh: 该政策旨在降低接触率，从而减少病毒的传播。
bt_pert_zh: The policy is designed to reduce contact rates and thus reduce the spread of the virus.

en: To implement this the UK government has recently articulated the desire to implement population self-isolation measures.
zh: 为了实现这一目标，英国政府最近明确表达了实施人群自我隔离措施的要求。
pert_zh: 为了实现这一目标，英国政府最近明确表达了要求。
bt_pert_zh: To achieve this goal, the UK government has recently made clear its requirements.

en: By targeting the reproduction number (R) (the average number of secondary cases each case generates) and aiming to reduce the R to below 1, the policy seeks to reduce case numbers to low levels or (as seen in previous outbreaks with severe acute respiratory syndrome and Ebola) to eliminate human-to-human transmission.
zh: 通过针对再生数 (R) （每个病例产生的二代病例的平均数量）并将 R 降低至 1 以下，该政策试图将病例数量降至较低水平或（如先前的严重急性呼吸系统综合征和埃博拉病毒爆发）消除人传人现象。
pert_zh: 通过针对再生数 (R) 并将 R 降低至 1 以下，该政策试图将病例数量降至较低水平或消除人传人现象。
bt_pert_zh: By targeting the reproduction number (R) and reducing R to below 1, the policy seeks to drive the number of cases down to a low level or eliminate human-to-human transmission.

en: As the experience from the 2009 H1N1 pandemic has shown, NPIs can be a crucial component of pandemic mitigation.
zh: 2009 年 H1N1 疫情的经验已经证明，NPI 可能是缓解疫情的重要组成部分。
pert_zh: 2009 年 H1N1 疫情的经验已经证明，NPI 是缓解疫情的重要组成部分。
bt_pert_zh: Experience with the 2009 H1N1 outbreak has demonstrated that NPIs are an important component of outbreak mitigation.

en: Key to the focus of our study will be the estimation of peak cases in the population and continual monitoring by data collection and modelling the potential growth and emergence of subsequent peaks in new cases as social distancing measures are relaxed.
zh: 我们研究重点的关键将是估计人口中的峰值病例，通过数据采集进行持续监测，并对随着扩大社交距离措施的放松而可能出现的病例增长和后续高峰进行建模。
pert_zh: 我们研究重点将是估计人口中的峰值病例，通过数据采集进行持续监测。
bt_pert_zh: The focus of our research will be to estimate the peak cases in the population, with ongoing surveillance through data collection.

en: There has already been publication of important disease epidemiological measures concerning the outbreak of COVID-19 in mainland China.
zh: 关于中国大陆 COVID-19 爆发的重要疾病流行病学措施已经出版。
pert_zh: 关于 COVID-19 爆发的重要疾病流行病学措施已经出版。
bt_pert_zh: Important disease epidemiological measures regarding the COVID-19 outbreak have been published.

en: A further fundamental measure in pandemic dynamics is the length of time from infection to when a person is infectious to others and the mean duration of infectiousness.
zh: 疫情动态的另一个基本指标是从一个人发生感染到传染给其他人的时间长度以及平均传染性持续时间。
pert_zh: 疫情动态的另一个基本指标是从一个人发生感染到传染给其他人的时间长度以及传染性持续时间。
bt_pert_zh: Another basic indicator of the epidemic dynamics is the length of time it takes for one person to become infected and transmit it to others and the duration of infectiousness.

en: These factors, if estimated accurately, will give good predictions for the likely length of the pandemic, the final number of infected cases.
zh: 如果能够准确估算这些因素，将对疫情可能持续的时间以及最终的感染病例数量给出合理的预测。
pert_zh: 如果能够准确估算这些因素，将对疫情可能持续的时间给出合理的预测。
bt_pert_zh: If these factors can be accurately estimated, it will provide a reasonable forecast of how long the epidemic is likely to last.

en: We intend to apply approximate Bayesian inference (ABC) to (possibly spatially heterogeneous) Susceptible-Exposed- Infectious-Removed (SEIR) stochastic epidemic models.
zh: 我们打算将近似贝叶斯推断 (ABC) 应用于（可能在空间上存在异质性）“易感-暴露-传染-移出” (SEIR) 随机疫情模型。
pert_zh: 我们打算将近似贝叶斯推断 (ABC) 应用于“易感-暴露-传染-移出” (SEIR) 随机疫情模型。
bt_pert_zh: We intend to apply approximate Bayesian inference (ABC) to the Susceptible-Exposed-Infectious-Invasive (SEIR) stochastic epidemic model.

en: Such techniques are highly parallelizable and have been successfully applied to many fields including disease transmission modelling.
zh: 此类技术是高度可并行的，并且已经成功地应用于许多领域，包括疾病传播建模。
pert_zh: 此类技术是高度可并行的，并且已经成功地应用于许多领域，包括传播建模。
bt_pert_zh: Such techniques are highly parallelizable and have been successfully applied in many areas, including propagation modeling.

en: They are particularly suited to situations where likelihood functions are absent and where more traditional approaches such as Markov chain Monte Carlo are impractical.
zh: 它们特别适合于缺少似然函数且不适合使用诸如马尔可夫链蒙特卡洛等更传统方法的情况。
pert_zh: 它们适合于缺少似然函数。
bt_pert_zh: They are suitable for the absence of likelihood functions.

en: Such an approach has been demonstrated to work effectively on the ASPREN surveillance data, a network of sentinel GPs and nurse practitioners who report deidentified information on ILIs and other conditions, where issues such as missing data and the need to model the observation process itself has been successfully addressed.
zh: 事实证明，这种方法可以有效地处理 ASPREN 监测数据，这是一个由预警 GP 和执业护士组成的网络，负责报告关于 ILI 和其他疾病的匿名信息，在这些情况下，诸如缺失数据等问题以及对观察过程本身进行建模的需求已经被成功解决。
pert_zh: 事实证明，这种方法可以有效地处理 ASPREN 监测数据，这是一个由预警 GP 和执业护士组成的网络，负责报告关于 ILI 和其他疾病的匿名信息，在这些情况下，对观察过程本身进行建模的需求已经被成功解决。
bt_pert_zh: This approach has been shown to be effective in processing ASPREN surveillance data, a network of alerting GPs and practice nurses reporting anonymous information on ILI and other diseases, where the need to model the observation process itself has been successfully addressed.

en: Furthermore, peaks in new cases have been estimated by distributional methods.
zh: 此外，已经通过分布方法估计了新发病例的高峰。
pert_zh: 此外，已经分布方法估计了新发病例的高峰。
bt_pert_zh: In addition, the peak of new cases has been estimated using distribution methods.

en: Estimates of the parameters of the SEIR model are tractable on large data sets because of parallelizability, and these methods have been implemented in several R libraries; we intend to use the libraries ABSEIR (deposited on GitHub: https://tinyurl.com/vqu35cj) and abctools (https://tinyurl.com/tfjavz4) to estimate epidemic measures on a weekly basis.
zh: 由于可并行性，SEIR 模型参数的估计在大型数据集上易于处理，并且这些方法已经应用于多个 R 库；我们打算使用 ABSEIR 库（存储于 GitHub：https://tinyurl.com/vqu35cj）和 abctools 库 (https://tinyurl.com/tfjavz4) 每周估算一次疫情指标。
pert_zh: 由于可并行性，SEIR 模型参数的估计在大型数据集上易于处理，并且这些方法已经应用于多个 R 库；我们使用 ABSEIR 库（存储于 GitHub：https://tinyurl.com/vqu35cj）和 abctools 库 (https://tinyurl.com/tfjavz4) 每周估算一次疫情指标。
bt_pert_zh: The estimation of SEIR model parameters is tractable on large datasets due to its parallelizability, and these methods have been applied to several R libraries; we use the ABSEIR library (stored on GitHub: https://tinyurl.com/vqu35cj) and the abctools library (https://tinyurl.com/tfjavz4) to estimate epidemic indicators on a weekly basis.

en: Since we are fitting an SIR-epidemic model in the ABC routine, we anticipate that our results will be robust against weekly case data containing relatively small counts.
zh: 由于我们在 ABC 例程中拟合了 SIR 疫情模型，因此我们预期分析结果对于包含相对较少数量的每周病例数据将是可靠的。
pert_zh: 由于我们在 ABC 例程中拟合了 SIR 疫情模型，因此我们预期分析结果对于包含相对较少数量的病例数据将是可靠的。
bt_pert_zh: Because we fit the SIR epidemic model in the ABC routine, we expect that the analysis results will be robust to data containing a relatively small number of cases.

en: For example, see for the ABC methodology applied to the Tristan da Cunha common cold data from 1967, where counts of I (number of infectious cases) and R (number of recovered cases) are in the tens at most.
zh: 例如，ABC 方法已经应用于特里斯坦-达库尼亚群岛 1967 年以来的普通感冒数据，其中 I（感染病例数）和 R（恢复病例数）的计数最多为几十。
pert_zh: 例如，ABC 方法已经应用于特里斯坦-达库尼亚群岛 1967 年以来的普通感冒数据，其中感染病例数和恢复病例数的计数最多为几十。
bt_pert_zh: For example, the ABC method has been applied to common cold data from Tristan da Cunha since 1967, where the counts of infected and recovered cases were in the tens at most.

en: Finally, in addition to the above methodology we will employ the Kaplan-Meier method with two outcomes (death and recovery) to estimate the case fatality ratio.
zh: 最后，除了上述方法学之外，我们还将采用具有两种结局（死亡和恢复）的 Kaplan-Meier 方法来估计病死率。
pert_zh: 最后，除了上述方法学之外，我们还将采用 Kaplan-Meier 方法来估计病死率。
bt_pert_zh: Finally, in addition to the above methodology, we will also use the Kaplan-Meier method to estimate the case fatality rate.

en: This approach is independent of the ABC methodology and will allow comparisons between estimates from the two modelling approaches to judge robustness of results.
zh: 该方法独立于 ABC 方法学，将允许比较两种建模方法的估计值以判断结果的稳健性。
pert_zh: 该方法独立于 ABC 方法学，将允许比较建模方法的估计值以判断结果的稳健性。
bt_pert_zh: This approach is independent of the ABC methodology and will allow comparison of estimates from modelling approaches to judge the robustness of the results.

en: RCGP RSC’s surveillance with PHE is defined as Health Protection under Regulation 3 of The Health Service (Control of Patient Information) Regulations 2002.
zh: RCGP RSC 与 PHE 的监测在 2002 年《卫生服务（患者信息控制）条例》第 3 条中被定义为“健康保护”。
pert_zh: RCGP RSC 与 PHE 的监测在 2002 年《卫生服务（患者信息控制）条例》中被定义为“健康保护”。
bt_pert_zh: Surveillance by the RCGP RSC and PHE is defined as ‘health protection’ in the Health Service (Control of Patient Information) Regulations 2002 .

en: This has been confirmed by PHE’s Caldicott Guardian’s Office.
zh: PHE 的卡尔迪科特监护人办公室已经证实了这一点。
pert_zh: PHE 的监护人办公室已经证实了这一点。
bt_pert_zh: This has been confirmed by PHE’s Guardian’s Office.

en: We do not see any increased risk to practices or practitioners taking part in this surveillance.
zh: 我们认为参与此项监测计划对诊所或从业者没有增加任何风险。
pert_zh: 我们认为参与此项监测计划对从业者没有增加任何风险。
bt_pert_zh: We do not consider any increased risk to practitioners from participating in this monitoring program.

en: Infection prevention and control advice will follow extant national guidance.
zh: 感染预防和控制建议将遵循现有的国家指南。
pert_zh: 感染预防和控制建议将遵循国家指南。
bt_pert_zh: Infection prevention and control advice will follow national guidance.

en: Any cases identified will be managed according to the PHE/NHS guidance in force at the time, including advice for identified contacts.
zh: 发现的所有病例都将根据当时有效的 PHE/NHS 指南进行管理，包括对已确定的密切接触者提供的建议。
pert_zh: 发现的所有病例都将根据 PHE/NHS 指南进行管理，包括对已确定的密切接触者提供的建议。
bt_pert_zh: Any cases identified will be managed in line with PHE/NHS guidance, including advice for identified close contacts.

en: However, our training will include reminders about safe handling of specimens and revision of infection control measures anticipated to be high in our practices.
zh: 但是，我们的培训将包括预计在诊所中常用的有关标本安全处理以及感染控制措施修订的提醒。
pert_zh: 但是，我们的培训将包括预计在诊所中常用的有关标本安全处理以及感染控制措施修订的提醒。
bt_pert_zh: However, our training will include reminders regarding safe specimen handling and revised infection control practices that are expected to be commonly used in the clinic.

en: It is a key part of Regulation 12 about safe care and treatment, periodically inspected by the Care Quality Commission.
zh: 这是关于安全护理和治疗的“12 号法规”的关键部分，由医疗质量委员会定期检查。
pert_zh: 这是关于安全护理和治疗的“12 号法规”的关键部分。
bt_pert_zh: This is a key part of Regulation 12 regarding safe care and treatment.

en: Travel History and Clinical Descriptors of the COVID-19 Infections
zh: 旅行史以及 COVID-19 感染的临床描述
pert_zh: 旅行史 COVID-19 感染的临床描述
bt_pert_zh: Travel history Clinical description of COVID-19 infection

en: The RCGP RSC practices have been advised on the clinical coding that has been made available for COVID-19 across all CMR systems.
zh: 已经对 RCGP RSC 诊所提出了有关所有 CMR 系统中可用于 COVID-19 的临床编码的建议。
pert_zh: 已经对 RCGP RSC 诊所提出了有关 COVID-19 的临床编码的建议。
bt_pert_zh: Advice has been given to RCGP RSC clinics regarding clinical coding for COVID-19.

en: This includes information on coding of clinical descriptors (Table 4) and any recent travel history.
zh: 这包括有关临床描述符编码（表 4）和任何近期旅行史的信息。
pert_zh: 这包括临床描述符编码（表 4）和任何近期旅行史的信息。
bt_pert_zh: This included clinical descriptor codes ( Table 4 ) and information on any recent travel history.

en: Establishment of Extended Virology Sampling
zh: 建立扩展病毒学采样
pert_zh: 建立病毒学采样
bt_pert_zh: Establishing virological sampling

en: The RCGP RSC practices participating in the annual influenza virology surveillance have started sampling from patients showing symptoms of LRTI.
zh: 参与年度流感病毒学监测的 RCGP RSC 诊所已经开始从存在 LRTI 症状的患者中取样。
pert_zh: 参与年度流感病毒学监测的 RCGP 诊所已经开始从存在 LRTI 症状的患者中取样。
bt_pert_zh: RCGP clinics participating in the annual influenza virology surveillance have begun taking samples from patients with LRTI symptoms.

en: All samples received are being tested for influenza and COVID-19.
zh: 收到的所有样本正在进行流感和 COVID-19 检测。
pert_zh: 收到的所有样本正在进行 COVID-19 检测。
bt_pert_zh: All samples received are being tested for COVID-19.

en: This has led to initial early identification of background spread in low-risk patients.
zh: 这导致开始早期发现低危患者的背景扩散。
pert_zh: 这导致早期发现低危患者的背景扩散。
bt_pert_zh: This leads to background diffusion in early detection of low-risk patients.

en: As of March 7, 2020, the surveillance system has detected 2 cases of COVID-19 in low-risk patients with no history of travel through extended virological sampling.
zh: 截至 2020 年 3 月 7 日，监测系统已经通过扩展病毒学采样在没有旅行史的低危患者中检测到 2 名 COVID-19 病例。
pert_zh: 截至 2020 年 3 月 7 日，监测系统已经通过扩展病毒学采样在没有旅行史的低危患者中检测到 COVID-19 病例。
bt_pert_zh: As of March 7, 2020, the surveillance system has detected COVID-19 cases in low-risk patients with no travel history through expanded virologic sampling.

en: This protocol describes how we have adapted a national influenza surveillance system to monitor community spread of an unexpected infection of COVID-19.
zh: 该方案描述了我们如何调整全国性流感监测系统以监控意外 COVID-19 感染的社区扩散。
pert_zh: 该方案描述了调整全国性流感监测系统以监控 COVID-19 感染的社区扩散。
bt_pert_zh: The scenario describes adapting the national influenza surveillance system to monitor the community spread of COVID-19 infection.

en: We have rapidly created and incorporated new codes to allow data recording, and are collecting data to monitor the effectiveness of containment strategies.
zh: 我们已经快速创建并合并了新的编码以允许进行数据记录，并正在收集数据以监控控制策略的有效性。
pert_zh: 我们已经快速创建并合并了新的编码以允许进行数据记录，正在收集数据以监控控制策略的有效性。
bt_pert_zh: We have quickly created and incorporated new coding to allow for data logging, and data is being collected to monitor the effectiveness of the control strategy.

en: Through this surveillance, we intend to find out more about the epidemiology of COVID-19 in ambulatory care.
zh: 通过这种监测，我们打算找到更多门诊医疗中的 COVID-19 流行病学信息。
pert_zh: 通过这种监测，我们打算找到更多 COVID-19 流行病学信息。
bt_pert_zh: Through this surveillance, we intend to find out more information on the epidemiology of COVID-19.

en: In particular, its rate of spread, both temporal and geographical.
zh: 具体而言，是疫情扩散速度，包括时间和地域方面。
pert_zh: 具体而言，是疫情扩散速度，时间和地域方面。
bt_pert_zh: Specifically, it refers to the speed, time and region of the spread of the epidemic.

en: Our testing of low-risk patients will also inform whether the containment strategy that is based on virology testing of high-risk patients and their contacts plus self-isolation is effective.
zh: 我们对低危患者的检测还将了解基于对高危患者及其接触者进行病毒学检测外加自我隔离的控制策略是否有效。
pert_zh: 我们低危患者的检测还将了解基于对高危患者及其接触者进行病毒学检测外加自我隔离的控制策略是否有效。
bt_pert_zh: Testing of our low-risk patients will also inform whether the control strategy based on virological testing of high-risk patients and their contacts plus self-isolation is effective.

en: Containment should slow the spread, and there may be benefits in the management of spread from intense surveillance.
zh: 控制措施应该会减慢疫情扩散速度，严格监测可能有利于控制疫情扩散。
pert_zh: 控制措施应该会减慢疫情扩散速度，监测可能有利于控制疫情扩散。
bt_pert_zh: Control measures should slow the spread of the epidemic, and surveillance may help control the spread of the epidemic.

en: However, there may come a point at which the virus spreads more widely into the population, as has happened in Italy.
zh: 但是，就像在意大利发生过的那样，可能会达到一个病毒更广泛传播到人群中的时间点。
pert_zh: 但是，就像在意大利发生过的那样，可能会达到一个更广泛传播到人群中的时间点。
bt_pert_zh: But, as has happened in Italy, there may come a point where it spreads more widely among the population.

en: Surveillance of low-risk patients should inform when we reach this tipping point and when infection rates start to remit.
zh: 低危患者的监测应该能够告知我们何时达到这个临界点以及感染率何时开始降低。
pert_zh: 低危患者的监测应该能够告知感染率何时开始降低。
bt_pert_zh: Monitoring of low-risk patients should be able to tell when infection rates begin to decrease.

en: The epidemiology of COVID-19 remains emergent.
zh: COVID-19 的流行病学仍然处于发展初期。
pert_zh: COVID-19 仍然处于发展初期。
bt_pert_zh: COVID-19 is still in its early stages.

en: The registration-based nature of UK primary care means that we will be able to create a complete picture of the cumulative incidence and duration.
zh: 英国基层医疗的登记制度意味着我们将能够对累积发病率和持续时间进行全面了解。
pert_zh: 英国基层医疗的登记制度意味着我们将能够对累积发病率进行全面了解。
bt_pert_zh: The UK primary care register system means we will be able to get a comprehensive picture of cumulative incidence.

en: The surveillance system should be able to identify areas where COVID-19 spread is taking place that might be suitable for trials of antiviral therapy.
zh: 监测系统应该能够确定正在发生 COVID-19 传播的区域，这些区域可能适合进行抗病毒治疗试验。
pert_zh: 监测系统应该能够确定 COVID-19 传播的区域，这些区域可能适合进行抗病毒治疗试验。
bt_pert_zh: Surveillance systems should be able to identify areas of COVID-19 transmission that might be suitable for antiviral treatment trials.

en: We could also follow up on the effectiveness or any adverse reactions to these medicines or vaccinations.
zh: 我们还可以跟踪这些药物或疫苗接种的有效性或任何不良反应。
pert_zh: 我们还可以跟踪这些药物或疫苗接种的有效性或任何反应。
bt_pert_zh: We can also track the effectiveness of or any reactions to these medications or vaccinations.

en: Finally, early detection of a confirmed COVID-19 case has exemplified the rapid implementation of this enhanced surveillance in the national network.
zh: 最后，一名确诊 COVID-19 病例的早期检测已经证明在全国性网络中快速实施这种增强监测方案的价值。
pert_zh: 最后，一名确诊 COVID-19 病例的早期检测已经证明在全国性网络中实施这种增强监测方案的价值。
bt_pert_zh: Finally, the early detection of a confirmed COVID-19 case has demonstrated the value of implementing this enhanced surveillance program across a national network.

en: Safety of practices is our primary concern.
zh: 诊所的安全性是我们首要考虑的问题。
pert_zh: 诊所安全性是我们首要考虑的问题。
bt_pert_zh: Clinic safety is our top priority.

en: The RCGP RSC has operated for over 50 years and has been involved in collecting samples to monitor disease and vaccine effectiveness through the Hong Kong flu pandemic of 1968/69, the Russian flu of 1977/78, and the 2009 Swine flu pandemic.
zh: RCGP RSC 已经运行了 50 多年，并且在 1968/69 年的香港流感疫情、1977/78 年的俄罗斯流感疫情以及 2009 年的猪流感疫情期间参与了样本采集以监测疾病和疫苗有效性。
pert_zh: RCGP RSC 已经运行了 50 多年，并且在 1977/78 年的俄罗斯流感疫情以及 2009 年的猪流感疫情期间参与了样本采集以监测疾病和疫苗有效性。
bt_pert_zh: The RCGP RSC has been operating for over 50 years and was involved in collecting samples to monitor disease and vaccine effectiveness during the 1977/78 Russian flu epidemic and the 2009 swine flu epidemic.

en: We are not aware of any increased risk to practice staff or other patients from involvement in surveillance.
zh: 我们不知道参与监测的诊所工作人员或其他患者的风险是否会增加。
pert_zh: 我们不知道监测的诊所工作人员或其他患者的风险是否会增加。
bt_pert_zh: We do not know if there is an increased risk to clinic staff or other patients being monitored.

en: Pandemic preparedness is part of the role of the RCGP RSC.
zh: 疫情防范是 RCGP RSC 职能的一部分。
pert_zh: 疫情防范是 RCGP 职能的一部分。
bt_pert_zh: Epidemic preparedness is part of the RCGP’s remit.

en: It is plausible that enhanced coding of information from contacts with the practices in RCGP RSC will reduce the likelihood of people who may be suspected COVID-19 cases being brought to the surgery inadvertently.
zh: 对从与 RCGP RSC 诊所的联系人获得的信息进行增强编码似乎有望减少可能为疑似 COVID-19 病例的患者被误带入诊室的可能性。
pert_zh: 对从与 RCGP RSC 的联系人获得的信息进行增强编码似乎有望减少可能为疑似 COVID-19 病例的患者被误带入诊室的可能性。
bt_pert_zh: Enhanced coding of information obtained from contacts with RCGP RSCs appears promising to reduce the likelihood that patients who may be suspected COVID-19 cases are mistakenly brought into consultation rooms.

en: Where cases are detected unexpectedly, it is probably helpful for that patient, their contacts, and the practice to know.
zh: 在意外发现病例的情况下，对患者、其密切接触者和诊所可能会有所帮助。
pert_zh: 在意外发现病例的情况下，对其密切接触者和诊所可能会有所帮助。
bt_pert_zh: In the event of an unexpected case, it may be helpful to their close contacts and clinics.

en: The impact on practices has been to close for a day, if a case is found, for deep cleaning and then reopen.
zh: 对诊所的影响是，如果发现病例，需要关闭一天，在进行深度消毒后重新开放。
pert_zh: 对诊所的影响是，如果发现病例，在进行深度消毒后重新开放。
bt_pert_zh: The impact on clinics is that if a case is found, they will reopen after deep disinfection.

en: The principal limitations of our system are the number of data points.
zh: 我们系统的主要限制是数据点的数量。
pert_zh: 我们系统的限制是数据点的数量。
bt_pert_zh: The limitation of our system is the number of data points.

en: We are collecting serology and virology data from 100 sites, which covers a small group of the population.
zh: 我们正在从覆盖一小部分人口的 100 个研究中心采集血清学和病毒学数据。
pert_zh: 我们正在从覆盖一小部分人口的 100 个研究中心采集数据。
bt_pert_zh: We are collecting data from 100 research centers covering a small portion of the population.

en: This has been satisfactory for monitoring influenza, but we are not certain if this is a sufficiently large sample for the COVID-19 outbreak.
zh: 这对于流感监控而言已经令人满意，但我们不确定这些样本的数量是否足够用于监测 COVID-19 爆发。
pert_zh: 这对于流感监控而言已经令人满意，但我们不确定这些样本的数量足够用于监测 COVID-19 爆发。
bt_pert_zh: This is satisfactory for influenza surveillance, but we are not sure that these samples are sufficient in number for monitoring the COVID-19 outbreak.

en: Our sites (surveillance practices) are currently fixed, and it could be helpful to be able to rapidly onboard practices in regions where there are more cases.
zh: 我们的研究中心（监测诊所）目前是固定的，能够在具有更多病例的地区迅速启用更多诊所可能会有所帮助。
pert_zh: 我们的研究中心（监测诊所）目前是固定的，能够在具有更多病例的地区迅速启用更多诊所可能会有所帮助。
bt_pert_zh: Our research centers (surveillance clinics) are currently fixed, and being able to quickly open more clinics in areas with more cases may be helpful.

en: Currently, we will be reporting weekly.
zh: 目前，我们将每周报告一次。
pert_zh: 目前，每周报告一次。
bt_pert_zh: Currently, reports are given weekly.

en: Our existing system can be enhanced to twice weekly, but maybe daily or hourly data should be our current approach.
zh: 我们现有的系统可以提高到每周两次，但也许每天或每小时数据应该成为我们当前的方法。
pert_zh: 我们现有的系统可以提高到每周两次，但也许每天或数据应该成为我们当前的方法。
bt_pert_zh: Our current system can be improved to twice a week, but perhaps daily or data should be our current approach.

en: Opportunistic sampling for serology in children younger than 10 years might be limited due to the overall reduced rate of blood tests in children.
zh: 由于儿童的总体血液检测率较低，10 岁以下儿童的血清学采样机会可能会受到限制。
pert_zh: 由于儿童的总体血液检测率较低，10 岁以下儿童的血清学采样机会可能受到限制。
bt_pert_zh: Opportunities for serological sampling in children younger than 10 years of age may be limited due to the low overall blood testing rates among children.

en: The extended surveillance using the RCGP RSC-PHE network for the emergent COVID-19 outbreak has been established rapidly.
zh: 已经快速建立了使用 RCGP RSC-PHE 网络对处于发展初期的 COVID-19 爆发进行扩展监测的方案。
pert_zh: 已经快速建立了使用 RCGP RSC-PHE 网络对 COVID-19 爆发进行扩展监测的方案。
bt_pert_zh: Protocols for extended surveillance of the COVID-19 outbreak using the RCGP RSC-PHE network have been rapidly established.

en: The model of getting the appropriate informatics to enable capture of the required data has already been a success, with data recording starting the week the codes were created.
zh: 获取适当信息以支持采集必需数据的模型已经取得成功，从创建编码的那一周开始记录数据。
pert_zh: 获取适当信息以支持采集必需数据的模型已经取得成功，从记录数据。
bt_pert_zh: The model of obtaining appropriate information to support the collection of necessary data has been successful, starting with recording the data.

en: In addition, modifying the existing surveillance system to collect population data in a parallel way has also been effective.
zh: 此外，修改现有监测系统以并行方式采集人口数据也很有效。
pert_zh: 此外，修改现有监测系统并行方式采集人口数据也很有效。
bt_pert_zh: In addition, modifying existing surveillance systems to collect population data in parallel is also effective.

en: However, we are at present unsure as to whether the scale of this surveillance provides sufficient data to drive local containment strategies or if reporting infrequently meets the need of our information age.
zh: 但是，我们目前尚不确定这种监测规模能否提供足够的数据来推动当地控制策略，或者较低频率的报告是否符合我们信息时代的需要。
pert_zh: 但是，我们目前尚不确定这种监测规模能否提供足够的数据来推动当地控制策略，或者是否符合我们信息时代的需要。
bt_pert_zh: However, we are currently uncertain whether this scale of surveillance will provide sufficient data to drive local control strategies or is consistent with the needs of our information age.
