en: Impact of the 2019–20 coronavirus pandemic on education
zh: 2019-20冠状病毒疫情对教育的影响
pert_zh: 2019-20冠状病毒疫情教育的影响
bt_pert_zh: The impact of the 2019-20 coronavirus pandemic on education

en: The 2019–20 coronavirus pandemic has affected educational systems worldwide, leading to the widespread closures of schools and universities.
zh: 2019-20冠状病毒疫情已经影响了全球教育系统，导致中小学和大学普遍关闭。
pert_zh: 2019-20冠状病毒疫情已经影响了全球教育系统，导致中小学普遍关闭。
bt_pert_zh: The 2019-20 coronavirus pandemic has impacted education systems around the world, leading to widespread closures of primary and secondary schools.

en: As of 8 April 2020, approximately 1.716 billion learners have been affected due to school closures in response to COVID-19.
zh: 截止到2020年4月8日，约有17.16亿学生由于学校为应对COVID-19而关闭的举措受到影响。
pert_zh: 截止到2020年4月8日，约有17.16亿学生由于学校关闭的举措受到影响。
bt_pert_zh: As of April 8, 2020, approximately 1.716 billion students were affected by school closures.

en: According to UNESCO monitoring, 188 countries have implemented nationwide closures and 5 have implemented local closures, impacting about 99.4%  of the world's student population.
zh: 联合国教科文组织的监控结果显示，188个国家/地区已实行全国范围的关闭举措，5个国家/地区实行了地区性关闭，这影响到全球大约99.4%的学生。
pert_zh: 联合国教科文组织的监控结果显示，188个国家/地区已实行全国范围的关闭举措，这影响到全球大约99.4%的学生。
bt_pert_zh: UNESCO monitoring results show that 188 countries have implemented nationwide closures, affecting approximately 99.4% of students worldwide.

en: On 23 March 2020, Cambridge International Examinations (CIE) released a statement announcing the cancellation of Cambridge IGCSE, Cambridge O Level, Cambridge International AS & A Level, Cambridge AICE Diploma, and Cambridge Pre-U examinations for the May/June 2020 series across all countries.
zh: 2020年3月23日，剑桥国际考试委员会(CIE)发布了一项声明，宣布取消所有国家/地区2020年5月/6月的系列考试，包括Cambridge IGCSE、Cambridge O Level、Cambridge International AS & A Level、Cambridge AICE Diploma和Cambridge Pre-U。
pert_zh: 2020年3月23日，剑桥国际考试委员会(CIE)发布了一项声明，宣布取消所有国家/地区2020年5月/6月的系列考试，包括Cambridge IGCSE、Cambridge International AS & A Level、Cambridge AICE Diploma和Cambridge Pre-U。
bt_pert_zh: On 23 March 2020, Cambridge International Examinations (CIE) issued a statement announcing the cancellation of all May/June 2020 exam series in all countries/regions, including Cambridge IGCSE, Cambridge International AS & A Level, Cambridge AICE Diploma and Cambridge Pre-U.

en: International Baccalaureate exams have also been cancelled.School closures impact not only students, teachers, and families, but have far-reaching economic and societal consequences.
zh: 国际文凭组织的考试也已取消。学校关闭不仅会影响学生、教师和家庭，还会产生深远的经济和社会后果。
pert_zh: 国际文凭组织的考试也已取消。学校关闭会产生深远的经济和社会后果。
bt_pert_zh: International Baccalaureate exams have also been cancelled. School closures will have far-reaching economic and social consequences.

en: School closures in response to COVID-19 have shed light on various social and economic issues, including student debt, digital learning, food insecurity, and homelessness, as well as access to childcare, health care, housing, internet, and disability services.
zh: 为应对COVID-19而关闭学校反映出各种社会和经济问题，包括学生贷款、数字化学习、食品安全和无家可归问题，以及儿童保育、医疗保健、住房、互联网和残障人士服务的提供情况。
pert_zh: 为应对COVID-19而关闭学校反映出各种社会和经济问题，包括学生贷款、数字化学习、食品安全和无家可归问题，以及医疗保健、住房、互联网和残障人士服务的提供情况。
bt_pert_zh: School closures in response to COVID-19 reflect a wide range of social and economic issues, including student debt, digital learning, food insecurity, and homelessness, as well as the provision of health care, housing, internet, and disability services.

en: The impact was more severe for disadvantaged children and their families, causing interrupted learning, compromised nutrition, childcare problems, and consequent economic cost to families who could not work.In response to school closures, UNESCO recommended the use of distance learning programmes and open educational applications and platforms that schools and teachers can use to reach learners remotely and limit the disruption of education.
zh: 该影响对于弱势儿童和他们的家庭更为严重，导致学习中断、营养不良、儿童保育问题，以及由此给无法工作的家庭带来的经济损失。为了应对学校关闭，联合国教科文组织建议使用远程学习课程以及开放式教育应用程序和平台，供学校和教师用来远程联系学生，缓解教育中断情况。
pert_zh: 该影响对于弱势儿童和他们的家庭更为严重，导致学习中断、营养不良、儿童保育问题，以及无法工作的家庭带来的经济损失。为了应对学校关闭，联合国教科文组织建议使用远程学习课程以及开放式教育应用程序和平台，供学校和教师用来远程联系学生，缓解教育中断情况。
bt_pert_zh: The impact is even more severe for vulnerable children and their families, leading to learning disruptions, malnutrition, childcare issues, and economic losses for families who are unable to work. In response to school closures, UNESCO recommends the use of distance learning courses and open education applications and platforms that schools and teachers can use to connect with students remotely and mitigate educational disruptions.

en: Efforts to stem the spread of COVID-19 through non-pharmaceutical interventions and preventive measures such as social-distancing and self-isolation have prompted the widespread closure of primary, secondary, and tertiary schooling in over 100 countries.Previous outbreaks of infectious diseases have prompted widespread school closings around the world, with varying levels of effectiveness.
zh: 通过非药物干预以及保持社交距离和自我隔离等预防性措施来阻止COVID-19扩散的举措导致超过100个国家/地区的小学、中学和高校普遍关闭。以前爆发的传染性疾病曾导致全球学校普遍关闭，并且该关闭举措取得了不同程度的成效。
pert_zh: 通过非药物干预以及保持社交距离和自我隔离等预防性措施来阻止COVID-19扩散的举措导致超过100个国家/地区的小学、中学和高校普遍关闭。
bt_pert_zh: Efforts to stop the spread of COVID-19 through non-pharmaceutical interventions and preventive measures such as social distancing and self-isolation have led to widespread closures of primary, secondary and higher education institutions in more than 100 countries.

en: Mathematical modelling has shown that transmission of an outbreak may be delayed by closing schools.
zh: 数学建模显示，关闭学校可能会延缓病毒爆发所导致的传染。
pert_zh: 数学建模显示，关闭学校可能会延缓病毒爆发传染。
bt_pert_zh: Mathematical modelling suggests that closing schools could slow the spread of a virus outbreak.

en: However, effectiveness depends on the contacts children maintain outside of school.
zh: 然而，效果取决于学生在校外的社交接触。
pert_zh: 然而，效果在校外的社交接触。
bt_pert_zh: However, the effect was on social contact outside of school.

en: School closures may be effective when enacted promptly.
zh: 快速实施关闭学校的举措可能会有效。
pert_zh: 快速实施学校的举措可能会有效。
bt_pert_zh: Rapid implementation of school initiatives may be effective.

en: If school closures occur late relative to an outbreak, they are less effective and may not have any impact at all.
zh: 如果病毒爆发以后才迟迟关闭学校，则效果会大打折扣，甚至完全无效。
pert_zh: 如果病毒爆发以后才关闭学校，则效果会大打折扣，甚至完全无效。
bt_pert_zh: If schools are closed after the virus outbreak, the effect will be greatly reduced or even completely ineffective.

en: Additionally, in some cases, the reopening of schools after a period of closure has resulted in increased infection rates.
zh: 另外，在一些案例中，学校关闭一段时间后重新开学导致了感染率增加。
pert_zh: 另外，在一些案例中，学校关闭一段时间后导致了感染率增加。
bt_pert_zh: Additionally, in some cases, school closures for a period of time led to increased infection rates.

en: As closures tend to occur concurrently with other interventions such as public gathering bans, it can be difficult to measure the specific impact of school closures.During the 1918-1919 influenza pandemic in the United States, school closures and public gathering bans were associated with lower total mortality rates.
zh: 由于关闭往往与禁止公共聚会等其他干预措施同时实施，因此很难衡量关闭学校的具体影响。1918-1919年流感在美国大流行期间，学校关闭和公共聚会禁令降低了总死亡率。
pert_zh: 由于关闭往往与禁止公共聚会等其他干预措施同时实施，因此很难衡量学校的具体影响。1918-1919年流感在美国大流行期间，学校关闭和公共聚会禁令降低了总死亡率。
bt_pert_zh: The specific impact of schools is difficult to measure because closures are often implemented in conjunction with other interventions, such as bans on public gatherings. During the 1918-1919 influenza pandemic in the United States, school closures and bans on public gatherings reduced overall mortality.

en: Cities that implemented such interventions earlier had greater delays in reaching peak mortality rates.
zh: 较早实施此类干预措施的城市大大延缓了死亡率高峰的到来。
pert_zh: 较早实施此类干预措施的城市大大延缓了死亡率高峰的到来。
bt_pert_zh: Cities that implemented such interventions earlier significantly delayed the peak in mortality rates.

en: Schools closed for a median duration of 4 weeks according to a study of 43 US cities' response to the Spanish Flu.
zh: 根据一项针对美国43个城市应对西班牙流感的研究，学校关闭的平均持续时间为4周。
pert_zh: 根据一项针对美国43个城市应对西班牙流感的研究，学校的平均持续时间为4周。
bt_pert_zh: According to a study of 43 U.S. cities’ responses to the Spanish flu, the average duration of school was four weeks.

en: School closures were shown to reduce morbidity from the Asian flu by 90% during the 1957–58 outbreak, and up to 50% in controlling influenza in the US, 2004–2008.Multiple countries successfully slowed the spread of infection through school closures during the 2009 H1N1 Flu pandemic.
zh: 在1957-1958年的亚洲流感爆发期间，美国通过学校关闭举措使发病率降低了90%；2004-2008年期间，该举措将流感发病率降低了50%。在2009年H1N1流感期间，多个国家/地区都实施了学校关闭政策，成功地减缓了传染病的扩散。
pert_zh: 在1957-1958年的亚洲流感爆发期间，美国通过学校关闭举措使发病率降低了90%；2004-2008年期间，流感发病率降低了50%。在2009年H1N1流感期间，多个国家/地区都实施了学校关闭政策，成功地减缓了传染病的扩散。
bt_pert_zh: During the 1957-1958 Asian flu outbreak, school closures in the United States reduced cases by 90%, and during 2004-2008, flu cases were reduced by 50%. During the 2009 H1N1 flu outbreak, several countries implemented school closures, which successfully slowed the spread of the infectious disease.

en: School closures in the city of Oita, Japan, were found to have successfully decreased the number of infected students at the peak of infection; however closing schools was not found to have significantly decreased the total number of infected students.
zh: 据发现，日本大分市的学校关闭举措成功降低了感染高峰期的感染学生人数；但未发现关闭学校显著降低感染学生的总人数。
pert_zh: 据发现，日本大分市的学校关闭举措成功降低了感染学生人数；但未发现关闭学校显著降低感染学生的总人数。
bt_pert_zh: It was found that school closures in Oita City, Japan successfully reduced the number of infected students; however, school closures were not found to significantly reduce the total number of infected students.

en: Mandatory school closures and other social distancing measures were associated with a 29% to 37% reduction in influenza transmission rates.
zh: 强制关闭学校和其他保持社交距离的措施使流感传染速度降低了29%至37%。
pert_zh: 强制关闭学校和其他保持社交距离的措施使流感传染速度降低了29%至37%。
bt_pert_zh: Mandatory school closures and other social distancing measures reduced flu transmission by 29% to 37%.

en: Early school closures in the United States delayed the peak of the 2009 H1N1 Flu pandemic.
zh: 美国及早实行的学校关闭措施延缓了2009年H1N1流感大流行高峰期的到来。
pert_zh: 美国及早实行的学校关闭措施延缓了2009年H1N1流感大流行的到来。
bt_pert_zh: Early school closures in the United States delayed the onset of the 2009 H1N1 influenza pandemic.

en: Despite the overall success of closing schools, a study of school closures in Michigan found that "district level reactive school closures were ineffective."During the swine flu outbreak in 2009 in the UK, in an article titled "Closure of schools during an influenza pandemic" published in the Lancet Infectious Diseases, a group of epidemiologists endorsed the closure of schools in order to interrupt the course of the infection, slow further spread and buy time to research and produce a vaccine.
zh: 尽管关闭学校举措在总体上是成功的，但一项针对密歇根州学校关闭举措的研究显示，“地区级别的被动关闭学校没有效果”。根据《柳叶刀传染性疾病》上发表的一篇标题为《流感大流行期间的学校关闭措施》的文章所述，在2009年英国猪流感爆发期间，一些流行病学专家都赞成关闭学校，以切断感染过程、减慢病毒进一步扩散，并为研发和生产疫苗赢得时间。
pert_zh: 尽管关闭学校举措在总体上是成功的，但一项针对密歇根州学校关闭举措的研究显示，“地区级别的被动关闭学校没有效果”。根据《柳叶刀传染性疾病》上发表的一篇标题为《流感大流行期间的学校关闭措施》的文章所述，在2009年英国猪流感爆发期间，一些流行病学专家都赞成关闭学校，以切断感染过程、减慢病毒进一步扩散，并为研发和生产疫苗赢得时间。
bt_pert_zh: Although school closures have been successful overall, a study of school closures in Michigan showed that "reactive closures at the district level were ineffective." During the 2009 swine flu outbreak in the UK, some epidemiologists favored closing schools to interrupt the infection process, slow further spread of the virus, and buy time for the development and production of a vaccine, according to an article titled "School closures during influenza pandemics" published in The Lancet Infectious Diseases.

en: Having studied previous influenza pandemics including the 1918 flu pandemic, the influenza pandemic of 1957 and the 1968 flu pandemic, they reported on the economic and workforce effect school closure would have, particularly with a large percentage of doctors and nurses being women, of whom half had children under the age of 16.
zh: 在对以往的流感大流行（包括1918年流感大流行、1957年流感大流行和1968年流感大流行）进行研究后，他们报道了学校关闭对经济和劳动力造成的影响，特别是在医生和护士中，女性占较大比例，而且其中半数有不满16周岁的子女。
pert_zh: 在对以往的流感大流行进行研究后，他们报道了学校关闭对经济和劳动力造成的影响，特别是在医生和护士中，女性占较大比例，而且其中半数有不满16周岁的子女。
bt_pert_zh: Looking at previous flu pandemics, they report on the economic and workforce impacts of school closures, particularly among doctors and nurses, who are disproportionately represented among women and half of whom have children under the age of 16.

en: They also looked at the dynamics of the spread of influenza in France during French school holidays and noted that cases of flu dropped when schools closed and re-emerged when they re-opened.
zh: 他们还研究了在法国学校放假期间，法国流感扩散的动态趋势，并注意到在学校关闭期间，流感病例数下降，而在学校重新开学后，病例数反弹。
pert_zh: 他们还研究了在法国学校放假期间，法国流感扩散的动态趋势，并注意到在学校关闭期间，病例数下降，而在学校重新开学后，病例数反弹。
bt_pert_zh: They also studied the dynamics of influenza spread in France during the French school holidays and noticed that the number of cases fell during the school closures and rebounded after schools reopened.

en: They noted that when teachers in Israel went on strike during the flu season of 1999–2000, visits to doctors and the number of respiratory infections dropped by more than a fifth and more than two fifths respectively.
zh: 他们指出，在1999–2000年以色列流感发病期，以色列教师举行了罢工，就医人数和呼吸道感染人数分别下降了五分之一以上和五分之二以上。
pert_zh: 他们指出，在1999–2000年以色列流感发病期，以色列教师举行了罢工，呼吸道感染人数分别下降了五分之一以上。
bt_pert_zh: They note that during the 1999–2000 influenza epidemic in Israel, when Israeli teachers went on strike, respiratory infections fell by more than one-fifth.

en: For schools and childcare facilities, the U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention recommends short-term closure to clean or disinfect if an infected person has been in a school building regardless of community spread.
zh: 对于学校和儿童福利机构，美国疾病控制与预防中心建议，如果有已感染的患者曾在学校教学楼逗留过，不论病毒在社区内的扩散情况如何，都应进行短期封闭，以便进行清洁或消毒。
pert_zh: 对于学校和儿童福利机构，美国疾病控制与预防中心建议，如果有已感染的患者曾在学校教学楼逗留过，不论病毒在社区内的扩散情况如何，应进行短期封闭，以便进行清洁或消毒。
bt_pert_zh: For schools and child welfare institutions, the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention recommends that if an infected person has stayed in a school building, they should be closed short-term for cleaning or disinfection, regardless of the spread of the virus in the community.

en: When there is minimal to moderate community transmission, social distancing strategies can be implemented such as cancelling field trips, assemblies, and other large gatherings such as physical education or choir classes or meals in a cafeteria, increasing the space between desks, staggering arrival and dismissal times, limiting nonessential visitors, and using a separate health office location for children with flu-like symptoms.
zh: 当社区传染程度极低或不严重时，可以实施保持社交距离的策略，例如，取消野外郊游、集会以及其他大型聚会（如体育课、合唱班或在餐厅就餐）、增大课桌之间的空间、错峰上下学、限制非必要的来访者，以及对出现疑似流感症状的儿童安排单独的就医点。
pert_zh: 当社区传染程度极低或不严重时，可以实施保持社交距离的策略，例如，取消野外郊游、集会以及其他大型聚会（如体育课、合唱班或在餐厅就餐）、增大课桌之间的空间、限制非必要的来访者，以及对出现疑似流感症状的儿童安排单独的就医点。
bt_pert_zh: When community transmission is very low or not severe, social distancing strategies can be implemented, such as canceling field trips, assemblies, and other large gatherings (such as physical education classes, choir classes, or dining halls), increasing the space between desks, limiting nonessential visitors, and providing separate medical care for children with flu-like symptoms.

en: When there is substantial transmission in the local community, in addition to social distancing strategies, extended school dismissals may be considered.
zh: 如果当地社区出现了大量传染，除了实施保持社交距离策略之外，还可以考虑延长学校假期。
pert_zh: 如果当地社区出现了大量传染，除了实施保持社交距离策略之外，还可以考虑学校假期。
bt_pert_zh: If there is a significant amount of transmission in the local community, school holidays could be considered in addition to implementing social distancing strategies.

en: On 26 January, China instituted measures to contain the COVID-19 outbreak which included extending the Spring Festival holiday to contain the outbreak.
zh: 1月26日，中国制定措施控制COVID-19疫情爆发，其中包括延长春节假期以控制疫情爆发。
pert_zh: 1月26日，中国制定措施控制COVID-19疫情爆发，其中包括延长春节假期。
bt_pert_zh: On January 26, China introduced measures to control the COVID-19 outbreak, including extending the Lunar New Year holiday.

en: Universities and schools around the country closed.
zh: 全国各地的大学和中小学校纷纷关闭。
pert_zh: 全国各地的中小学校纷纷关闭。
bt_pert_zh: Primary and secondary schools across the country have been closed.

en: On 23 February, Iran's Ministry of Health announced the closure of universities, higher educational institutions and schools in several cities and provinces.
zh: 2月23日，伊朗卫生部宣布关闭多个城市和省份的大学、高等教育机构和中小学校。
pert_zh: 2月23日，伊朗卫生部宣布关闭多个城市和省份的大学、高等教育机构。
bt_pert_zh: On February 23, Iran’s Ministry of Health announced the closure of universities and higher education institutions in several cities and provinces.

en: On 3 March, UNESCO released the first global numbers on school closures and affected students.
zh: 3月3日，联合国教科文组织公布了关于学校关闭和受影响学生的第一批全球数字。
pert_zh: 3月3日，联合国教科文组织公布了学校关闭和受影响学生的第一批全球数字。
bt_pert_zh: On March 3, UNESCO released the first global figures on school closures and students affected.

en: It reported that 13 countries had enacted preventive measures including the temporary closure of schools and universities, impacting 290.5 million students around the world.
zh: 它报告说，有13个国家/地区颁布了预防性措施，其中包括暂时关闭中小学和大学，这影响了全球2.905亿学生。
pert_zh: 它报告说，有13个国家/地区颁布了预防性措施，其中包括暂时关闭大学，这影响了全球2.905亿学生。
bt_pert_zh: It reported that 13 countries had enacted preventive measures, including the temporary closure of universities, affecting 290.5 million students worldwide.

en: In reaction, UNESCO called on countries to support affected students and families and facilitate large-scale inclusive distance learning programmes.
zh: 作为回应，联合国教科文组织呼吁各个国家/地区为受影响的学生和家庭提供支持，并推动大范围实施全纳远程学习课程。
pert_zh: 作为回应，联合国教科文组织呼吁各个国家/地区为受影响的学生和家庭提供支持，推动大范围实施全纳远程学习课程。
bt_pert_zh: In response, UNESCO called on countries to support affected students and families and promote the large-scale implementation of inclusive distance learning programmes.

en: On 4 March, the Italian government ordered the full closure of all schools and universities nationwide as Italy reached 100 deaths.
zh: 3月4日，意大利政府下令全国所有的中小学和大学全部关闭，因为意大利的死亡人数已达100人。
pert_zh: 3月4日，意大利政府下令全国所有的中小学全部关闭，因为意大利的死亡人数已达100人。
bt_pert_zh: On March 4, the Italian government ordered all primary and secondary schools across the country to close as the death toll in Italy reached 100.

en: In doing so, Italy became one of 22 countries on three continents which had announced or implemented school closures.
zh: 如此一来，意大利成为了三大洲中宣布或实施关闭学校措施的22个国家/地区之一。
pert_zh: 如此一来，意大利成为了三大洲中宣布或实施关闭学校措施的22个国家之一。
bt_pert_zh: This makes Italy one of 22 countries on three continents to announce or implement school closures.

en: On 5 March, the majority of learners affected by COVID-19 emergency measures were located in China, with 233 million learners affected, followed by Japan at 16.5 million and Iran at 14.5 million.
zh: 3月5日，受COVID-19紧急措施影响的大部分学生都在中国，受影响学生人数为2.33亿人，其次是日本的1650万人和伊朗的1450万人。
pert_zh: 3月5日，受COVID-19紧急措施影响的大部分学生都在中国，学生人数为2.33亿人，其次是日本的1650万人和伊朗的1450万人。
bt_pert_zh: On March 5, the majority of students affected by COVID-19 emergency measures were in China, with 233 million students, followed by Japan with 16.5 million and Iran with 14.5 million.

en: By 10 March, one in five students worldwide was "staying away from school due to the COVID-19 crisis" while another one in four was barred from higher education institutions.
zh: 截止到3月10日，全世界五分之一的学生“因COVID-19危机而离开学校”，同时四分之一的高校生被禁止入校。
pert_zh: 截止到3月10日，全世界五分之一的学生“因COVID-19危机而离开学校”，同时四分之一的高校生被禁止。
bt_pert_zh: As of March 10, one in five students worldwide were “out of school due to the COVID-19 crisis”, while one in four higher education students were banned from attending school.

en: On 13 March, governments in 49 countries announced or implemented school closures, including 39 countries which closed schools nationwide and 22 countries with localised school closures.
zh: 3月13日，49个国家/地区的政府宣布或实施了关闭学校措施，其中39个国家/地区在全国范围内关闭学校，22个国家/地区实施了地方性的学校关闭措施。
pert_zh: 3月13日，49个国家/地区的政府宣布或实施了关闭学校措施，22个国家/地区实施了地方性的学校关闭措施。
bt_pert_zh: As of March 13, governments in 49 countries/regions have announced or implemented school closures, and 22 countries/regions have implemented local school closures.

en: By 16 March, this figure increased from 49 to 73 countries according to UNESCO.
zh: 截止到3月16日，据联合国教科文组织报道，这一数字从49个国家/地区增加到了73个。
pert_zh: 截止到3月16日，据联合国教科文组织报道，这一数字增加到了73个。
bt_pert_zh: As of March 16, that number had risen to 73, according to UNESCO.

en: By 19 March, 50% of students worldwide were affected by school closures, corresponding to nationwide closures in 102 countries and local closures in 11 countries affecting 850 million children and youth.
zh: 截止到3月19日，全球50%的学生受到学校关闭举措的影响，102个国家/地区在全国范围内关闭学校，11个国家/地区在地方范围内关闭学校，影响了8.5亿儿童和青年。
pert_zh: 截止到3月19日，全球50%的学生受到学校关闭举措的影响，102个国家/地区在全国范围内关闭学校，11个国家/地区在地方范围内关闭学校，影响了8.5亿儿童。
bt_pert_zh: As of March 19, 50% of students worldwide were affected by school closures, with 102 countries/regions closing schools at a national level and 11 countries/regions closing schools at a local level, affecting 850 million children.

en: By 20 March, over 70% of the world's learners were impacted by closures, with 124 country-wide school closures.
zh: 截止到3月20日，全球超过70%的学生受到学校关闭举措的影响，124个国家/地区在全国范围内关闭学校。
pert_zh: 截止到3月20日，全球超过70%的学生受到学校关闭举措的影响，124个国家/地区关闭学校。
bt_pert_zh: As of March 20, more than 70% of students worldwide are affected by school closures, with 124 countries and regions closing schools.

en: On 23 March, all Nigerian school were found to have been closed down by Nigerian government, markets as well as companies were closed down and children were forbidden by parents to step out of their homes.
zh: 3月23日，尼日利亚政府关闭了所有尼日利亚学校，市场和公司也被关闭，家长禁止儿童踏出家门。
pert_zh: 3月23日，尼日利亚政府关闭了所有尼日利亚学校，市场也被关闭，家长禁止儿童踏出家门。
bt_pert_zh: On March 23, the Nigerian government closed all Nigerian schools, markets were also closed, and parents prohibited their children from leaving their homes.

en: On 26 March, all New Zealand schools and universities have been closed down across the country.
zh: 3月26日，新西兰全国的所有中小学校和大学都已关闭。
pert_zh: 3月26日，新西兰全国的中小学校和大学都已关闭。
bt_pert_zh: On March 26, all primary and secondary schools and universities across New Zealand were closed.

en: The government has imposed a two-week holiday, allowing schools to transition to forms of distant teaching as soon as possible.
zh: 政府强制放假两周，允许学校尽快将教学形式转为远程教学。
pert_zh: 政府强制放假两周，学校尽快将教学形式转为远程教学。
bt_pert_zh: The government mandated a two-week holiday, and schools switched teaching to remote learning as quickly as possible.

en: Universities have closed for one week, but resumed with online teaching afterwards.
zh: 大学关闭了一周，但之后又通过在线教学的方式复课。
pert_zh: 大学关闭了一周，但又通过在线教学的方式复课。
bt_pert_zh: The university was closed for a week but resumed classes with online teaching.

en: Other school services remain open, but teaching is restricted to distant learning.
zh: 学校的其他服务仍然开放，但授课方式仅限于远程学习。
pert_zh: 学校的其他服务仍然开放，但仅限于远程学习。
bt_pert_zh: Other school services remain open but are limited to remote learning.

en: By 27 March, nearly 90 percent of the world's student population was out of class.
zh: 截止到3月27日，全球近90%的学生都已离开学校。
pert_zh: 截止到3月27日，全球90%的学生都已离开学校。
bt_pert_zh: As of March 27, 90% of students around the world have left school.

en: Regions with schools remaining open included Taiwan, Singapore, Australia, Sweden, and some U.S. states.
zh: 仍然开放学校的地区包括台湾、新加坡、澳大利亚、瑞典和美国的一些州。
pert_zh: 仍然开放学校的地区包括新加坡、澳大利亚、瑞典和美国的一些州。
bt_pert_zh: Regions that remain open include Singapore, Australia, Sweden and some US states.

en: By 29 March, more than 1.5 billion children and other students were affected by nationwide school closures.
zh: 截止到3月29日，超过15亿儿童和其他学生受到全国性关闭学校的影响。
pert_zh: 截止到3月29日，超过15亿儿童受到全国性关闭学校的影响。
bt_pert_zh: As of March 29, more than 1.5 billion children were affected by nationwide school closures.

en: Others were disrupted by localized closures.
zh: 其他人则受到地方性关闭学校的影响。
pert_zh: 其他人受到地方性关闭学校的影响。
bt_pert_zh: Others were affected by local school closures.

en: Until April 6, holidays were extended in all secondary schools of Turkmenistan.
zh: 截止到4月6日，土库曼斯坦所有的中学都延长了假期。
pert_zh: 截止到4月6日，土库曼斯坦所有的中学都延长了。
bt_pert_zh: As of April 6, all secondary schools in Turkmenistan have extended their school hours.

en: An order signed by the Ministry of Education as a preventative measure aims to prevent the spread of respiratory diseases in connection with the WHO coronavirus pandemic.
zh: 教育部签署了一项命令作为预防措施，旨在防止与WHO宣布的冠状病毒疫情有关的呼吸道疾病的扩散。
pert_zh: 教育部签署了一项命令作为预防措施，旨在防止冠状病毒疫情有关的呼吸道疾病的扩散。
bt_pert_zh: The Department of Education signed the order as a precautionary measure aimed at preventing the spread of respiratory illness related to the coronavirus outbreak.

en: 10 countries have localised schools closures, UNESCO estimates  473,933,356  learners are potentially at risk (pre-primary to upper-secondary education) and 77,938,904 learners are potentially at risk in tertiary education.
zh: 在10个实施地方性关闭学校举措的国家/地区中，联合国教科文组织估计有473,933,356名学生可能面临风险（学前到高中教育），高等教育中有77,938,904名学生可能面临风险。
pert_zh: 在10个实施地方性关闭学校举措的国家/地区中，联合国教科文组织估计有77,938,904名学生可能面临风险（学前到高中教育）。
bt_pert_zh: In the 10 countries with local school closure initiatives, UNESCO estimates that 77,938,904 students may be at risk (pre-primary to upper secondary education).

en: Note: Figures correspond to total number of learners enrolled at pre-primary, primary, lower-secondary, and upper-secondary levels of education [ISCED levels 0 to 3], as well as at tertiary education levels [ISCED levels 5 to 8] who could be affected should localised closures become countrywide.
zh: 注意：这些数字与接受学前、小学、初中和高中教育[ISCED 0-3级]以及接受高等教育[ISCED 5-8级]的学生总数相对应，如果地方性关闭学校举措变为全国性关闭学校，则接受高等教育的学生就会受到影响。
pert_zh: 注意：这些数字与接受学前、小学、初中和高中教育[ISCED 0-3级]以及接受高等教育的学生总数相对应，如果地方性关闭学校举措变为全国性关闭学校，则高等教育的学生就会受到影响。
bt_pert_zh: Note: These figures correspond to the total number of students in pre-primary, primary, lower secondary and upper secondary education [ISCED levels 0-3], as well as in higher education, which would be affected if local school closures became national.

en: Enrolment figures based on latest UNESCO Institute of Statistics data.
zh: 入学人数基于最新的联合国教科文组织统计研究所数据。
pert_zh: 入学人数最新的联合国教科文组织统计研究所数据。
bt_pert_zh: School enrollments are the latest from the UNESCO Institute for Statistics.

en: School closures in response to the COVID-19 pandemic have shed a light on numerous issues affecting access to education, as well as broader socio-economic issues.
zh: 为应对COVID-19疫情而关闭学校反映出许多影响教育机会的问题，以及更为广泛的社会经济问题。
pert_zh: 为应对COVID-19疫情而关闭学校反映出更为广泛的社会经济问题。
bt_pert_zh: School closures in response to the COVID-19 pandemic reflect broader socioeconomic issues.

en: As of March 12, more than 370 million children and youth are not attending school because of temporary or indefinite country wide school closures mandated by governments in an attempt to slow the spread of COVID-19.
zh: 截止到3月12日，为减缓COVID-19的扩散，政府要求在全国范围内暂时或无限期关闭学校，导致超过3.7亿名儿童和青年无法入校学习。
pert_zh: 截止到3月12日，为减缓COVID-19的扩散，政府要求在全国范围内暂时或关闭学校，导致超过3.7亿名儿童和青年无法入校学习。
bt_pert_zh: As of March 12, more than 370 million children and youth were unable to attend school as a result of government-mandated temporary or nationwide school closures to slow the spread of COVID-19.

en: As of 29 March, nearly 90% of the world's learners were impacted by closures.Even when school closures are temporary, it carries high social and economic costs.
zh: 截止到3月29日，全球近90%的学生受到关闭学校举措的影响。即使是暂时关闭学校，也会产生很高的社会和经济成本。
pert_zh: 截止到3月29日，全球近90%的学生受到关闭学校举措的影响。即使是关闭学校，也会产生很高的社会和经济成本。
bt_pert_zh: As of March 29, nearly 90% of students worldwide are affected by school closures. Even school closures have high social and economic costs.

en: The disruptions they cause affect people across communities, but their impact is more severe for disadvantaged children and their families including interrupted learning, compromised nutrition, childcare problems and consequent economic cost to families who cannot work.
zh: 它们造成的中断对各个社区的人群造成了影响，但对弱势儿童及其家庭的影响尤为严重，其中包括学习中断、营养不良、儿童保育问题以及由此给无法工作的家庭带来的经济损失。
pert_zh: 它们造成的中断对各个社区的人群造成了影响，但对弱势儿童及其家庭的影响尤为严重，其中包括学习中断、营养不良、儿童保育问题以及由此给无法工作的家庭带来的损失。
bt_pert_zh: The disruptions they cause affect people in all communities, but the impacts on vulnerable children and their families are particularly severe, including interrupted learning, malnutrition, childcare issues, and resulting losses for families who are unable to work.

en: Working parents are more likely to miss work when schools close in order to take care of their children, incurring wage loss in many instances and negatively impacting productivity.
zh: 学校关闭后，上班族家长很可能为了照顾子女而耽误工作，在许多情况下会遭受工资损失，生产效率也因此受到负面影响。
pert_zh: 学校关闭后，上班族家长很可能为了照顾子女而耽误工作，在许多情况下会遭受工资损失。
bt_pert_zh: With schools closed, working parents are likely to miss work to care for their children, and in many cases suffer wage losses.

en: Localised school closures place burdens on schools as parents and officials redirect children to schools that are open.
zh: 地方性关闭学校的举措也会给其他学校带来负担，因为家长和官员会将孩子们重新转入还在开放的学校。
pert_zh: 地方性关闭学校的举措也会给其他学校带来负担，因为家长和官员会将孩子们重新转入学校。
bt_pert_zh: Local moves to close schools also put a burden on other schools as parents and officials try to transfer children back into the system.

en: Women often represent a large share of health-care workers and often cannot attend work because of childcare obligations that result from school closures.
zh: 女性通常在医护人员中占据很大的比例，学校关闭后，她们不得不承担起看护子女的责任，所以往往无法继续工作。
pert_zh: 女性通常在医护人员中占据很大的比例，学校关闭后，不得不承担起看护子女的责任，所以往往无法继续工作。
bt_pert_zh: Women usually make up a large proportion of medical staff. When schools are closed, they have to take on the responsibility of caring for their children, so they are often unable to continue working.

en: This means that many medical professionals are not at the facilities where they are most needed during a health crisis.
zh: 这意味着，在健康危机时期，许多医疗专业人员都无法坚守在最需要他们的地方。
pert_zh: 这意味着，在健康危机时期，医疗专业人员都无法坚守在最需要他们的地方。
bt_pert_zh: This means that during times of health crisis, medical professionals are unable to remain where they are most needed.

en: Lack of access to technology or fast, reliable internet access can prevent students in rural areas and from disadvantaged families.
zh: 对于生活在农村地区和来自贫困家庭的学生来说，由于缺少技术支持或快速、可靠的互联网访问，使得他们无法接受远程教育。
pert_zh: 对于生活在农村地区和来自贫困家庭的学生来说，由于缺少技术支持或快速的互联网访问，使得他们无法接受远程教育。
bt_pert_zh: For students living in rural areas and from poor families, lack of technological support or fast internet access makes distance education impossible.

en: Lack of access to technology or good internet connectivity is an obstacle to continued learning, especially for students from disadvantaged families.
zh: 缺少技术支持和稳定的互联网连接成为继续学习的阻碍，对来自贫困家庭的学生来说尤为如此。
pert_zh: 缺少技术支持和稳定的互联网连接成为继续学习的阻碍，对学生来说尤为如此。
bt_pert_zh: Lack of technical support and stable internet connection becomes a barrier to continued learning, especially for students.

en: In response to school closures caused by COVID-19, UNESCO recommends the use of distance learning programmes and open educational applications and platforms that schools and teachers can use to reach learners remotely and limit the disruption of education.To aid in slowing the transmission of COVID-19, hundreds of libraries have temporarily closed.
zh: 针对因COVID-19而导致的学校关闭，联合国教科文组织建议开展远程学习课程，并开放教育应用程序和平台，让学校和老师为学生远程授课，以减少学业中断。为了帮助减缓COVID-19的传染，数百家图书馆已暂时关闭。
pert_zh: 针对因COVID-19而导致的学校关闭，联合国教科文组织建议开展远程学习课程，并开放教育应用程序和平台，让学生远程授课，以减少学业中断。为了帮助减缓COVID-19的传染，数百家图书馆已暂时关闭。
bt_pert_zh: In response to school closures due to COVID-19, UNESCO recommends distance learning courses and opening up educational applications and platforms to allow students to take classes remotely to reduce academic disruptions. Hundreds of libraries have temporarily closed to help slow the spread of COVID-19.

en: In the United States, numerous major cities announced public library closures, including Los Angeles, San Francisco, Seattle, and New York City, affecting 221 libraries.
zh: 在美国，许多主要城市都已宣布关闭公共图书馆，其中包括洛杉矶、旧金山、西雅图和纽约市，受此影响的图书馆已有221家。
pert_zh: 在美国，许多主要城市都已宣布关闭公共图书馆，其中包括旧金山、西雅充和纽约市，受此影响的图书馆已有221家。
bt_pert_zh: In the United States, many major cities have announced the closure of public libraries, including San Francisco, Seattle and New York City, which have affected 221 libraries.

en: For students without internet at home, this increases the difficulty of keeping up with distance learning.
zh: 对于家里没有互联网的学生来说，这增加了他们跟上远程学习进度的难度。
pert_zh: 对于家里没有互联网的学生来说，增加了他们跟上远程学习进度的难度。
bt_pert_zh: For students who do not have internet at home, it increases the difficulty for them to keep up with the progress of remote learning.

en: School closures puts a strain on parents and guardians to provide childcare and manage distance learning while children are out of school.
zh: 学校的关闭也给家长和监护人增加了负担，孩子不在校期间，他们需要看护孩子和监督远程学习。
pert_zh: 学校的关闭也给家长和监护人增加了负担，他们需要看护孩子和监督远程学习。
bt_pert_zh: School closures have also placed an additional burden on parents and guardians who need to watch their children and supervise remote learning.

en: In the absence of alternative options, working parents often leave children alone when schools close and this can lead to risky behaviours, including increased influence of peer pressure and substance abuse.
zh: 由于缺乏其他出路，上班族父母只能在停课期间将孩子独自留在家中，这可能会导致危险行为，并更多地被同龄人影响和滥用药物。
pert_zh: 由于缺乏其他出路，上班族父母只能在停课期间孩子独自留在家中，这可能会导致危险行为，并更多地被同龄人影响和滥用药物。
bt_pert_zh: Lacking other outlets, working parents are leaving their children home alone during school closures, which can lead to risky behaviors, increased exposure to peer influence, and substance abuse.

en: Many children worldwide rely on free or discounted meals at schools.
zh: 全球许多儿童都依赖学校提供的免费或有补贴的餐食。
pert_zh: 全球许多儿童都依赖提供的免费或有补贴的餐食。
bt_pert_zh: Many children around the world rely on free or subsidized meals.

en: When schools close, nutrition is compromised.Nutrition plays a critical role in cognitive development and academic performance for children.In Washington State, around 45% of the states 1.1 million students enrolled in traditional public and charter schools qualify for subsidised school meals.
zh: 学校关闭后，孩子们无法摄取足够的营养。而充足的营养对孩子的认知能力发展和学习表现起着至关重要的作用。在华盛顿州，110万学生就读于传统公立学校和特许学校，大约45%的学生有资格享受学校伙食补贴。
pert_zh: 学校关闭后，孩子们无法摄取足够的营养。而充足的营养对孩子的认知能力发展和学习表现起着至关重要的作用。110万学生就读于传统公立学校和特许学校，大约45%的学生有资格享受学校伙食补贴。
bt_pert_zh: When schools are closed, children are unable to get adequate nutrition, which is critical to children's cognitive development and academic performance. About 45% of the 1.1 million students in traditional public and charter schools are eligible for school meal subsidies.

en: At least 520,000 students and their families may be affected by food insecurity as a result of school closures.School lunch programmes are the second-biggest anti-hunger initiative in the United States after food stamps.
zh: 学校关闭后，至少有52万名学生及其家庭可能受到食品安全问题的影响。在美国，学校午餐计划是仅次于食品券计划的第二大反饥饿倡议。
pert_zh: 学校关闭后，至少有52万名学生及其家庭可能受到影响。在美国，学校午餐计划是仅次于食品券计划的第二大反饥饿倡议。
bt_pert_zh: At least 520,000 students and their families may be affected by the closure of schools. In the United States, the school lunch program is the second largest anti-hunger initiative after the food stamp program.

en: Every year, nearly 30 million children rely on schools to provide free or low-cost meals including breakfast, lunch, snacks, and even dinner.In Alabama, where state-wide school closures as of 18 March have affected over 720,000 students, the state Superintendent announced that staff in schools disproportionately affected by poverty would create meal distribution networks to provide food for students who rely on school lunches.
zh: 每年，近3000万儿童依赖于学校提供的免费伙食或成本低廉的伙食，包括早餐、午餐、零食，甚至晚餐。在阿拉巴马州，截止到3月18日，全州范围的学校关闭举措已对超过72万学生造成影响，该州的教育厅长宣布，对因贫困而受到更大影响的学校，该校工作人员将建立伙食分配网络，为依靠学校伙食的学生提供食物。
pert_zh: 每年，近3000万儿童依赖于学校提供的免费伙食或成本低廉的伙食。
bt_pert_zh: Every year, nearly 30 million children rely on free or low-cost meals provided by schools.

en: School closures negatively impact student learning outcomes.
zh: 学校关闭举措对学生的学习效果产生了负面影响。
pert_zh: 学校关闭举措对学生的产生了负面影响。
bt_pert_zh: School closures have had a negative impact on students.

en: Schooling provides essential learning and when schools close, children and youth are deprived opportunities for growth and development.
zh: 学校教育提供了必要的学习机会，学校关闭后，儿童和青少年被剥夺了成长和发展的机会。
pert_zh: 学校教育提供了必要的学习机会，学校关闭后，儿童和青少年被剥夺了机会。
bt_pert_zh: Schooling provides essential learning opportunities, and when schools are closed, children and young people are deprived of these opportunities.

en: The disadvantages are disproportionate for under-privileged learners who tend to have fewer educational opportunities beyond school.Student drop-out rates tend to increase as an effect of school closures due to the challenge of ensuring all students return to school once school closures ends.
zh: 这种影响对来自贫困家庭的学生更为严重，因为他们接受校外教育的机会更少。受到学校关闭的影响，学生辍学率往往会增加，因为在学校复课后，很难确保所有学生都能返回学校。
pert_zh: 这种影响对来自贫困家庭的学生更为严重，因为他们接受校外教育的机会更少。学生辍学率往往会增加，因为在学校复课后，很难确保所有学生都能返回学校。
bt_pert_zh: The impact is more severe for students from poorer families, who have less access to out-of-school education. Student dropout rates tend to increase because it is difficult to ensure that all students return to school when classes resume.

en: This is especially true of protracted closures.Schools are hubs of social activity and human interaction.
zh: 学校持久性关闭造成的影响更为明显。因为学校是社会活动和人际交往的中心。
pert_zh: 学校持久性关闭造成的影响更为明显。因为学校是社会活动的中心。
bt_pert_zh: The impact of prolonged school closures is even more pronounced because schools are the center of social activity.

en: When schools are closed, many children and youth miss out of on social contact that is essential to learning and development.When schools close parents are often asked to facilitate the learning of children at home and can struggle to perform this task.
zh: 学校关闭后，许多儿童和青年都失去了社交的机会，这些机会对于他们的学习和发展都至关重要。学校关闭后，家长往往需要督促子女在家中学习，而这项任务十分艰巨，家长对此苦不堪言。
pert_zh: 学校关闭后，家长往往需要督促子女在家中学习，而这项任务家长对此苦不堪言。
bt_pert_zh: After schools are closed, parents often need to supervise their children to study at home, a task that parents find extremely difficult.

en: This is especially true for parents with limited education and resources.
zh: 对受教育程度较低且资源有限的家长尤为如此。
pert_zh: 对受教育程度较低且资源有限家长尤为如此。
bt_pert_zh: This is especially true for parents with less education and limited resources.

en: Potential impacts of school closures and reliance on distance learning are not addressed in federal acts of legislation at this time.
zh: 目前，联邦立法尚未关注学校关闭和依赖远程学习所产生的潜在影响。
pert_zh: 目前，联邦立法尚未关注学校关闭产生的潜在影响。
bt_pert_zh: Currently, federal legislation has not addressed the potential impacts of school closures.

en: Formal education — as opposed to informal education or non-formal education — tends to refer to schools, colleges, universities and training institutions.
zh: 与非正式教育或非正规教育相反，正规教育通常是指学校、学院、大学和培训机构。
pert_zh: 与非正规教育相反，正规教育通常是指学校、学院、大学和培训机构。
bt_pert_zh: In contrast to informal education, formal education usually refers to schools, colleges, universities and training institutions.

en: A 1974 report by the World Bank defined formal education as the following:Formal education: the hierarchically structured, chronologically graded ‘education system’, running from primary school through the university and including, in addition to general academic studies, a variety of specialised programmes and institutions for full-time technical and professional training.The majority of data collected on the number of students and learners impacted by COVID-19 has been calculated based on the closure of formal education systems.
zh: 世界银行在1974年发布的报告对正规教育的定义如下：正规教育：从小学到大学期间具备结构分层并逐渐升级的“教育系统”，除普遍学术学习外，还包括针对全日制技术和职业培训提供的各种专业课程和机构。针对受到COVID-19影响的学生和学习者人数，所收集到的大部分相关数据都基于已关闭的正规教育系统。
pert_zh: 世界银行在1974年发布的报告对正规教育的定义如下：正规教育：从小学到大学期间具备结构分层并逐渐升级的“教育系统”，除普遍学术学习外，还包括针对全日制技术和职业培训提供的各种专业课程和机构。受到COVID-19影响的学生和学习者人数，所收集到的大部分相关数据都基于已关闭的正规教育系统。
bt_pert_zh: The World Bank report published in 1974 defines formal education as follows: Formal education: A structured and progressive "education system" from primary school to university that includes, in addition to general academic learning, a variety of specialized courses and institutions for full-time technical and vocational training. Most of the data collected on the number of students and learners affected by COVID-19 is based on formal education systems that have been closed.

en: The UNESCO Institute for Statistics provides figures on students impacted by COVID-19 corresponding to the number of learners enrolled at pre-primary, primary, lower-secondary, and upper-secondary levels of education [ISCED levels 0 to 3], as well as at tertiary education levels [ISCED levels 5 to 8].
zh: 联合国教科文组织统计研究所提供了受COVID-19影响的学生数据，该数据与接受学前、小学、初中和高中教育[ISCED 0-3级]以及接受高等教育[ISCED 5-8级]的学生人数相对应。
pert_zh: 联合国教科文组织统计研究所提供了受COVID-19影响的学生数据，该数据与接受学前、小学、初中和高中教育[ISCED 0-3级]的学生人数相对应。
bt_pert_zh: The UNESCO Institute for Statistics provides data on students affected by COVID-19, corresponding to the number of students attending pre-primary, primary, lower secondary and upper secondary education [ISCED levels 0-3].

en: Early childhood educational programmes are usually designed for children below the age of 3 and may refer to preschools, nursery schools, kindergartens, and some day care programmes.
zh: 幼儿教育课程通常是为3岁以下的儿童设计的，可指幼托机构、托儿所、幼儿园和一些日托课程。
pert_zh: 幼儿教育课程通常是为3岁以下的儿童设计的，可指托儿所、幼儿园和一些日托课程。
bt_pert_zh: Early childhood education programs are usually designed for children under the age of 3 and can refer to nurseries, kindergartens, and some daycare programs.

en: While many primary and secondary schools have closed around the world due to COVID-19, measures impacting early childhood educational programmes have varied.
zh: 受COVID-19影响，尽管全世界有许多中小学校相继关闭，但针对幼儿教育课程所采取的措施各不相同。
pert_zh: 受COVID-19影响，尽管全世界有许多中小学校相继关闭，但幼儿教育课程所采取的措施各不相同。
bt_pert_zh: While many primary and secondary schools around the world have closed due to COVID-19, the measures taken by early childhood education programs vary.

en: In some countries and territories, preschools and day cares are considered necessary services and have not closed in tandem with broader school closure measures.In the United States, the Washington State Department of Children, Youth, and Families encouraged child care and early learning centres to stay open.
zh: 在一些国家和地区，幼托机构和日托机构被视为不可或缺的服务，所以并未随着各个学校普遍停课而关闭。在美国，华盛顿州儿童、青年和家庭部门鼓励继续开放儿童托管机构和早教中心。
pert_zh: 在一些国家和地区，日托机构被视为不可或缺的服务，所以并未随着各个学校普遍停课而关闭。在美国，华盛顿州儿童、青年和家庭部门鼓励继续开放儿童托管机构和早教中心。
bt_pert_zh: In some countries and regions, daycare centers are considered essential services and have not been closed along with the widespread closure of schools. In the United States, the Washington State Department of Children, Youth and Families encourages childcare centers and early childhood education centers to remain open.

en: Some school districts may offer alternative child care options, prioritising the children of first responders and healthcare workers.
zh: 一些学区可能会提供其他儿童托管方式，并优先接收急救人员和医护人员的子女。
pert_zh: 一些学区可能会提供其他儿童托管方式，并急救人员和医护人员的子女。
bt_pert_zh: Some school districts may offer alternative child care options for the children of first responders and healthcare workers.

en: The governor of Maryland mandated that specific child care services remain open for the children of emergency personnel while Washington State and California have left it to the discretion of care providers.
zh: 马里兰州州长规定，特定的儿童托管服务仍向急救人员的子女开放，而华盛顿州和加利福尼亚州则将决定权交给托管机构负责人。
pert_zh: 马里兰州州长规定，特定的儿童托管服务仍向急救人员的子女开放，而加利福尼亚州则将决定权交给托管机构负责人。
bt_pert_zh: Maryland's governor has ruled that certain child care services remain open to children of first responders, while California has left the decision up to the heads of child care facilities.

en: California Governor Gavin Newsom explained his state's position, saying “We need our child care facilities, our daycare centers, to operate to absorb the impact of these school closures.”
zh: 加利福尼亚州州长Gavin Newsom解释了其所在州的立场，他说：“我们需要继续开放儿童托管机构和日托中心，以降低学校关闭所造成的影响。”
pert_zh: 加利福尼亚州州长Gavin Newsom解释了其所在州的立场，他说：“我们需要继续开放儿童托管机构和日托中心。”
bt_pert_zh: California Governor Gavin Newsom explained his state's position, saying: "We need to keep child care and day care centers open."

en: Colorado has encouraged the development of "tool kits" for parents to use at home to emulate the lessons children would have received in their early learning programmes.In Japan, Prime Minister Shinzo Abe closed all schools throughout the country until April 8, however, children's daycare facilities were excluded.
zh: 科罗拉多州鼓励为家长开发“工具包”，让家长能够在家模拟子女在早期学习课程中要学习的课程。在日本，首相安倍晋三关闭了全国所有的学校，这一措施一直持续到4月8日，但儿童日托机构依然正常开放。
pert_zh: 科罗拉多州鼓励为家长开发“工具包”，让家长能够在家模拟子女在早期学习课程中要学习的课程。在日本，关闭了全国所有的学校，这一措施一直持续到4月8日，但儿童日托机构依然正常开放。
bt_pert_zh: Colorado is encouraging the development of "tool kits" for parents to simulate at home the lessons their children will learn in early learning courses. In Japan, all schools in the country are closed until April 8, but child daycare centers remain open.

en: In early March, five adults associated with a nursing facility for preschool children in Kobe tested positive for coronavirus.
zh: 3月初，神户一家学龄前儿童护理机构的5名成年人被检测出冠状病毒阳性。

en: Primary or elementary education typically consists of the first four to seven years of formal education.

en: The International Baccalaureate Organization (IBO) canceled the examinations for its Diploma Programme and Career-related Programme candidates scheduled between 30 April and 22 May 2020, reportedly affecting more than 200,000 students worldwide.
zh: 国际文凭组织(IBO)取消了原定于2020年4月30日至2020年5月22日举行的文凭课程和与职业相关的课程考试，据报道，这一举措已影响到全球20多万名考生。

bt_pert_zh: The International Baccalaureate Organization (IBO) has cancelled all exams for its diploma programmes scheduled for April 30, 2020 to May 22, 2020, a move that has reportedly affected more than 200,000 candidates worldwide.

en: The IBO stated that it would award candidates their diplomas or certificates based on "their coursework" and "the established assessment expertise, rigor, and quality control already built into the programme."

bt_pert_zh: The IBO said it would award diplomas or certificates based on "candidates' coursework" and "test results from completed assessments, rigorous standards and quality controls built into the curriculum".

en: Tertiary education, also known as higher education, refers to the non-compulsory educational levels that follow completion of secondary school or high school.

en: Tertiary education is normally taken to include undergraduate and postgraduate education, as well as vocational education and training.

bt_pert_zh: Higher education usually includes undergraduate and postgraduate education, and training is also included.

en: Undergraduate education is education conducted after secondary education and prior to post-graduate education, for which the learner is typically awarded a bachelor's degree.

en: Students enrolled in higher education programmes at colleges, universities, and community colleges are often refereed to in countries such as United States as "college students."The closure of colleges and universities has widespread implications for students, faculty, administrators, and the institutions themselves.
zh: 在美国等一些国家/地区，在学院、大学和社区学院学习高等教育课程的学生通常被称为“大学生”。关闭学院和大学对学生、教员、管理人员和学校本身都造成了广泛影响。

bt_pert_zh: Princeton University, for example, contributes $1.58 billion to New Jersey's economy.

en: College and university closures have a domino effect on economies with far-reaching implications.According to Linda Bilmes of the Harvard Kennedy School, "local hotels, restaurants, cafes, shops, car rental agencies and other local businesses obtain a significant share of annual revenue from graduation week and college reunions...

pert_zh: 关闭大学和学院对经济造成了连锁效应，深远。哈佛肯尼迪学院的Linda Bilmes表示，“在本地酒店、餐厅、咖啡馆、商店、汽车租赁机构和其他本地企业的年收入中，毕业周和大学聚会举办期间获得的收入占了相当大的比例...

en: these communities will suffer a lot of economic damage if the colleges remain closed at that time."Small towns which rely on college students to support the local economy and provide labour to local businesses are especially impacted by school closures and the exodus of students from campus.

en: In Ithaca, New York, Cornell University students spent at least $4 million a week in Tompkins county.

en: In the wake of Cornell's decision to keep students home following spring break and transition to virtual instruction, the Mayor of Ithaca called for "immediate and forceful federal action — we will see a horrific economic impact as a result of Cornell University closing."
zh: 在康奈尔大学决定让学生在春假过后继续呆在家中，并改为进行虚拟教学后，伊萨卡市长呼吁“立即采取强有力的联邦行动——关闭康奈尔大学会给我们的经济带来难以估量的影响。”
pert_zh: 在康奈尔大学决定让学生在春假过后继续呆在家中，并进行虚拟教学后，伊萨卡市长呼吁“立即采取强有力的联邦行动——关闭康奈尔大学会给我们的经济带来难以估量的影响。”
bt_pert_zh: After Cornell University decided to keep students home after spring break and teach virtually, the mayor of Ithaca called for "immediate and strong federal action — closing Cornell would have untold consequences for our economy."

en: UNESCO is sharing 10 recommendations during this period:
zh: 联合国教科文组织在此期间分享了10项建议：
pert_zh: 联合国教科文组织分享了10项建议：
bt_pert_zh: UNESCO shares 10 recommendations:

en: Examine the readiness and choose the most relevant tools: Decide on the use high-technology and low-technology solutions based on the reliability of local power supplies, internet connectivity, and digital skills of teachers and students.
zh: 检查准备情况并选择最相关的工具：根据本地电力供应的可靠性、互联网连接状况以及师生的数字化技能，决定使用技术要求较高或技术要求较低的解决方案。
pert_zh: 检查准备情况并选择最相关的工具：根据本地电力供应的可靠性、互联网连接状况以及师生的数字化技能，决定使用技术要求较低的解决方案。
bt_pert_zh: Check readiness and select the most relevant tools: Decide on using less technologically demanding solutions based on the reliability of local electricity supply, internet connectivity, and the digital skills of students and teachers.

en: This could range through integrated digital learning platforms, video lessons, MOOCs, to broadcasting through radios and TVs.
zh: 这包括集成的数字学习平台、视频课程、MOOC，或通过无线电和电视进行广播。
pert_zh: 这包括集成的数字学习平台、视频课程、MOOC，或通过无线电广播。
bt_pert_zh: This includes integrated digital learning platforms, video courses, MOOCs, or via radio broadcasts.

en: Ensure inclusion of the distance learning programmes: Implement measures to ensure that students including those with disabilities or from low-income backgrounds have access to distance learning programmes, if only a limited number of them have access to digital devices.
zh: 确保包含远程学习课程：采取相应措施，确保让包括残障人士或来自低收入家庭的人士在内的所有学生都能接受远程学习课程，最好为有限的一部分人提供数字设备。
pert_zh: 确保包含远程学习课程：确保让包括残障人士或来自低收入家庭的人士在内的所有学生都能接受远程学习课程，最好为有限的一部分人提供数字设备。
bt_pert_zh: Ensure inclusion of remote learning courses: Ensure that remote learning courses are accessible to all students, including those with disabilities or from low-income families, preferably by providing digital devices to a limited number of people.

en: Consider temporarily decentralising such devices from computer labs to families and support them with internet connectivity.
zh: 考虑暂时将这些设备从计算机实验室取出，并分配到各个家庭中，帮助他们建立网络连接。
pert_zh: 考虑暂时将这些设备从计算机实验室取出，并分配到各个家庭中。
bt_pert_zh: Consider temporarily removing these devices from computer labs and distributing them among homes.

en: Protect data privacy and data security: Assess data security when uploading data or educational resources to web spaces, as well as when sharing them with other organisations or individuals.
zh: 保护数据隐私和数据安全：将数据或教育资源上传到网络空间，以及将其与其他组织或个人分享时，对数据安全性进行评估。
pert_zh: 保护数据隐私和数据安全：上传数据或教育资源到网络空间时，对数据安全性进行评估。
bt_pert_zh: Protect data privacy and data security: Evaluate data security when uploading data or educational resources to cyberspace.

en: Ensure that the use of applications and platforms does not violate students’ data privacy.
zh: 在使用应用程序和平台时，确保不会侵犯学生的数据隐私。
pert_zh: 在使用应用程序和平台时，确保不会侵犯数据隐私。
bt_pert_zh: Ensure that data privacy is not violated while using applications and platforms.

en: Prioritize solutions to address psychosocial challenges before teaching: Mobilize available tools to connect schools, parents, teachers, and students with each other.
zh: 将心理问题解决方案的优先级排在教学方案之上：调动可用的工具，将学校、家长、教师和学生相互联系起来。
pert_zh: 将心理问题解决方案的优先级排在教学方案：调动可用的工具，将学校、家长、教师和学生相互联系起来。
bt_pert_zh: Prioritize solutions to psychological problems in teaching programs: mobilize available tools to connect schools, parents, teachers and students.

en: Create communities to ensure regular human interactions, enable social caring measures, and address possible psychosocial challenges that students may face when they are isolated.
zh: 创建社区，以确保正常的人际交往、启用社会关怀措施，并解决学生在隔离时可能面临的心理问题。
pert_zh: 创建社区，以确保正常的人际交往，解决学生在隔离时可能面临的心理问题。
bt_pert_zh: Create communities to ensure normal human interaction and address the psychological issues students may face while in isolation.

en: Plan the study schedule of the distance learning programmes: Organise discussions with stakeholders to examine the possible duration of school closures and decide whether the distance learning programme should focus on teaching new knowledge or enhance students’ knowledge of prior lessons.
zh: 制定远程学习课程的学习时间表：与利益相关者进行讨论，以调查学校关闭的持续时间，并决定远程学习课程是应侧重于教授新知识，还是巩固学生在以前课程中学到的知识。
pert_zh: 制定远程学习课程的学习时间表：与利益相关者进行讨论，并决定远程学习课程是应侧重于教授新知识，还是巩固学生在以前课程中学到的知识。
bt_pert_zh: Develop a learning schedule for distance learning courses: Discuss with stakeholders and decide whether the distance learning course should focus on teaching new knowledge or consolidating what students have learned in previous courses.

en: Plan the schedule depending on the situation of the affected zones, level of studies, needs of students needs, and availability of parents.
zh: 根据受影响地区的情况、学生学习水平、学生需求和家长空闲情况，制定时间表。
pert_zh: 根据受影响地区的情况、学生学习水平和家长空闲情况，制定时间表。
bt_pert_zh: A schedule will be developed based on the situation in the affected areas, students' learning levels and parents' availability.

en: Choose the appropriate learning methodologies based on the status of school closures and home-based quarantines.
zh: 根据学校关闭和居家隔离的状况，选择适当的学习方法。
pert_zh: 根据学校关闭的状况，选择适当的学习方法。
bt_pert_zh: Choose appropriate learning methods based on school closure conditions.

en: Avoid learning methodologies that require face-to-face communication.
zh: 避免选择需要进行面对面交流的学习方法。
pert_zh: 避免选择需要进行学习方法。
bt_pert_zh: Avoid choosing methods that require learning.

en: Provide support to teachers and parents on the use of digital tools: Organise brief training or orientation sessions for teachers and parents as well, if monitoring and facilitation are needed.
zh: 为教师和家长提供有关使用数字化工具的支持：如需进行监督和激励，则为他们安排简短的培训或指导会议。
pert_zh: 为教师和家长提供有关使用数字化工具的支持：如需进行激励，则为他们安排简短的培训或指导会议。
bt_pert_zh: Provide support to teachers and parents on the use of digital tools: if motivation is needed, arrange short training or coaching sessions for them.

en: Help teachers to prepare the basic settings such as solutions to the use of internet data if they are required to provide live streaming of lessons.
zh: 帮助教师准备基本设置，例如，如果要求教师进行课程直播，则帮助他们准备解决方案以使用互联网数据。
pert_zh: 帮助教师准备基本设置，例如，要求教师进行课程直播，则帮助他们准备解决方案以使用互联网数据。
bt_pert_zh: Help teachers prepare basic setup, for example, if teachers are required to live stream their classes, help them prepare solutions to use internet data.

en: Blend appropriate approaches and limit the number of applications and platforms: Blend tools or media that are available for most students, both for synchronous communication and lessons, and for asynchronous learning.
zh: 结合使用多种适当的方法，并限制应用程序和平台的使用数量：结合使用对大多数学生可用的工具或媒体，用于同步通信、课程学习和异步学习。
pert_zh: 结合使用多种适当的方法，并限制应用程序和平台的使用数量：结合使用可用的工具或媒体，用于同步通信、课程学习和异步学习。
bt_pert_zh: Use a combination of appropriate methods and limit the number of applications and platforms used: Use a combination of available tools or media for synchronous communication, coursework, and asynchronous learning.

en: Avoid overloading students and parents by asking them to download and test too many applications or platforms.
zh: 避免增加学生和家长的负担，例如，要求他们下载和测试过多的应用程序或平台。
pert_zh: 避免增加学生和家长的负担，例如，测试过多的应用程序或平台。
bt_pert_zh: Avoid adding burdens to students and parents, for example, by testing too many apps or platforms.

en: Develop distance learning rules and monitor students’ learning process: Define the rules with parents and students on distance learning.
zh: 制定远程学习规则并监督学生的学习进度：与家长和学生一起制定远程学习规则。
pert_zh: 制定远程学习规则并监督学生的学习进度：与学生一起制定远程学习规则。
bt_pert_zh: Create rules for distance learning and monitor student progress: Work with students to create rules for distance learning.

en: Design formative questions, tests, or exercises to monitor closely students’ learning process.
zh: 设计格式化的问题、测试或练习，以密切监督学生的学习进度。
pert_zh: 设计问题、测试或练习，以密切监督学生的学习进度。
bt_pert_zh: Design questions, tests, or exercises to closely monitor students' progress.

en: Try to use tools to support submission of students’ feedback and avoid overloading parents by requesting them to scan and send students’ feedback
zh: 尝试利用工具来支持学生提交作业，避免给家长带来过重负担，例如，要求他们扫描和发送学生作业
pert_zh: 尝试利用工具来支持学生提交作业，避免给家长带来过重负担，要求他们扫描和发送学生作业。
bt_pert_zh: Try to use tools to support students in submitting assignments, and avoid placing an undue burden on parents to scan and send student assignments.

en: Define the duration of distance learning units based on students’ self-regulation skills: Keep a coherent timing according to the level of the students’ self-regulation and metacognitive abilities especially for livestreaming classes.
zh: 根据学生的自我管理能力，制定远程学习单元的持续时间：根据学生的自我管理能力和元认知能力，保持连贯的时间安排，这一点在直播课程中尤为重要。
pert_zh: 根据学生的自我管理能力，制定远程学习单元的持续时间：根据学生的自我管理能力，保持连贯的时间安排，这一点在直播课程中尤为重要。
bt_pert_zh: Plan the duration of remote learning units based on students’ self-management abilities: Maintaining a consistent schedule based on students’ self-management abilities is especially important in live courses.

en: Preferably, the unit for primary school students should not be more than 20 minutes, and no longer than 40 minutes for secondary school students.
zh: 小学生的学习单元最好不要超过20分钟，中学生的学习单元最好不要超过40分钟。
pert_zh: 小学生的学习单元最好不要超过20分钟，中学生的学习单元最好不要超过40。
bt_pert_zh: A study unit for primary school students should not exceed 20 minutes, and a study unit for secondary school students should not exceed 40 minutes.

en: Create communities and enhance connection: Create communities of teachers, parents, and school managers to address sense of loneliness or helplessness, facilitate sharing of experience and discussion on coping strategies when facing learning difficulties.
zh: 创建社区并加强联系：创建由教师、家长和学校管理者组成的社区，以应对孤独感或无助感，鼓励大家就面对学习困境时的应对策略分享经验并开展讨论。
pert_zh: 创建社区并加强联系：创建由教师、家长和学校管理者组成的社区，以应对孤独感或无助感，就面对学习困境时的应对策略分享经验并开展讨论。
bt_pert_zh: Create community and strengthen connections: Create communities of teachers, parents, and school administrators to address feelings of isolation or helplessness, share experiences, and discuss coping strategies when faced with learning challenges.

en: 290 million students out of school due to COVID-19: UNESCO releases first global numbers and mobilizes response,   UNESCO.
zh: 2.9亿学生因COVID-19而离开学校：联合国教科文组织公布了第一批全球数字并呼吁作出回应，联合国教科文组织。
pert_zh: 2.9亿学生离开学校：联合国教科文组织公布了第一批全球数字并呼吁作出回应。
bt_pert_zh: 290 million students out of school: UNESCO publishes first global figures and calls for a response.

en: WHEREAS on March 4, 2020, I proclaimed a State of Emergency to exist in California as a result of the threat of COVID-19;
zh: 鉴于COVID-19带来的威胁，本人曾于2020年3月4日宣布加利福尼亚进入紧急状态；
pert_zh: 鉴于COVID-19带来的威胁，本人宣布加利福尼亚进入紧急状态；
bt_pert_zh: In light of the threat posed by COVID-19, I declare a state of emergency for the State of California;

en: and WHEREAS in a short period of time, COVID-19 has rapidly spread throughout California, necessitating updated and more stringent guidance from federal, state, and local public health officials;
zh: 鉴于短期内COVID-19在整个加利福尼亚的快速扩散，联邦、州以及当地公共卫生部门官员需要提供更新且更严格的指导；
pert_zh: 鉴于短期内COVID-19在整个加利福尼亚的快速扩散，当地公共卫生部门官员需要提供更严格的指导；
bt_pert_zh: Given the rapid spread of COVID-19 throughout California in the short term, local public health officials need to provide stricter guidance;

en: and WHEREAS for the preservation of public health and safety throughout the entire State of California, I find it necessary for all Californians to heed the State public health directives from the Department of Public Health.
zh: 另外，为保护整个加利福尼亚州的公共健康和安全，我认为全体加利福尼亚居民需遵从公共卫生部发布的州级公共卫生指令。
pert_zh: 另外，为保护整个加利福尼亚州的公共健康和安全，全体加利福尼亚居民需遵从公共卫生部发布的州级公共卫生指令。
bt_pert_zh: Additionally, to protect the public health and safety of the entire state of California, all Californians are required to comply with state public health directives issued by the Department of Public Health.

en: NOW, THEREFORE, I, GAVIN NEWSOM, Governor of the State of California, in accordance with the authority vested in me by the State Constitution and statutes of the State of California, and in particular, Government Code sections 8567, 8627, and 8665 do hereby issue the following Order to become effective immediately:
zh: 为此，本人，系加利福尼亚州州长GAVIN NEWSOM，依据州宪法、加利福尼亚州法规，特别是政府法规第8567、8627和8665条赋予我的权力，特此颁布以下命令，即刻生效：
pert_zh: 为此，本人，系加利福尼亚州州长GAVIN NEWSOM，依据州宪法、加利福尼亚州法规，特此颁布以下命令，即刻生效：
bt_pert_zh: NOW, THEREFORE, I, GAVIN NEWSOM, Governor of the State of California, pursuant to the Constitution of the State of California and the Statutes of the State of California, hereby issue this Order, effective immediately:

en: IT IS HEREBY ORDERED THAT:
zh: 特此命令：
pert_zh: 特此命令:
bt_pert_zh: Hereby order:

en: 1) To preserve the public health and safety, and to ensure the healthcare delivery system is capable of serving all, and prioritizing those at the highest risk and vulnerability, all residents are directed to immediately heed the current State public health directives, which I ordered the Department of Public Health to develop for the current statewide status of COVID-19.
zh: 1) 为保护公众健康和安全，确保卫生保健实施系统能够服务大众并优先治疗危重体弱病人，所有居民应即刻遵从当前的州级公共卫生指令，这是我命令公共卫生部针对目前全州COVID-19的状况制定的。
pert_zh: 为保护公众健康和安全，确保卫生保健实施系统能够服务大众并优先治疗危重体弱病人，所有居民应即刻遵从当前的州级公共卫生指令，这是我命令公共卫生部针对全州COVID-19的状况制定的。
bt_pert_zh: To protect public health and safety and ensure that the health care delivery system is able to serve the public and prioritize care for the most critically ill and vulnerable, all residents should immediately follow the current state public health directives that I have directed the Department of Public Health to develop in response to the COVID-19 situation throughout the state.

en: Those directives are consistent with the March 19, 2020, Memorandum on Identification of Essential Critical Infrastructure Workers During COVID-19 Response, found at: https://covid19.ca.gov/.
zh: 这些指令与2020年3月19日发表的《关于在应对COVID-19疫情期间识别关键基础设施工作人员的备忘录》（请参阅：https://covid19.ca.gov/）一致。
pert_zh: 这些指令与2020年3月19日发表的备忘录一致。
bt_pert_zh: These directives are consistent with the memorandum issued on March 19, 2020.

en: ORDER OF THE STATE PUBLIC HEALTH OFFICER
zh: 州公共卫生官员下达的命令
pert_zh: 州公共卫生官员下达命令
bt_pert_zh: State public health officials issued an order

en: To protect public health, I as State Public Health Officer and Director of the California Department of Public Health order all individuals living in the State of California to stay home or at their place of residence except as needed to maintain continuity of operations of the federal critical infrastructure sectors, as outlined at https://www.cisa.gov/critical-infrastructure-sectors.
zh: 为保护公众健康，作为州公共卫生官员兼加利福尼亚州公共卫生部主任，我在此下令，除需要满足联邦关键基础设施部门持续运作的人（如https://www.cisa.gov/critical-infrastructure-sectors所述）之外，所有居住在加利福尼亚州的人都应留在家中或居住场所。
pert_zh: 为保护公众健康，作为州公共卫生官员兼加利福尼亚州公共卫生部主任，我在此下令，除需要满足联邦关键基础设施部门持续运作的人之外，所有居住在加利福尼亚州的人都应留在家中或居住场所。
bt_pert_zh: To protect the public health, as the State Public Health Officer and Director of the California Department of Public Health, I hereby order that all persons residing in the State of California, except those necessary for the continued operation of critical federal infrastructure, remain in their homes or places of residence.

en: In addition, and in consultation with the Director of the Governor's Office of Emergency Services, I may designate additional sectors as critical in order to protect the health and well-being of all Californians.
zh: 此外，经与州长紧急服务办公室主任协商，为保护所有加利福尼亚居民的健康和福祉，我可以指派其他部门作为关键部门。
pert_zh: 此外，经与州长紧急服务办公室主任协商，为保护所有加利福尼亚居民的健康和福祉，可以指派其他部门作为关键部门。
bt_pert_zh: In addition, in consultation with the Director of the Governor's Office of Emergency Services, other departments may be designated as critical departments in order to protect the health and well-being of all Californians.

en: Pursuant to the authority under the Health and Safety Code 120125, 120140, 131080, 120130(c), 120135, 120145, 120175 and 120150, this order is to go into effect immediately and shall stay in effect until further notice.
bt_pert_zh: This order is effective immediately and will remain in effect until further notice, pursuant to authority provided by Health and Safety Code 120125, 131080, 120130(c), 120135, 120145, 120175, and 120150.

en: The federal government has identified 16 critical infrastructure sectors whose assets, systems, and networks, whether physical or virtual, are considered so vital to the United States that their incapacitation or destruction would have a debilitating effect on security, economic security, public health or safety, or any combination thereof.
zh: 联邦政府确定了16个关键基础设施部门，这些部门的资产、体系和网络，无论是实体的还是虚拟的，都被认为对美国至关重要，若其陷入瘫痪或遭到破坏，将对安全、经济安全、公众健康或安全领域（或同时对其中多个领域）带来负面影响。
pert_zh: 联邦政府确定了16个关键基础设施部门，这些部门的资产、体系和网络，无论是实体的还是虚拟的，将对安全、经济安全、公众健康或安全领域（或同时对其中多个领域）带来负面影响。
bt_pert_zh: The federal government has identified 16 critical infrastructure sectors whose assets, systems, and networks, whether physical or virtual, could have a negative impact on safety, economic security, public health, or safety, or a combination of these.

en: I order that Californians working in these 16 critical infrastructure sectors may continue their work because of the importance of these sectors to Californians' health and well-being.
zh: 我命令，在这16个关键基础设施部门工作的加利福尼亚居民可以继续工作，因为这些部门对于实现加利福尼亚居民的健康和福祉具有重要意义。
pert_zh: 我命令，在这16个工作的加利福尼亚居民可以继续工作，因为这些部门对于实现加利福尼亚居民的健康和福祉具有重要意义。
bt_pert_zh: I am ordering that Californians working in these 16 sectors may continue to work because these sectors are essential to the health and well-being of Californians.

en: This Order is being issued to protect the public health of Californians.
zh: 发布本命令是为了保护加利福尼亚居民的公众健康。
pert_zh: 发布本命令是为了加利福尼亚居民的公众健康。
bt_pert_zh: This Order is issued in the interest of the public health of California residents.

en: The California Department of Public Health looks to establish consistency across the state in order to ensure that we mitigate the impact of COVID-19.
zh: 加利福尼亚州公共卫生部希望在全州实现协调一致，确保我们可以缓解COVID-19的影响。
pert_zh: 加利福尼亚州公共卫生部希望在全州实现协调一致，确保缓解COVID-19的影响。
bt_pert_zh: The California Department of Public Health wants to ensure a coordinated response across the state to mitigate the impacts of COVID-19.

en: Our goal is simple, we want to bend the curve, and disrupt the spread of the virus.
zh: 我们的目标很简单，即要让疫情曲线变平缓，阻止病毒的扩散。
pert_zh: 我们的目标很简单，即要让疫情曲线变平缓。
bt_pert_zh: Our goal is simple: to flatten the curve.

en: The supply chain must continue, and Californians must have access to such necessities as food, prescriptions, and health care.
zh: 必须保证供应链的持续运作，保证加利福尼亚居民可以获得食物、处方药和卫生保健服务等必需品。
pert_zh: 必须保证供应链的持续运作，加利福尼亚居民可以获得食物、处方药和卫生保健服务等必需品。
bt_pert_zh: Supply chains must continue to function so Californians can access essential goods such as food, prescription drugs, and health care services.

en: When people need to leave their homes or places of residence, whether to obtain or perform the functions above, or to otherwise facilitate authorized necessary activities, they should at all times practice social distancing.
zh: 当人们需要离开家或居住场所时，无论是为了获得或执行以上活动，还是为了通过其他方式完成经授权的必要活动，都应该始终保持社交距离。
pert_zh: 当人们需要离开家或居住场所时，无论是为了获得或执行以上活动，还是为了经授权的必要活动，都应该始终保持社交距离。
bt_pert_zh: When people need to leave their homes or places of residence, whether to obtain or perform the activities listed above or for authorized essential activities, social distancing should be maintained at all times.

en: 2) The healthcare delivery system shall prioritize services to serving those who are the sickest and shall prioritize resources, including personal protective equipment, for the providers providing direct care to them.
zh: 2) 卫生保健实施系统应优先治疗病情最严重的患者，并优先向直接为这些患者提供护理的医护人员提供资源，包括个人防护设备。
pert_zh: 卫生保健实施系统应治疗病情最严重的患者，并优先向直接为这些患者提供护理的医护人员提供资源，包括个人防护设备。
bt_pert_zh: Health care delivery systems should treat the sickest patients and prioritize resources, including personal protective equipment, to health care workers providing direct care to these patients.

en: 3) The Office of Emergency Services is directed to take necessary steps to ensure compliance with this Order.
zh: 3) 紧急服务办公室有权采取必要措施，确保对本命令的遵从。
pert_zh: 紧急服务办公室有权采取必要措施。
bt_pert_zh: The Office of Emergency Services has the authority to take necessary action.

en: 4) This Order shall be enforceable pursuant to California law, including, but not limited to, Government Code section 8665.
zh: 4) 本命令应根据加利福尼亚法律强制执行，包括但不限于政府法规第8665条。
pert_zh: 本命令应根据加利福尼亚法律强制执行。
bt_pert_zh: This Order shall be enforceable under California law.

en: IT IS FURTHER ORDERED that as soon as hereafter possible, this Order be filed in the Office of the Secretary of State and that widespread publicity and notice be given of this Order.
zh: 此外，我命令，尽快将本命令在州务卿办公室备案，并进行广泛宣传和公告。
pert_zh: 此外，尽快将本命令在州务卿办公室备案，并进行广泛宣传和公告。
bt_pert_zh: Furthermore, this Order shall be filed with the Office of the Secretary of State as expeditiously as possible and shall be widely publicized and published.

en: This Order is not intended to, and does not, create any rights or benefits, substantive or procedural, enforceable at law or in equity, against the State of California, its agencies, departments, entities, officers, employees, or any other person.
zh: 本命令无意也不会针对加利福尼亚州、其各机构、部门、实体、官员、雇员或任何其他人创设任何实质性或程序性、可依普通法或衡平法强制执行的任何权利或权益。
pert_zh: 本命令无意也不会针对加利福尼亚州、实体、官员、雇员或任何其他人创设任何实质性或程序性、可依普通法或衡平法强制执行的任何权利或权益。
bt_pert_zh: This Order is not intended to and does not create any right or benefit, substantive or procedural, enforceable at law or in equity against the State of California, its entities, officers, employees, or any other person.

en: IN WITNESS WHEREOF I have hereunto set my hand and caused the Great Seal of the State of California to be affixed this 19th day of March 2020.
zh: 为昭信守，我谨于2020年3月19日签署本命令并加盖加利福尼亚州大印。
pert_zh: 为昭信守，我于2020年3月19日签署本命令并加盖加利福尼亚州大印。
bt_pert_zh: IN WITNESS WHEREOF, I have signed this Order and affixed the Great Seal of the State of California this nineteenth day of March, two thousand two hundred and twenty.

en: The SARS-CoV-2 virus is the cause of COVID-19 (coronavirus disease 2019), a contagious respiratory disease that was first identified in December 2019, in Wuhan, Hubei, China.
zh: COVID-19（2019 冠状病毒病）由 SARS-CoV-2 病毒引起，是一种传染性呼吸道疾病，2019 年 12 月首先在中国湖北武汉得到确认。
pert_zh: COVID-19（2019 冠状病毒病）由 SARS-CoV-2 病毒引起，是一种传染性呼吸道疾病，2019 年 12 月首先在中国得到确认。
bt_pert_zh: COVID-19 (coronavirus disease 2019), caused by the SARS-CoV-2 virus, is a contagious respiratory illness that was first identified in China in December 2019.

en: The disease is a type of coronavirus, the same family that includes SARS, MERS, and some varieties of the common cold.
zh: 这是一种冠状病毒，同族病毒还有 SARS、MERS 和一些普通感冒变种。
pert_zh: 这是一种冠状病毒，同族病毒还有 SARS 和一些普通感冒变种。
bt_pert_zh: This is a coronavirus, a family of viruses that also includes SARS and some common cold variants.

en: It was declared a pandemic by the World Health Organization (WHO) on 11 March 2020.
zh: 2020 年 3 月 11 日，世界卫生组织 (WTO) 宣布该病为大流行病。
pert_zh: 2020 年 3 月 11 日，世界卫生组织 (WTO) 宣布大流行病。
bt_pert_zh: On March 11, 2020, the World Health Organization (WTO) declared a pandemic.

en: While much about COVID-19 is still unknown, preliminary data suggests that it is more virulent and contagious than the seasonal flu, and less virulent but more contagious than SARS and MERS.
zh: 尽管关于 COVID-19 我们还有很多未知的地方，但初步数据表明，该病毒比季节性流感的毒性和传染性更强，毒性弱于 SARS 和 MERS 但传染性更强。
pert_zh: 尽管关于 COVID-19 我们还有很多未知的地方，但初步数据表明，该病毒比季节性流感的毒性更强，毒性弱于 SARS 和 MERS 但传染性更强。
bt_pert_zh: While there is still much we don’t know about COVID-19, preliminary data suggest that the virus is more virulent than seasonal influenza and less virulent but more contagious than SARS and MERS.

en: Older people and those with underlying conditions are the most at risk of serious complications including death.
zh: 老年人以及患有基础性疾病的患者更容易出现严重的并发症，死亡率也更高。
pert_zh: 老年人更容易出现严重的并发症，死亡率也更高。
bt_pert_zh: Older people are more likely to develop serious complications and have a higher mortality rate.

en: Due to the spread of the disease, you are advised not to travel unless necessary, to avoid being infected, quarantined, or stranded by changing restrictions and cancelled flights.
zh: 因疾病还在传播，所以建议你除非必要不要出行，以避免被感染、被隔离，或因限制调整或航班取消而滞留。
pert_zh: 因疾病还在传播，所以建议你除非必要不要出行，以避免被感染。
bt_pert_zh: Because the disease is still spreading, it is recommended that you do not travel unless necessary to avoid infection.

en: Avoid crowded places whenever possible.
zh: 尽可能避免去人多的地方。
pert_zh: 尽可能避免人多的地方。
bt_pert_zh: Avoid crowded places as much as possible.

en: This is not just to protect you, but also those you come in contact with.
zh: 这不仅是为了保护你，也是为了保护接触你的人。
pert_zh: 这不仅是为了保护你，也是为了接触你的人。
bt_pert_zh: This is not only to protect you, but also for the people who come into contact with you.

en: As it happens, you probably aren't missing much by staying home, as many attractions around the world are closing their doors to avoid spreading the disease.
zh: 事实上你可能也无处可去，为了避免病毒扩散，全球很多景点都已关闭。
pert_zh: 事实上你可能也无处可去，全球很多景点都已关闭。
bt_pert_zh: In fact, you may have nowhere to go, as many attractions around the world are closed.

en: If you do need to travel, take precautions as you would for other infections: wash your hands frequently, avoid touching your face, cough and sneeze into your elbow or a tissue, and avoid contact with sick people.
zh: 如果确实需要出行，请像对待其他传染病一样采取预防措施：勤洗手、避免触摸脸部、咳嗽和打喷嚏时用肘部或纸巾捂住口鼻以及避免接触患者。
pert_zh: 如果确实需要出行，请像对待其他传染病一样采取预防措施：勤洗手、避免触摸脸部、咳嗽和打喷嚏时用肘部或纸巾捂住口鼻以及接触患者。
bt_pert_zh: If you do need to travel, take precautions as you would for any other infectious disease: wash your hands frequently, avoid touching your face, cover coughs and sneezes with your elbow or a tissue, and avoid contact with sick people.

en: Before traveling, read up on the extensive and fast-changing array of travel restrictions that have been imposed around the world.
zh: 出行前，建议先了解一下全球各地广泛施行且频繁变更的出行限制。
pert_zh: 出行前，建议了解一下全球各地广泛施行且频繁变更的出行限制。
bt_pert_zh: Before traveling, it is recommended to learn about the widespread and frequently changing travel restrictions around the world.

en: After travel, monitor your health and consider self-isolation for two weeks to avoid transmitting the disease to others.
zh: 出行回来后，要注意监测自己的健康状况，并考虑自我隔离两周，以避免将疾病传染给他人。
pert_zh: 出行回来后，要注意监测自己的健康状况，以避免将疾病传染给他人。
bt_pert_zh: After returning from a trip, be sure to monitor your health to avoid spreading the disease to others.

en: Transportation from long-distance passenger flights to local buses has been curtailed or completely shut down in many countries due to low demand or government orders.
zh: 在很多国家，受需求低或政府指令的影响，从长途客运航班到当地公共汽车的公交运输已被削减或完全停运。
pert_zh: 在很多国家，受需求低或政府指令的影响，从长途客运航班到公共汽车的公交运输已被削减或完全停运。
bt_pert_zh: In many countries, public transport, from long-distance passenger flights to buses, has been cut back or stopped entirely due to low demand or government directives.

en: Many international and regional borders are closed.
zh: 很多国际和区域边境被关闭。
pert_zh: 很多区域边境被关闭。
bt_pert_zh: Many regional borders have been closed.

en: If you are away from home, and especially if you are in another country, consider returning home as soon as possible; this may get even more difficult as restrictions continue to change.
zh: 如果你已经离家，尤其是到了其他国家，请考虑尽快回家；随着限制措施不断变化，后面再回家将越来越困难。
pert_zh: 如果你已经离家，请考虑尽快回家；随着限制措施不断变化，后面再回家将越来越困难。
bt_pert_zh: If you have already left home, please consider returning home as soon as possible; as restrictions continue to change, it will become increasingly difficult to return home.

en: In some cases it may simply not be possible, even if you're healthy and meet the legal requirements for entry.
zh: 某些情况下甚至完全无法回家，即使是身体健康且符合入境法律要求的情况下。
pert_zh: 某些情况下甚至完全无法回家，即使是身体健康且入境法律要求的情况下。
bt_pert_zh: In some cases, it is impossible to return home at all, even if you are in good health and required by entry laws.

en: If you can't find a way back to your country, contact your nearest embassy or consulate for assistance.
zh: 如果你回国无门，请向最近的大使馆或领事馆寻求帮助。
pert_zh: 如果你回国无门，请向大使馆或领事馆寻求帮助。
bt_pert_zh: If you have no way to return home, seek help from the embassy or consulate.

en: They may be able to organize an evacuation, identify non-regularly scheduled flights, or give you an emergency loan to pay for transport.
zh: 他们也许会组织撤离，确定不定期航班，或者为你提供紧急贷款以支付交通费用。
pert_zh: 他们也许会组织撤离，确定不定期航班，或者为你支付交通费用。
bt_pert_zh: They may be able to organise an evacuation, secure an unscheduled flight, or pay for your transport.

en: In case they can't, make preparations in case you need to stay where you are for an extended period.
zh: 如果他们也没有办法帮你回国，请做好长期停留在现居地的准备。
pert_zh: 如果他们也没有帮你回国，请做好长期停留在现居地的准备。
bt_pert_zh: If they don’t help you return home either, be prepared to stay in your current place of residence for a long time.

en: If you do find a way back home, be prepared that it may be expensive, inconvenient, and have unusual restrictions (such as no checked baggage).
zh: 如果你找到了回家的办法，也请做好准备，回家成本可能很高，可能非常不便，还可能受到不同寻常的限制（比如无法托运行李）。
pert_zh: 如果你找到了回家的办法，也请做好准备，回家成本可能很高，可能非常不便。
bt_pert_zh: If you find a way to get home, be prepared that it may be expensive and inconvenient.

en: As of early April 2020, the number of confirmed cases of COVID-19 is approaching one million.
zh: 截至 2020 年 4 月初，COVID-19 确诊病例已接近 100 万。
pert_zh: 截至 2020 年 COVID-19 确诊病例已接近 100 万。
bt_pert_zh: As of 2020, the number of confirmed cases of COVID-19 has approached 1 million.

en: Though the disease started in mainland China, it has spread around the world and China has fewer confirmed cases and deaths than several other countries.
zh: 尽管该病起源于中国大陆，但已扩散到世界各地，中国确诊病例和死亡病例反而少于几个国家。
pert_zh: 尽管该病起源于中国大陆，但已扩散到世界各地，确诊病例和死亡病例反而少于几个国家。
bt_pert_zh: Although the disease originated in mainland China, it has spread around the world, with fewer confirmed cases and deaths than in a few countries.

en: Europe is the new epicenter of the pandemic.
zh: 欧洲已成为此次疫情的新中心。
pert_zh: 欧洲已成为疫情的新中心。
bt_pert_zh: Europe has become the new epicenter of the epidemic.

en: All but a handful of countries have reported at least one case, with the highest numbers of reported cases in the United States, Spain, Italy, Germany, France, mainland China, Iran, and the United Kingdom.
zh: 除少数国家外，全球大部分国家均报告出现确诊病例，其中报告病例最多的国家有美国、西班牙、意大利、德国、法国、中国大陆、伊朗和英国。
pert_zh: 除少数国家外，全球大部分国家均报告出现确诊病例，其中报告病例最多的国家有美国、西班牙、意大利、德国、中国大陆、伊朗和英国。
bt_pert_zh: With the exception of a few countries, most countries in the world have reported confirmed cases, with the United States, Spain, Italy, Germany, mainland China, Iran and the United Kingdom reporting the most cases.

en: Local transmission is established in many countries in all major inhabited regions of the world except some Pacific island nations.
zh: 除一些太平洋岛国外，许多国家在所有主要人居地区均确认区域传播现象。
pert_zh: 除一些太平洋岛国外，许多国家在所有人居地区均确认区域传播现象。
bt_pert_zh: Many countries have confirmed regional transmission in all populated areas, with the exception of some Pacific island countries.

en: (See updates from the WHO.)
zh: （详见 WHO 更新内容。）
pert_zh: （详见 WHO）
bt_pert_zh: (See WHO for details)

en: The full extent of the spread is uncertain, due in part to limited testing.
zh: 全部传播范围还尚未确定，部分原因在于检测能力有限。
pert_zh: 全部传播范围还尚未确定，原因在于检测能力有限。
bt_pert_zh: The full extent of the spread has yet to be determined because of limited testing capabilities.

en: Many countries are experiencing a severe shortage of test kits, and the authorities have not been able to test everybody who is at high risk, so the real number of cases is probably much higher than the official one.
zh: 很多国家都面临着检测工具严重短缺的问题，公共卫生机构也无法对所有高风险人群进行检测，因此实际病例数可能远远高于官方数据。
pert_zh: 很多国家都面临着检测工具严重短缺的问题，公共卫生机构也无法对所有高风险人群进行检测，因此病例数可能远远高于官方数据。
bt_pert_zh: Many countries are facing severe shortages of testing kits, and public health agencies are unable to test all high-risk groups, so the number of cases may be much higher than the official data.
