en: Countries also differ in their testing and reporting practices, so comparisons of the number of reported cases do not tell the full story of how the epidemic has progressed in different areas.
zh: 各国采用的检测与报告方式也有所不同，因此仅仅比较病例数量并不能说明疫情在不同地区的传播程度。
pert_zh: 各国采用的检测与报告方式也有所不同，因此比较病例数量并不能说明疫情在不同地区的传播程度。
bt_pert_zh: Countries also use different testing and reporting methods, so comparing the number of cases does not reflect the extent of the epidemic in different regions.

en: The virus is transmitted through respiratory droplets and through objects.
zh: 该病毒通过呼吸道飞沫和物体传播。
pert_zh: 该病毒通过呼吸道飞沫传播。
bt_pert_zh: The virus is spread through respiratory droplets.

en: The coronavirus is a relatively large virus, meaning it is not truly airborne: it will settle down in respiratory droplets.
zh: 这种冠状病毒相对较大，因此并不会真正通过空气传播，而是附着在呼吸道飞沫中传播。
pert_zh: 这种冠状病毒相对较大，因此会附着在呼吸道飞沫中传播。
bt_pert_zh: This coronavirus is relatively large, so it spreads in respiratory droplets.

en: Staying two metres (six feet) away from other people is usually enough to prevent transmission through this route.
zh: 人与人之间保持 2 米（6 英尺）距离通常就足以阻断这条传播路径。
pert_zh: 人与人之间保持 2 米距离通常就足以阻断这条传播路径。
bt_pert_zh: Keeping 2 metres between people is usually enough to stop this route of transmission.

en: Transmission from objects can happen, for example, if someone sneezes, touches a doorknob, and then other people touch the doorknob and then touch their faces.
zh: 如果有人打了喷嚏，又摸了门把手，随后其他人也摸了该门把手，然后又摸了自己的脸，则可能发生物体传播。
pert_zh: 如果有人打了喷嚏，摸了门把手，随后其他人也摸了该门把手，然后又摸了自己的脸，则可能发生物体传播。
bt_pert_zh: Object-to-object transmission could occur if someone sneezes, touches a doorknob, and someone else subsequently touches that doorknob and then touches their face.

en: The SARS-CoV-2 virus may last on cardboard for up to 24 hours and on plastic for up to 3 days.
zh: SARS-CoV-2 病毒在纸板上最长可存活 24 小时，在塑料上最长可存活 3 天。
pert_zh: SARS-CoV-2 病毒在纸板最长可存活 24 小时，在塑料最长可存活 3 天。
bt_pert_zh: The SARS-CoV-2 virus can survive on cardboard for up to 24 hours and on plastic for up to 3 days.

en: Transmission via the fecal–oral route may also be possible.
zh: 除此之外，还可能通过粪口传播。
pert_zh: 除此之外，可能通过粪口传播。
bt_pert_zh: In addition, it may be transmitted through fecal-oral route.

en: Evidence suggests that COVID-19 is contagious even without symptoms, though to what extent is still being investigated.
zh: 有证据表明 COVID-19 患者即使无症状也具有传染性，其传染程度仍在调查中。
pert_zh: 有证据表明 COVID-19 患者即使无症状具有传染性，其传染程度仍在调查中。
bt_pert_zh: There is evidence that people with COVID-19 can be contagious even when they are asymptomatic, but the extent of this is still under investigation.

en: Common symptoms include a fever, dry cough, and fatigue.
zh: 常见症状有发热、干咳和乏力。
pert_zh: 常见症状有发热、乏力。
bt_pert_zh: Common symptoms include fever and fatigue.

en: Other less common symptoms include shortness of breath, a sore throat, headache, muscle pain, or sputum production.
zh: 另外一些不太常见的症状有气促、喉咙痛、头痛、肌肉疼痛或咳痰。
pert_zh: 另外一些不太常见的症状有气促、头痛、肌肉疼痛或咳痰。
bt_pert_zh: Other less common symptoms include shortness of breath, headache, muscle aches, or a cough with phlegm.

en: Some patients have very mild symptoms, similar to a cold.
zh: 有些患者症状较轻，类似感冒。
pert_zh: 有些患者类似感冒。
bt_pert_zh: Some patients feel similar to having a cold.

en: Serious complications include pneumonia, acute respiratory distress syndrome, and multi-organ failure leading to disability or death.
zh: 另一些患者则可能伴有严重的并发症，包括肺炎、急性呼吸窘迫综合征和导致残疾或死亡的多器官衰竭。
pert_zh: 另一些患者则可能伴有严重的并发症，包括急性呼吸窘迫综合征和导致残疾或死亡的多器官衰竭。
bt_pert_zh: Others may experience severe complications, including acute respiratory distress syndrome and multiple organ failure leading to disability or death.

en: About 80% of infections result in mild symptoms, while the remaining may result in hospitalization.
zh: 大约 80% 的感染症状较轻，其余感染可能导致患者入院。
pert_zh: 大约 80% 的感染症状较轻。
bt_pert_zh: About 80% of infections have mild symptoms.

en: Case fatality rate is estimated at 1-3% of infected individuals, most of whom are elderly with underlying health conditions.
zh: 病死率约为 1-3%，其中大部分为存在基础健康问题的老年人。
pert_zh: 病死率约为 1-3%，其中为存在基础健康问题的老年人。
bt_pert_zh: The case fatality rate is about 1-3%, including elderly people with underlying health problems.

en: The fatality rate is much higher for those over 70 but significantly lower for those under 40.
zh: 70 岁以上患者的死亡率较高，但 40 岁以下的死亡率非常低。
pert_zh: 70 岁以上患者的死亡率较高，但死亡率非常低。
bt_pert_zh: The mortality rate is higher in patients over 70 years of age, but is very low.

en: Those most at risk of COVID-19 infection and serious complications are the elderly and those with weakened immune systems or underlying health conditions like cardiovascular disease, diabetes, hypertension, chronic respiratory disease, and cancer.
zh: COVID-19 感染和严重并发症风险最高的是老年人、免疫力低下者或患有心血管疾病、糖尿病、高血压、慢性呼吸道疾病和癌症等基础性疾病的人群。
pert_zh: COVID-19 感染和严重并发症风险最高的是老年人、免疫力低下者或患有心血管疾病、糖尿病、高血压、慢性呼吸道疾病和基础性疾病的人群。
bt_pert_zh: Those at highest risk for COVID-19 infection and severe complications are the elderly, those with weakened immune systems, or those with cardiovascular disease, diabetes, hypertension, chronic respiratory disease, and underlying medical conditions.

en: Not many cases are reported in children and most of these are mild or moderate, though a significant fraction do get pneumonia.
zh: 儿童报告病例并不多，且大部分儿童病例症状为轻度或中度，不过确实有很大一部分会发展为肺炎。
pert_zh: 儿童报告病例并不多，且大部分儿童病例症状为轻度或中度，但确实有很大一部分会发展为肺炎。
bt_pert_zh: There are not many reported cases in children, and most cases in children have mild or moderate symptoms, but a large proportion do develop pneumonia.

en: Occupationally, health care workers have higher risk compared to others with clusters of disease among workers and in health care settings.
zh: 从职业角度来看，相比其他工作人员之间或医疗环境中出现疾病集群的人员，医疗工作者所面临的风险更高。
pert_zh: 从职业角度来看，相比其他工作人员之间或医疗环境中出现疾病集群的人员，医疗工作者所面临的更高。
bt_pert_zh: From an occupational perspective, healthcare workers face higher risks than other workers of disease clustering among themselves or in healthcare settings.

en: The time between being exposed to the virus and the emergence of symptoms (incubation period) is typically between 2 and 14 days, though there has been one reported case in China where symptoms appeared 27 days after exposure.
zh: 从接触病毒到出现症状一般间隔（潜伏期）2-14 天，不过中国曾报告一例接触病毒后 27 天才出现症状的病例。
pert_zh: 从接触病毒到出现症状一般间隔（潜伏期）2-14 天，不过一例接触病毒后 27 天才出现症状的病例。
bt_pert_zh: The general interval (incubation period) from exposure to the virus to the onset of symptoms is 2-14 days, but there has been a case where symptoms did not appear until 27 days after exposure.

en: As of February 2020, the period of infectiousness is unknown, but is likely most significant when people are symptomatic.
zh: 截至 2020 年 2 月，传染期尚不清楚，但出现症状后的传染性很可能最强。
pert_zh: 截至 2020 年 2 月，传染期尚不清楚，但传染性很可能最强。
bt_pert_zh: As of February 2020, the infectious period is unknown, but it is likely to be most contagious.

en: There is evidence of transmission from people who don't have symptoms, although to what extent is still being investigated.
zh: 有证据显示，无症状者也会传播病毒，尽管其传播程度目前还在调查当中。
pert_zh: 有证据显示，无症状者也会传播病毒。
bt_pert_zh: There is evidence that people without symptoms can also spread the virus.

en: It is unclear whether it is possible to be reinfected with the virus after recovering from it the first time around.
zh: 目前尚不清楚首次染病康复后是否还具有再次被病毒感染的可能性。
pert_zh: 目前尚不清楚染病康复后是否还具有再次被病毒感染的可能性。
bt_pert_zh: It is not yet clear whether it is possible to be infected with the virus again after recovering from the disease.

en: Long-term effects for people who have recovered remain unclear, but there is evidence of reduced lung capacity in some recovered patients.
zh: 病毒对已康复群体的长期影响也尚不清楚，但有证据表明部分康复患者的肺活量有所降低。
pert_zh: 病毒对已康复群体的长期影响也尚不清楚，但有证据表明康复患者的肺活量有所降低。
bt_pert_zh: The long-term effects of the virus on those who have recovered are also unclear, but there is evidence that lung capacity is reduced in recovered patients.

en: Testing for the virus usually consists of a swab inserted through the nose or a throat swab which is analysed in a laboratory for the virus.
zh: 病毒检测方式通常为在实验室分析鼻拭子或咽拭子，确定是否感染了病毒。
pert_zh: 病毒检测方式通常为在实验室分析鼻拭子或咽拭子，确定感染了病毒。
bt_pert_zh: Virus testing usually involves analyzing a nasal or throat swab in a laboratory to confirm infection with the virus.

en: The current "gold standard" test involves extracting the genetic material from the sample and analysing it for known genetic markers of the virus.
zh: 当前“黄金标准”检测涉及从样本中提取遗传物质，并进行分析，以寻找已知的病毒遗传标记。
pert_zh: 当前“黄金标准”涉及从样本中提取遗传物质，并进行分析，以寻找已知的病毒遗传标记。
bt_pert_zh: The current “gold standard” involves extracting genetic material from a sample and analyzing it to look for known genetic markers of the virus.

en: There is no established test assessing for the virus or antibodies in the blood, although tests are being developed.
zh: 目前尚无通过血液评估病毒或抗体的检测方法，不过检测方法已在开发中。
pert_zh: 目前尚无通过血液评估病毒或抗体的检测方法，不过已在开发中。
bt_pert_zh: There are currently no tests to assess the virus or antibodies in the blood, but they are being developed.

en: There is no test to establish immunity to the virus.
zh: 没有确定病毒免疫的检测。
pert_zh: 没有确定免疫的检测。
bt_pert_zh: There is no test to determine immunity.

en: Many governments around the world have advised their citizens not to travel unnecessarily amid the pandemic.
zh: 各国政府均建议公民在疫情期间取消所有不必要的出行。
pert_zh: 各国政府建议公民取消所有不必要的出行。
bt_pert_zh: Governments around the world are advising citizens to cancel all non-essential travel.

en: Lots of airlines and package holidays are making it easy for you by waiving cancellation and change fees.
zh: 很多航空公司和度假套餐均已免除取消和变更手续费，方便人们取消出行活动。
pert_zh: 很多航空公司已免除取消和变更手续费，方便人们取消出行活动。
bt_pert_zh: Many airlines have waived cancellation and change fees to make it easier for people to cancel their travel plans.

en: Particularly avoid cruise ship travel.
zh: 尤其要避免乘坐游轮。
pert_zh: 尤其避免乘坐游轮。
bt_pert_zh: Especially avoid cruise ships.

en: Older travelers and those with underlying health conditions are most at risk and should avoid travel that puts them at risk, such as long plane flights, visits to crowded places, and especially cruises, even outside of severely affected areas.
zh: 老年旅行者和患有基础性疾病的患者风险最大，应避免有风险的行程，如乘坐长途飞机或前往人群密集场所，尤其要避免乘坐游轮，即使不在疫情严重地区。
pert_zh: 老年旅行者和风险最大，应避免有风险的行程，如乘坐长途飞机或前往人群密集场所，尤其要避免乘坐游轮，即使不在疫情严重地区。
bt_pert_zh: Older travelers and those most at risk should avoid risky trips, such as long-distance flights or crowded places, and especially avoid cruise ships, even if they are not in areas with severe epidemics.

en: In affected areas, most experts recommend a practice known as social distancing.
zh: 在疫区，大部分专家建议保持社交距离。
pert_zh: 在疫区，大部分专家建议社交距离。
bt_pert_zh: In epidemic areas, most experts recommend social distancing.

en: This means minimising contact with others by keeping a distance of six feet or two meters from them and avoiding gathering together in groups.
zh: 也就是与他人保持 6 英尺或 2 米的距离并避免聚集，以尽可能减少与他人的接触。
pert_zh: 也就是与他人保持 6 英尺或 2 米的距离，并避免聚集，以尽可能减少与他人的接触。
bt_pert_zh: That means staying 6 feet or 2 meters away from others and avoiding gatherings to minimize contact with others.

en: Some areas permit small groups; others prohibit all group gatherings.
zh: 有的地区允许小团体聚集；有的地区则严禁各类聚集。
pert_zh: 有的地区允许小团体；有的地区则严禁各类聚集。
bt_pert_zh: Some areas allow small groups; others strictly prohibit all kinds of gatherings.

en: Measures you are encouraged to take include working from home whenever possible, avoiding crowds and avoiding leaving your home unless absolutely necessary.
zh: 建议措施包括尽可能居家办公，除非绝对必要，尽可能避开人群并避免离家外出。
pert_zh: 建议措施包括尽可能居家办公，尽可能避开人群并避免离家外出。
bt_pert_zh: Recommended measures include working from home as much as possible, avoiding crowds and avoiding leaving home as much as possible.

en: If you must go out, try to stay at least 2 meters (6 feet) away from other people.
zh: 如果必须外出，尽可能与他人保持至少 2 米（6 英尺）的距离。
pert_zh: 如果必须外出，与他人保持至少 2 米（6 英尺）的距离。
bt_pert_zh: If you must go out, stay at least 2 meters (6 feet) away from other people.

en: In many places these measures are required.
zh: 很多地区要求遵守这些措施。
pert_zh: 很多地区要求这些措施。
bt_pert_zh: Many regions require these measures.

en: Follow hygiene practices like for flu prevention.
zh: 像预防流感一样，养成良好的卫生习惯。
pert_zh: 像预防流感一样，养成良好的习惯。
bt_pert_zh: Just like preventing the flu, develop good habits.

en: Frequently wash your hands with soap and warm water, and then dry your hands on a clean towel.
zh: 勤用肥皂和温水洗手，用干净毛巾擦干。
pert_zh: 勤用肥皂和温水洗手，用毛巾擦干。
bt_pert_zh: Wash your hands frequently with soap and warm water and towel dry.

en: As coronaviruses are enveloped viruses, washing your hands with soap kills the virus by disrupting the mostly fat-based viral envelope.
zh: 冠状病毒是一种包膜病毒，用肥皂洗手可以破坏主要由脂肪组成的病毒包膜，从而杀死病毒。
pert_zh: 冠状病毒是一种包膜病毒，用肥皂洗手可以破坏主要由脂肪组成的。
bt_pert_zh: The coronavirus is an enveloped virus, which is mainly made up of fat, and washing your hands with soap can destroy it.

en: Effective hand washing requires rubbing your hands for at least 20 seconds.
zh: 搓洗至少 20 秒才能达到洗手的效果。
pert_zh: 搓洗至少 20 秒洗手的效果。
bt_pert_zh: Scrub for at least 20 seconds to wash your hands.

en: Drying your washed hands physically removes some germs from your skin (so don't skip that step, and don't share towels).
zh: 洗手后用毛巾擦干可有效去除皮肤上的一些细菌（所以不要跳过此步，也不要与他人共用毛巾）。
pert_zh: 洗手后用毛巾擦干可有效去除皮肤上的一些细菌。
bt_pert_zh: Washing your hands and drying them with a towel can effectively remove some bacteria from your skin.

en: If soap and water are not available, then use a >60% alcohol-based hand sanitizer.
zh: 如果无法获得肥皂及水，可以用浓度超过 60% 的酒精洗手液洗手。
pert_zh: 如果无法获得肥皂及水，可以用酒精洗手液洗手。
bt_pert_zh: If soap and water are not available, you can wash your hands with an alcohol-based hand sanitizer.

en: Alcohol is a quick germ-killer, but it's not quite instant, so this still requires the same 20 seconds of rubbing your hands together, making sure that every single scrap of skin gets wet, and then you have to wait about another minute, for the alcohol to completely dry.
zh: 酒精能够快速杀死细菌，但并非即时有效，所以也需要搓洗至少 20 秒，确保每一块皮肤都被浸湿，洗后至少等待一分钟，直至酒精晾干。
pert_zh: 酒精能够快速杀死细菌，但并非即时有效，需要搓洗至少 20 秒，确保每一块皮肤都被浸湿，洗后至少等待一分钟，直至酒精晾干。
bt_pert_zh: Alcohol can kill bacteria quickly, but it is not effective instantly. You need to scrub for at least 20 seconds to make sure every piece of skin is soaked. Wait at least one minute after washing until the alcohol dries.

en: Avoid touching your eyes, nose and mouth with your hands.
zh: 请勿用手触摸眼鼻口部。
pert_zh: 请勿用手触摸眼口部。
bt_pert_zh: Do not touch your eyes or mouth with your hands.

en: Most people touch their faces every few minutes, all day long.
zh: 大部分人时不时会摸摸自己的脸。
pert_zh: 大部分人时不时会自己的脸。
bt_pert_zh: Most people look at their face from time to time.

en: Try to do this less, and try to wash your hands before touching your face.
zh: 请尽量减少触摸脸部，摸脸前请清洗双手。
pert_zh: 请尽量减少触摸脸部。
bt_pert_zh: Please minimize touching your face.

en: Also, try to avoid touching surfaces you don't have to touch in the first place, at least with your bare hands.
zh: 此外，尽量避免触摸不必要的表面，至少应避免直接用手触摸。
pert_zh: 此外，尽量避免触摸不必要的表面。
bt_pert_zh: Also, try to avoid touching unnecessary surfaces.

en: Cough and sneeze into your elbow or a tissue, and then immediately throw away the tissue and wash your hands.
zh: 咳嗽和打喷嚏时应用手肘或纸巾捂住口鼻，随后应立即扔掉纸巾并清洗双手。
pert_zh: 咳嗽和打喷嚏时应用手肘或纸巾捂住口鼻，随后应立即清洗双手。
bt_pert_zh: When coughing or sneezing, cover your mouth and nose with your elbow or a tissue, and wash your hands immediately afterwards.

en: Don't stand or sit near people who might be sick.
zh: 不要站在或坐在可能患者旁边。
pert_zh: 不要坐在可能患者旁边。
bt_pert_zh: Do not sit next to a possible patient.

en: Stay at least one meter – and ideally two meters (six feet) – away.
zh: 与他人至少保持 1 米距离，最好是 2 米（6 英尺）。
pert_zh: 与他人至少保持 1 米距离。
bt_pert_zh: Keep at least 1 meter away from other people.

en: As a quick way to eyeball this distance, imagine that you and the other person both reached your hands towards each other.
zh: 为简单目测这一距离，可以想象与对方一起伸出手互够。
pert_zh: 为简单目测这一距离，可以想象与对方一起互够。
bt_pert_zh: To easily estimate this distance, you can imagine reaching out to each other.

en: Could you touch the other person's hand without taking a step towards that person?
zh: 站立不动是否可以够到对方的手？
pert_zh: 站立不动可以够到对方的手？
bt_pert_zh: Can you reach the other person's hand while standing still?

en: If the answer is yes, then you're too close.
zh: 如果可以，则表明距离太近。
pert_zh: 如果可以，则距离太近。
bt_pert_zh: If you can, then the distance is too close.

en: Clean objects and surfaces that a lot of people touch, such as doorknobs, phones, and television remotes with regular household cleaner.
zh: 用普通家用清洁剂清洁多人接触过的物体和表面，如门把手、电话和电视遥控器。
pert_zh: 用普通清洁剂清洁多人接触过的物体，如门把手和电话。
bt_pert_zh: Use a regular cleaner to clean objects that are touched by multiple people, such as doorknobs and telephones.

en: Disinfect the surfaces with a suitable disinfectant, such as diluted household bleach.
zh: 用适当的消毒剂进行表面消毒，如稀释的家用漂白剂。
pert_zh: 用适当的消毒剂进行消毒，如稀释的家用漂白剂。
bt_pert_zh: Disinfect with an appropriate disinfectant, such as diluted household bleach.

en: Stay home when you are sick, and avoid contact with other people until your symptoms are gone.
zh: 万一生病要居家隔离，在症状消失前应避免接触他人。
pert_zh: 万一生病要居家隔离，应避免接触他人。
bt_pert_zh: If you are sick and need to be quarantined at home, you should avoid contact with others.

en: Do not share personal items that come into contact with saliva, such as toothbrushes, eating utensils, drinks, water bottles, and towels.
zh: 不要与他人共用可能会沾染唾液的个人物品，如牙刷、餐具、饮料、水杯和毛巾。
pert_zh: 不要与他人共用可能会沾染唾液的物品，如饮料、水杯和毛巾。
bt_pert_zh: Do not share items that may be contaminated with saliva, such as drinks, cups, and towels.

en: The practice of serving yourself from a common plate with your own chopsticks, common in China, should be avoided.
zh: 在中国，常会出现多人用筷子共食一道菜的现象，这种用餐习惯应避免。
pert_zh: 在中国，常会出现多人用筷子共食一道菜，这种用餐习惯应避免。
bt_pert_zh: In China, it is common for many people to share a dish using chopsticks. This dining habit should be avoided.

en: Greet people without touching them.
zh: 打招呼应采用无接触方式。
pert_zh: 打招呼采用无接触方式。
bt_pert_zh: Greetings are contactless.

en: Avoid hugs, kisses, handshakes, fist bumps, and any other contact.
zh: 避免拥抱、亲吻、握手、碰拳和任何其他接触。
pert_zh: 避免拥抱、亲吻、握手和任何其他接触。
bt_pert_zh: Avoid hugging, kissing, handshaking, and any other contact.

en: If it's impossible to avoid contact, then wash your hands both before and after.
zh: 如果没有办法避免接触，则接触前后要清洗双手。
pert_zh: 如果没有办法避免接触，则清洗双手。
bt_pert_zh: If contact cannot be avoided, wash your hands.

en: It won't protect you from the coronavirus, but it will partially protect you from the flu, which remains a greater risk than COVID-19 in many areas.
zh: 这种做法无法避免感染新型冠状病毒，但有助于预防流感。在很多地方，流感的感染风险依然高于 COVID-19。
pert_zh: 这种做法无法避免感染新型冠状病毒，但有助于预防流感。在很多地方，感染风险依然高于 COVID-19。
bt_pert_zh: This won’t protect you from contracting the novel coronavirus, but it will help prevent the flu, which in many places remains a higher risk than COVID-19.

en: This also saves you from unnecessary worry if you get the flu and think it might be the coronavirus.
zh: 这样也可避免一些不必要的担忧，比如患流感后误以为是冠状病毒感染。
pert_zh: 这样也可避免一些不必要的担忧。
bt_pert_zh: This can also avoid some unnecessary worries.

en: If you are elderly or otherwise in a high-risk group and can be vaccinated for pneumonia, get that vaccination.
zh: 如果你是老年人或其他高危人群，可以接种肺炎疫苗时应当接种。
pert_zh: 如果你是老年人或其他高危人群，可以接种肺炎疫苗应当接种。
bt_pert_zh: If you are an elderly person or in another high-risk group, you should get the pneumonia vaccine.

en: It won't protect you from viral pneumonia from COVID-19, but some COVID-19 patients have died of bacterial pneumonia that attacked their weakened lungs, so a pneumonia vaccination could save your life.
zh: 虽然无法避免你感染 COVID-19，但部分 COVID-19 患者实际上死于攻击虚弱肺部的细菌性肺炎，所以接种肺炎疫苗在一定程度上也可挽救你的生命。
pert_zh: 虽然无法避免你感染 COVID-19，但部分 COVID-19 患者实际上死于攻击虚弱肺部的细菌性肺炎，所以接种肺炎疫苗在一定程度上也可挽救生命。
bt_pert_zh: While it won’t protect you from contracting COVID-19, some COVID-19 patients actually die from bacterial pneumonia that attacks weakened lungs, so getting the pneumonia vaccine could also save lives to a certain extent.

en: Wearing masks is recommended for those who are suspected of carrying of disease and those who are in close contact with those infected.
zh: 对于那些疑似携带病毒或密切接触过被感染者的群体，建议佩戴口罩。
pert_zh: 对于疑似携带病毒或密切接触过被感染者的群体，建议佩戴口罩。
bt_pert_zh: It is recommended that people who are suspected of carrying the virus or have had close contact with infected people wear masks.

en: For those who are asymptomatic, the WHO does not recommend masks, though some national governments do.
zh: 对于无症状群体，WHO 不建议佩戴口罩，但一些国家政府会建议佩戴口罩。
pert_zh: 对于无症状群体，WHO 建议佩戴口罩，但一些国家政府会建议佩戴口罩。
bt_pert_zh: For asymptomatic groups, WHO recommends wearing masks, but some national governments recommend wearing masks.

en: Wearing a mask of some kind is required in some countries and cities in an effort to reduce community transmission.
zh: 为减少社区传播，一些国家和城市会要求佩戴某种类型的口罩。
pert_zh: 为减少社区传播，一些国家和城市会要求佩戴口罩。
bt_pert_zh: To reduce community transmission, some countries and cities require the wearing of masks.

en: There are worldwide shortages of surgical masks.
zh: 现在全球均面临医用外科口罩紧缺现象。
pert_zh: 现在全球医用外科口罩紧缺现象。
bt_pert_zh: There is currently a global shortage of medical surgical masks.

en: If you do wear a mask, make sure to use it correctly.
zh: 如果佩戴口罩，请确保正确佩戴。
pert_zh: 如果佩戴口罩，请确保佩戴。
bt_pert_zh: If you wear a mask, make sure you wear it.

en: The mask should cover your nose and mouth and fit without gaps.
zh: 口罩应遮住口鼻，且应大小匹配，避免留缝。
pert_zh: 口罩应遮住口鼻，避免留缝。
bt_pert_zh: The mask should cover the mouth and nose and avoid leaving gaps.

en: Wash your hands before putting on the mask and avoid touching the mask while wearing it.
zh: 戴口罩前要洗手，戴口罩后要避免触摸口罩。
pert_zh: 戴口罩前要洗手，戴口罩后避免触摸口罩。
bt_pert_zh: Wash your hands before wearing a mask and avoid touching the mask after wearing it.

en: If you do touch it, wash your hands immediately afterwards.
zh: 如果触摸了口罩，触摸后应立即洗手。
pert_zh: 如果触摸了口罩，应立即洗手。
bt_pert_zh: If you touch the mask, wash your hands immediately.

en: When the mask becomes damp, discard and replace it.
zh: 口罩潮湿后，应丢弃并更换。
pert_zh: 口罩潮湿应丢弃并更换。
bt_pert_zh: Discard and replace the mask if it is wet.

en: Remove it from the back, throw it away, and then wash your hands.
zh: 从后面取下口罩并丢弃，然后洗手。
pert_zh: 从后面取下口罩并丢弃，洗手。
bt_pert_zh: Remove the mask from behind and discard, wash your hands.

en: Remember that masks are not a substitute for good hygiene: continue to wash your hands frequently.
zh: 请记住，即使带了口罩，也要保持良好的卫生习惯：继续勤洗手。
pert_zh: 请记住，即使带了口罩，要保持良好的卫生习惯：继续勤洗手。
bt_pert_zh: Remember to maintain good hygiene habits even when wearing a mask: Continue to wash your hands frequently.

en: Don't stock up on masks if you don't need them.
zh: 如果不需要口罩，请不要囤积。
pert_zh: 如果不需要口罩，请囤积。
bt_pert_zh: If you don’t need masks, stock up.

en: Mask shortages mean that healthcare workers are having trouble getting a hold of masks, which puts everyone at risk.
zh: 口罩紧缺意味着医疗人员也难以获得口罩，这将提高所有人的风险等级。
pert_zh: 口罩紧缺意味着医疗人员也难以获得口罩。
bt_pert_zh: The shortage of masks means that medical staff are also struggling to obtain them.

en: That includes N95 respirators, which are not recommended for the general public – these are specialist equipment which must be fitted to be optimally effective.
zh: 其中包括不推荐普通大众使用的 N95 口罩，这是一种专业防护装备，旨在发挥最佳效果。
pert_zh: 其中包括 N95 口罩，这是一种专业防护装备，旨在发挥最佳效果。
bt_pert_zh: These include N95 masks, a specialized piece of protective gear designed to work optimally.

en: Leave them for healthcare workers.
zh: 请将这类口罩留给医疗人员。
pert_zh: 请将口罩留给医疗人员。
bt_pert_zh: Please save the masks for medical personnel.

en: Avoid crowded areas, especially enclosed areas without much air circulation, such as conferences, performances, shopping malls, public transportation, and religious services.
zh: 避免去人多的地方，尤其是空气流通不畅的封闭区域，如会议室、表演场所、购物中心、公共交通工具和宗教礼拜场所。
pert_zh: 避免去人多的地方，尤其是空气流通不畅的封闭区域，如会议室、表演场所、购物中心、宗教礼拜场所。
bt_pert_zh: Avoid crowded places, especially enclosed areas with poor air circulation, such as meeting rooms, performance venues, shopping malls, and places of worship.

en: Events which involve a large scale gathering of people, from religious pilgrimages to music concerts, are being canceled worldwide, in an effort to contain the spread of the virus.
zh: 从宗教朝圣到音乐会，全球已取消各种大规模人群聚集活动，以努力控制病毒的扩散。
pert_zh: 从宗教朝圣到音乐会，全球已取消各种大规模活动，以努力控制病毒的扩散。
bt_pert_zh: From religious pilgrimages to concerts, large-scale events have been canceled around the world in an effort to control the spread of the virus.

en: Tourist attractions, businesses, and transportation may be closed, especially in affected countries.
zh: 旅游景点、商家和交通运输可能均已关闭，尤其是在疫情国家。
pert_zh: 旅游景点、商家和交通运输可能关闭，尤其是在疫情国家。
bt_pert_zh: Tourist attractions, businesses, and transportation may close, especially in affected countries.

en: Some canceled events, especially performances, sporting events, and classes, are being moved online, which means you can experience them without traveling.
zh: 一些已取消的活动，尤其是表演、体育赛事和课程，已转移到网上，人们不用出行也可体验。
pert_zh: 一些已取消的活动，尤其是表演、体育赛事和课程，人们不用出行也可体验。
bt_pert_zh: Some of the canceled events, especially performances, sporting events and classes, are things people can experience without traveling.

en: At petrol/gas stations, use gloves or wipe down the handle with a disinfectant wipe if you can.
zh: 在加油站加油时，请尽可能使用手套或消毒抹布擦拭把手。
pert_zh: 在加油站加油时，请尽可能使用手套擦拭把手。
bt_pert_zh: When refueling at a gas station, wipe the handles with gloves whenever possible.

en: After filling up, clean your hands with hand sanitizer.
zh: 加满油后，请用洗手液洗手。
pert_zh: 加满油后，请用手。
bt_pert_zh: After filling up, use your hands.

en: The U.S. and Canadian governments recommend avoiding travel by cruise ship.
zh: 美国和加拿大政府建议避免乘坐游轮出行。
pert_zh: 美国和加拿大政府建议乘坐游轮出行。
bt_pert_zh: The US and Canadian governments recommend against traveling by cruise ship.

en: Infections spread easily on board, and medical care is limited.
zh: 船上极易发生传染，而且医疗条件有限。
pert_zh: 船上极易发生传染，医疗条件有限。
bt_pert_zh: Infections are extremely likely to occur on board ships and medical facilities are limited.

en: Amid a cruise ship outbreak, quarantines and docking are challenging partly due to the large number of people aboard.
zh: 如果在游轮上爆发疫情，鉴于载客人数众多，隔离和停靠均面临挑战。
pert_zh: 如果在游轮上爆发疫情，鉴于载客人数众多，隔离停靠均面临挑战。
bt_pert_zh: If an outbreak were to occur on a cruise ship, quarantine and docking would be challenging given the large number of passengers.

en: Even cruise ships without confirmed cases have been denied permission to dock due to virus fears, and in the high-profile case of the Diamond Princess in Japan, hundreds of people were infected on the ship.
zh: 即使是船上无确诊病例，一些码头也会因害怕病毒而拒绝停靠，在日本备受关注的钻石公主号事件中，有数百名乘客被感染。
pert_zh: 即使是船上无确诊病例，一些码头也会因害怕病毒而拒绝停靠，在备受关注的钻石公主号事件中，有数百名乘客被感染。
bt_pert_zh: Even if there are no confirmed cases on board the ship, some ports will refuse to dock due to fear of the virus. In the highly-publicized Diamond Princess incident, hundreds of passengers were infected.

en: If you believe you may be infected, call a hospital or local emergency medical services instead of going in person to avoid infecting others.
zh: 如果你怀疑自己被感染了，请呼叫医院或当地急救医疗服务机构，不要私自前往，以避免传染他人。
pert_zh: 如果你怀疑自己被感染了，请呼叫医院或当地急救医疗服务机构，不要私自前往。
bt_pert_zh: If you suspect you are infected, call a hospital or local emergency medical service instead of going there on your own.

en: Mention your symptoms and travel history.
zh: 说明你的症状和出行轨迹。
pert_zh: 说明症状和出行轨迹。
bt_pert_zh: Describe symptoms and travel history.

en: Wear a medical mask and follow the instructions of authorities and doctors.
zh: 佩戴医用口罩，并按照官方机构和医生的指示行事。
pert_zh: 佩戴医用口罩，并按照医生的指示行事。
bt_pert_zh: Wear a medical mask and follow your doctor's instructions.

en: See also: Flight and health
zh: 另请查看：航班与健康
pert_zh: 请查看：航班与健康
bt_pert_zh: Please see: Flights and Health

en: On a plane, follow the same hygiene practices as anywhere else: wash hands frequently, or use alcohol-based hand sanitizer if it's not convenient to leave your seat, and avoid touching your face.
zh: 在飞机上，遵循与其他地方一样的卫生习惯：勤洗手，如果不便离开座位则使用酒精洗手液，避免触摸脸部。
pert_zh: 在飞机上，遵循与其他地方一样的卫生习惯：勤洗手，避免触摸脸部。
bt_pert_zh: On an airplane, follow the same hygiene practices as anywhere else: wash your hands frequently and avoid touching your face.

en: Researchers have found that passengers in window seats have less risk of contact with sick people.
zh: 研究人员发现，靠窗乘客与患者接触的风险较小。
pert_zh: 研究人员发现，靠窗乘客患者接触的风险较小。
bt_pert_zh: The researchers found that window seat passengers were at less risk of exposure to patients.

en: Try to book a window seat, and avoid moving around the cabin during the flight.
zh: 尽量预订靠窗位置，飞行过程中避免在机舱内走动。
pert_zh: 尽量预订靠窗位置，避免在机舱内走动。
bt_pert_zh: Try to book a window seat and avoid walking around the cabin.

en: After washing your hands and before sitting down, use disinfectant wipes to wipe down the area around your seat.
zh: 洗手后入座前，要用消毒湿巾擦拭座位周围区域。
pert_zh: 洗手入座前，擦拭座位周围区域。
bt_pert_zh: Wash your hands before sitting down and wipe down the area around your seat.

en: Wipe hard surfaces, and if your seat is leather you can wipe that too.
zh: 擦拭坚硬表面，如果是真皮座椅，也可擦拭。
pert_zh: 擦拭坚硬表面，如果是真皮座椅，擦拭。
bt_pert_zh: Wipe down hard surfaces, if it’s leather seats, wipe them down.

en: Don't wipe a cloth seat, as the moisture can make transmission easier.
zh: 如果是布艺座椅，不要擦拭，因为潮湿有利于传播。
pert_zh: 如果是布艺座椅，不要擦拭，因为有利于传播。
bt_pert_zh: If it is a fabric seat, do not wipe it as it will facilitate the spread of the virus.

en: When using disinfectant wipes, follow the instructions on the packaging.
zh: 消毒湿巾请按照包装上的说明使用。
pert_zh: 消毒湿巾请使用。
bt_pert_zh: Please use disinfectant wipes.

en: And remember, viruses enter through your mouth, nose, and eyes – wiping down the area doesn't hurt, but it's not a substitute for proper hygiene.
zh: 请记住，病毒可通过口鼻眼部进入人体，擦拭上述区域虽有帮助，但不能代替正确的卫生措施。
pert_zh: 请记住，病毒可通过口鼻眼部进入人体，擦拭上述区域虽有帮助但不能代替正确的卫生措施。
bt_pert_zh: Remember that viruses can enter the body through the mouth, nose, and eyes, and wiping these areas can help but is not a substitute for proper hygiene.

en: Wash your hands and avoid touching your face.
zh: 勤洗手并避免触摸脸部。
pert_zh: 勤洗手并避免触摸。
bt_pert_zh: Wash your hands frequently and avoid touching them.

en: And use a tissue to touch the touch screen or other controls.
zh: 在触摸屏幕或其他控件时用纸巾裹住手操作。
pert_zh: 在触摸屏幕或其他控件时用纸巾。
bt_pert_zh: Use a tissue when touching the screen or other controls.

en: When using the lavatory, use paper towels to turn off the faucet and open the door, then throw them away.
zh: 上厕所时，用纸巾裹住手来关闭水龙头、开门，然后扔掉纸巾。
pert_zh: 上厕所时，用纸巾裹住手来关闭水龙头、开门。
bt_pert_zh: When using the toilet, wrap your hands with a tissue to turn off the faucet and open the door.

en: Airlines in affected areas are taking steps to reduce transmission and keep passengers safe.
zh: 疫区的航空公司正采取措施减少传播和保护乘客安全。
pert_zh: 疫区的航空公司采取措施减少传播和保护乘客安全。
bt_pert_zh: Airlines in epidemic areas have taken measures to reduce transmission and protect passenger safety.

en: For instance, these may include cleaning facilities more frequently, allowing flight attendants to wear masks, and serving prepackaged instead of freshly heated meals.
zh: 其措施可能包括增加设施清洁频率，允许空乘人员佩戴口罩，供应预先包装而非现场加热的食物。
pert_zh: 其措施可能包括增加设施清洁频率，允许空乘人员佩戴口罩。
bt_pert_zh: Measures may include increasing the frequency of cleaning of facilities and allowing flight attendants to wear masks.

en: If a group of passengers is connecting from an area with a severe outbreak, the flight attendants may be able to seat them away from the rest of the passengers (and if you were recently in a high-risk area, consider telling the flight attendants for this reason).
zh: 如果有乘客从疫情严重地区转机，空乘人员可安排其坐在远离其他乘客的位置（如果你近期到过高风险地区，出于这一原因，请考虑告知空乘人员）。
pert_zh: 如果有乘客从疫情严重地区转机，空乘人员可安排其坐在远离其他乘客的位置。
bt_pert_zh: If a passenger is transferring from an area with a severe epidemic, flight attendants can arrange for him to sit away from other passengers.

en: You may be prohibited from changing seats on the flight.
zh: 空乘人员可能会禁止你在机上调换座位。
pert_zh: 空乘人员可能会你在机上调换座位。
bt_pert_zh: The flight attendant may ask you to change your seat on the plane.

en: This is so that, if someone on the flight turns out to be infected, the authorities can track down the people who were sitting near them for testing or quarantine.
zh: 这是为了万一飞机上有人被感染，官方机构能够追踪到其座位附近的乘客，以便进行检测或隔离。
pert_zh: 这是为了万一飞机上有人被感染，官方机构能够追踪到乘客，以便进行检测或隔离。
bt_pert_zh: This is so that in case someone on the plane is infected, authorities can track down the passengers for testing or quarantine.

en: COVID-19 is treated by relieving symptoms and preventing complications.
zh: 针对 COVID-19，治疗重点在于缓解症状和预防并发症。
pert_zh: 针对 COVID-19，治疗重点在于缓解症状。
bt_pert_zh: For COVID-19, treatment focuses on relieving symptoms.

en: There is no vaccine or specific treatment for the novel coronavirus.
zh: 目前还没有针对新型冠状病毒的疫苗或特效治疗方案。
pert_zh: 目前还没有针对新型冠状病毒的疫苗或方案。
bt_pert_zh: There is currently no vaccine or treatment for the new coronavirus.

en: Research into a vaccine or specific antiviral drug is underway.
zh: 疫苗或特效抗病毒药还在研究当中。
pert_zh: 疫苗特效抗病毒药还在研究当中。
bt_pert_zh: Vaccine-specific antiviral drugs are still under research.

en: There are a variety of trials using HIV medications and other novel antiviral medications for treatment of COVID-19.
zh: 有很多使用抗艾滋药物和其他新型抗病毒药物治疗 COVID-19 的试验正在进行。
pert_zh: 有很多使用抗艾滋药物和其他新型抗病毒药物试验正在进行。
bt_pert_zh: There are many trials underway using anti-HIV drugs and other new antiviral drugs.

en: Mild symptoms may be relieved by taking paracetamol (acetaminophen).
zh: 服用扑热息痛（对乙酰氨基酚）可缓解轻度症状。
pert_zh: 服用扑热息痛可缓解轻度症状。
bt_pert_zh: Taking paracetamol can relieve mild symptoms.

en: If you are infected with COVID-19, countries will isolate you until several consecutive tests for COVID-19 are negative.
zh: 如果你感染了 COVID-19，国家将对你采取隔离措施，直至连续多次的 COVID-19 检测呈阴性。
pert_zh: 如果你感染了 COVID-19，国家将对你采取隔离措施。
bt_pert_zh: If you are infected with COVID-19, the state will impose quarantine measures on you.

en: If you have been in close contact with someone infected with COVID-19, many countries will quarantine you for 14 days since the last exposure and monitor you for signs and symptoms.
zh: 如果你与感染 COVID-19 的患者有过密切接触，很多国家会自最后一次接触后实施为期 14 天的隔离，并监控你的症状和体征。
pert_zh: 如果你与感染 COVID-19 的患者有过密切接触，很多国家会自为期 14 天的隔离，并监控你的症状和体征。
bt_pert_zh: If you have been in close contact with someone infected with COVID-19, many countries will require you to quarantine for 14 days and monitor you for signs and symptoms.

en: Some countries will also test you even if you don't have symptoms.
zh: 在有些国家，即使无症状，可能也会对你进行检测。
pert_zh: 在有些国家，可能也会对你进行检测。
bt_pert_zh: In some countries, you may also be tested.

en: In many countries, the healthcare system has been stretched to the point of not being able to handle the sheer number of patients, and there is a chance you may be refused treatment due to the lack of available medical staff, supplies or equipment.
zh: 很多国家的医疗系统已濒临崩溃，无法应付如此庞大的患者数量，甚至可能由于医务人员、用品或设备不足，拒绝给患者治疗。
pert_zh: 很多国家的医疗系统已濒临崩溃，无法应付如此庞大的患者数量。
bt_pert_zh: The medical systems in many countries are on the verge of collapse and cannot cope with such a large number of patients.

en: Many countries have shut down or severely limited flights, ships, and border crossings, especially to and from affected areas.
zh: 很多国家已关闭或严格限制航班、船只和边境口岸，尤其是往来疫区的航班、船只和边境口岸。
pert_zh: 很多国家已关闭或严格限制船只和边境口岸，尤其是往来疫区的船只和边境口岸。
bt_pert_zh: Many countries have closed or severely restricted ships and border crossings, especially those traveling to and from affected areas.

en: Even more countries have imposed restrictions on arriving travelers, either barring entry (maybe with an exception for local citizens and permanent residents) or requiring you to be quarantined, typically for 14 days.
zh: 更多国家对入境旅客实施了限制，有的严格禁止入境（当地居民和永久居民除外），有的则要求进行隔离，通常为 14 天。
pert_zh: 更多国家对入境旅客实施了限制，有的严格禁止入境（当地居民和永久居民除外），则要求进行隔离，通常为 14 天。
bt_pert_zh: More countries have imposed restrictions on incoming travelers, some have strictly banned entry (except for local residents and permanent residents), and some have required quarantine, usually for 14 days.

en: Even if a mandatory quarantine is not imposed, you may be asked to "self-quarantine" by staying at home and not interacting with other people.
zh: 即使没有实施强制隔离，也可能建议你居家“自我隔离”，不与他人接触。
pert_zh: 即使没有实施强制隔离，可能建议你居家“自我隔离”，不与他人接触。
bt_pert_zh: Even if there is no mandatory quarantine, you may be advised to "self-isolate" at home and avoid contact with others.

en: The most severe restrictions are on travellers who have recently been to affected areas, but increasingly many countries are applying them to incoming travellers overall.
zh: 最严格的限制是对近期到过疫区的旅行者的限制，但越来越多的国家已经开始对所有入境旅行者实施这些限制。
pert_zh: 最严格的限制是对近期到过疫区的旅行者的限制，但越来越多的国家已经开始对所有入境旅行者实施限制。
bt_pert_zh: The strictest restrictions are on travelers who have recently been to affected areas, but a growing number of countries have begun imposing restrictions on all incoming travelers.

en: Some countries have even prohibited all or almost all foreigners from entry or limited the ability of local citizens and residents to leave.
zh: 有些国家甚至还会禁止所有或几乎所有外国人入境，或限制当地公民和居民离境。
pert_zh: 有些国家甚至还会禁止所有外国人入境，或限制当地公民和居民离境。
bt_pert_zh: Some countries even ban all foreigners from entering the country or restrict local citizens and residents from leaving the country.

en: What are the affected areas?
zh: 什么是疫区？
pert_zh: 什么疫区？
bt_pert_zh: What epidemic area?

en: Well, this is a fast-changing situation, and each country/region/organization has its own list of what areas are subject to restrictions.
zh: 疫区范围变化很快，每个国家/地区/组织都有自己的限制区域列表。
pert_zh: 疫区范围很快，每个国家/地区/组织都有自己的限制区域列表。
bt_pert_zh: The scope of the epidemic area is expanding quickly, and each country/region/organization has its own list of restricted areas.

en: The city of Wuhan is on every list and the rest of mainland China is on most.
zh: 所有列表中均有武汉，大部分列表中还列有中国大陆其余地区。
pert_zh: 所有列表中均有武汉，大部分还列有中国大陆其余地区。
bt_pert_zh: All of the lists include Wuhan, and most also include the rest of mainland China.

en: Other areas that are often included: France, Germany, Hong Kong, Iran, Italy, Japan, Macau, Singapore, South Korea, Spain, Taiwan, the United Kingdom, the United States, the Schengen Area as a whole, and sometimes various others.
zh: 列表中常见的其他区域还包括：法国、德国、中国香港、伊朗、意大利、日本、中国澳门、新加坡、韩国、西班牙、中国台湾、英国、美国、整个申根地区，有时还包括其他很多地区。
pert_zh: 列表中常见的其他区域还包括：法国、德国、中国香港、伊朗、意大利、日本、中国澳门、新加坡、韩国、西班牙、中国台湾、美国、整个申根地区，有时还包括其他很多地区。
bt_pert_zh: Other areas commonly found on the list include: France, Germany, Hong Kong, Iran, Italy, Japan, Macau, Singapore, South Korea, Spain, Taiwan, the United States, the entire Schengen area, and sometimes many others.

en: Some countries have imposed restrictions based on citizenship or residency from severely affected areas.
zh: 一些国家会对来自疫情严重地区的公民或居民实施限制。
pert_zh: 一些国家会对来自地区的公民或居民实施限制。
bt_pert_zh: Some countries impose restrictions on citizens or residents from certain regions.

en: A detailed list of entry restrictions is maintained by the IATA.
zh: 入境限制详细列表由 IATA 维护。
pert_zh: 入境限制由 IATA 维护。
bt_pert_zh: Entry restrictions are maintained by IATA.

en: It doesn't cover all the restrictions, but it's still useful.
zh: 虽然不够全面，但仍然很有价值。
pert_zh: 虽然不够全面，但很有价值。
bt_pert_zh: Although not comprehensive, it is valuable.

en: Keep up to date—the outbreak and the travel restrictions are changing rapidly.
zh: 持续更新——疫情爆发和出行限制也在快速变化。
pert_zh: 持续更新——疫情爆发和出行限制在快速变化。
bt_pert_zh: Continuously updating – outbreaks and travel restrictions are changing rapidly.

en: For travel in the near future, consider making refundable reservations in case the changing situation forces you to change your plans.
zh: 近期如需出行，请考虑预订可退款客房，以防情况有变时更改计划。
pert_zh: 近期如需出行，请考虑预订可退款客房，以更改计划。
bt_pert_zh: If you need to travel in the near future, please consider booking a refundable room to change your plans.

en: Avoid buying tickets with a connection in an affected area – even changing planes can make you subject to restrictions.
zh: 避免购买在疫区转机的机票，即使是换乘，你也可能会受到一些限制。
pert_zh: 避免购买在疫区转机的机票，你也可能会受到一些限制。
bt_pert_zh: Avoid buying tickets with transfers in affected areas, as you may also be subject to some restrictions.

en: Flights may get canceled with little notice, either due to the disease's spread and ever-changing entry restrictions, or simply because fewer people are flying and airlines are having trouble filling seats.
zh: 航班可能会在毫无通知的情况下取消，原因包括疫情扩散和入境限制不断变化，或者仅仅因为乘客减少，机上座位无法坐满。
pert_zh: 航班可能会在毫无通知的情况下取消，原因包括疫情扩散和入境限制不断变化，或者仅仅因为乘客减少。
bt_pert_zh: Flights may be cancelled without notice due to the spread of the virus and changing entry restrictions, or simply because there are fewer passengers.

en: You might also be delayed for hours upon arrival waiting for temperature checks and related procedures and paperwork, or even get quarantined for two weeks.
zh: 此外，抵达目的地后，你可能还要花数小时等待体温检测和相关程序与申报流程，甚至可能被隔离两周。
pert_zh: 此外，抵达目的地后，你可能还要花数小时等待体温检测和相关程序。
bt_pert_zh: Additionally, once you arrive at your destination, you may have to spend hours waiting for temperature checks and related procedures.

en: Be prepared for the possibility of disruption to your travel plans, especially if traveling internationally.
zh: 请随时做好出行计划中断的准备，尤其是国际行程。
pert_zh: 请随时做好出行计划准备，尤其是国际行程。
bt_pert_zh: Always be prepared to plan your travels, especially international ones.

en: Even if you're nowhere near affected areas there's a risk that you'll have to stay at the destination longer than planned if you've shared a building or vessel with an infected person.
zh: 即使不在疫区附近，如果你所在大楼或交通工具上发现感染者，你在目的地的停留时间也可能延长。
pert_zh: 即使不在疫区附近，如果你所在大楼或交通工具上发现感染者，你在目的地的时间也可能延长。
bt_pert_zh: Even if you are not near an epidemic area, your time at your destination may be extended if an infected person is found in your building or on your transportation.

en: For example, in late February an Italian doctor on vacation in Costa Adeje (Canary Islands) was diagnosed with COVID-19, and as a result all the guests in the hotel he stayed at were quarantined.
zh: 例如，2 月下旬，一位在奥德杰海岸（加那利群岛）度假的意大利医生被确诊患有 COVID-19，结果他所住酒店的所有客人均被隔离。
pert_zh: 例如，在奥德杰海岸（加那利群岛）度假的意大利医生被确诊患有 COVID-19，结果他所住酒店的所有客人均被隔离。
bt_pert_zh: For example, an Italian doctor on vacation in Costa Adeje (Canary Islands) was diagnosed with COVID-19, as a result of which all guests of the hotel where he was staying were quarantined.

en: Lockdowns and other internal restrictions
zh: 封锁和其他国内限制
pert_zh: 封锁其他国内限制
bt_pert_zh: Blocking other domestic restrictions

en: Some countries and regions, especially severely affected ones, are implementing emergency lockdowns and restrictions on people's movements and activities, even for those who haven't recently been abroad.
zh: 一些国家和地区，特别是严重疫区，正在实施紧急封锁，以限制人们的出行和活动，即使是近期未曾出国的人员。
pert_zh: 一些国家和地区正在实施紧急封锁，以限制人们的出行和活动。
bt_pert_zh: Some countries and regions are implementing emergency lockdowns to restrict people's travel and activities.

en: These include the temporary reintroduction of some border controls, restrictions on travel within the country, closing or limiting service at restaurants and other establishments, banning large public events, and in the most severe cases prohibiting people from leaving the house except for essential reasons.
zh: 措施包括暂时重启边境管制，限制国内出行，关闭或限制餐馆和其他场所提供服务，禁止大型公共活动，最严重时还会禁止居民离家外出，除非绝对必要。
pert_zh: 措施包括限制国内出行，关闭或限制餐馆和其他场所提供服务，禁止大型公共活动，最严重时还会禁止居民离家外出，除非绝对必要。
bt_pert_zh: Measures include restricting domestic travel, closing or limiting services in restaurants and other venues, banning large public events, and in the most severe cases, prohibiting residents from leaving their homes unless absolutely necessary.

en: Beyond government restrictions, individual establishments are shutting their doors and cancelling events to try to reduce the spread of the virus.
zh: 除了政府限制外，个别设施也会关闭，取消活动，努力减少病毒扩散。
pert_zh: 除了政府限制外，取消活动，努力减少病毒扩散。
bt_pert_zh: In addition to government restrictions, events are being cancelled in an effort to reduce the spread of the virus.

en: In China, there are extensive restrictions on transportation and activity, which vary widely by province, city, and even by district or village.
zh: 在中国，交通和活动受到广泛限制，具体限制因省、市、甚至地区或村庄而存在巨大差异。
pert_zh: 在中国，交通和活动受到广泛限制，限制因省、市、甚至地区或村庄而存在巨大差异。
bt_pert_zh: Across China, travel and movement are subject to widespread restrictions, with restrictions varying dramatically by province, city, and even region or village.

en: Many governments recommend against traveling to China at this time.
zh: 很多政府建议这段时间避免前往中国。
pert_zh: 很多政府建议避免前往中国。
bt_pert_zh: Many governments recommend avoiding travel to China.

en: If you have no choice, do your research and get up-to-date information about the local situation wherever you are going.
zh: 如果你没有其他选择，请自行调查，及时了解有关你的目的地的最新信息。
pert_zh: 如果你没有其他选择，请自行调查，有关你的目的地的最新信息。
bt_pert_zh: If you have no other choice, do your own research and get the latest information about your destination.

en: People who have traveled to Hubei face particularly severe restrictions.
zh: 到过湖北的人员尤其会受到严格限制。
pert_zh: 到过湖北的人员受到严格限制。
bt_pert_zh: People who have been to Hubei are subject to strict restrictions.

en: Examples of restrictions that you may encounter in some parts of China (this is not an exhaustive list):
zh: 在中国部分地区你可能会受到的限制包括（以下是非详尽列表）：
pert_zh: 在中国部分地区你可能会受到的限制包括：
bt_pert_zh: Restrictions you may face in some parts of China include:

en: 14-day quarantine, self-quarantine, or COVID-19 test upon arrival from other parts of China or from other countries, at your expense
zh: 从中国其他地区或其他国家抵达后，接受为期 14 天的隔离、自我隔离或 COVID-19 检测，费用自理。
pert_zh: 从其他地区或其他国家抵达后，接受为期 14 天的隔离、自我隔离或 COVID-19 检测，费用自理。
bt_pert_zh: Upon arrival from other regions or other countries, undergo 14 days of quarantine, self-isolation, or COVID-19 testing at your own expense.

en: questions about your travel and medical history (lying can get you years in prison)
zh: 询问你的活动轨迹和病史（瞒报有可能入狱）
pert_zh: 询问你的活动轨迹（瞒报有可能入狱）
bt_pert_zh: Ask about your activities (concealing information may result in imprisonment)

en: mandatory registration using an online or paper form
zh: 使用在线或纸质表格强制登记
pert_zh: 使用在线或表格强制登记
bt_pert_zh: Mandatory registration using online or form

en: requirement to wear a face mask in public
zh: 要求在公共场所佩戴口罩
pert_zh: 要求在公共场所佩戴
bt_pert_zh: Required to wear in public places

en: people who have been outside of China within 14 days not allowed into public places like malls
zh: 从国外回到中国后 14 天内不得进入商场等公共区域
pert_zh: 从国外回到中国后不得进入商场等公共区域。
bt_pert_zh: After returning to China from abroad, you are not allowed to enter public areas such as shopping malls.

en: shops only accept mobile payments, not cash
zh: 商店仅接受移动付款，不收现金
pert_zh: 商店仅接受移动付款，现金
bt_pert_zh: The store only accepts mobile payments, cash

en: restaurants, transportation and other establishments refusing service to non-Chinese citizens
zh: 餐厅、交通和其他机构拒绝向非中国公民提供服务
pert_zh: 餐厅、交通拒绝向非中国公民提供服务
bt_pert_zh: Restaurants and transportation refuse to provide services to non-Chinese citizens

en: many forms of transportation reduced or shut down
zh: 很多交通运输工具已管控或停运
pert_zh: 很多交通运输工具已停运
bt_pert_zh: Many transportation modes have been suspended

en: mandatory real-name registration for public transit cards
zh: 强制实名登记公交卡
pert_zh: 强制实名登记。
bt_pert_zh: Mandatory real-name registration.

en: access in and out of a town, village, or city completely blocked
zh: 完全封锁城镇、村庄或城市出入通道
pert_zh: 完全封锁城镇、城市出入通道
bt_pert_zh: Completely block access to towns and cities

en: non-resident visitors prohibited from entering apartment complexes
zh: 非居民游客不得进入公寓楼
pert_zh: 非居民游客不得进入楼
bt_pert_zh: Non-resident visitors are not allowed to enter the building

en: only allowed to go outside once every two days to get supplies
zh: 仅允许每两天外出一次获取补给
pert_zh: 仅允许每两天外出获取补给。
bt_pert_zh: Going out to get supplies is only allowed every two days.

en: businesses, activities, and attractions closed
zh: 商业场所、活动和景点关闭
pert_zh: 商业场所、景点关闭
bt_pert_zh: Commercial places and tourist attractions closed

en: businesses need local government permission to re-open
zh: 商业场所需当地政府批准才可复开
pert_zh: 商业场所需当地政府批准可复开
bt_pert_zh: Commercial venues need approval from local governments to reopen

en: restaurants (if they are even open) require a minimum distance between customers
zh: 餐馆（如果依然开放）要求顾客之间保持安全距离
pert_zh: 餐馆要求顾客之间保持安全距离。
bt_pert_zh: Restaurants require customers to maintain a safe distance between each other.

en: selling substandard face masks has a maximum sentence of life imprisonment
zh: 销售不合格口罩最高可判处无期徒刑
pert_zh: 销售不合格口罩可判处无期徒刑
bt_pert_zh: Selling substandard masks can result in life imprisonment

en: As of mid-March 2020, Europe is the epicenter of the epidemic, and many European countries have closed their borders to international travel - only border commuters and freight are allowed to cross.
zh: 截至 2020 年 3 月中旬，欧洲仍为疫情中心，很多欧洲国家已经关闭国际边境通道，仅允许边境通勤者和货物通过。
pert_zh: 截至 2020 年 3 月中旬，欧洲仍为疫情中心，已经关闭国际边境通道，仅允许边境通勤者和货物通过。
bt_pert_zh: As of mid-March 2020, Europe, still the epicenter of the pandemic, has closed international border crossings, allowing only border commuters and cargo to pass through.

en: Also businesses other than food stores and pharmacies are closed, and public transport has been reduced or stopped.
zh: 此外，除食品店和药店以外的其他商业店铺均已关闭，公共交通也已管控或停运。
pert_zh: 此外，除食品店和药店以外的商业店铺均已关闭，公共交通也已管控或停运。
bt_pert_zh: In addition, all commercial stores except food stores and pharmacies have been closed, and public transportation has been controlled or suspended.

en: In the worst affected countries including Italy, Spain and France, lockdowns like in China in January, have been implemented.
zh: 包括意大利、西班牙和法国在内的最严重疫区已实施中国在 1 月份实施的封锁措施。
pert_zh: 包括西班牙和法国在内的最严重疫区已实施中国在 1 月份实施的封锁措施。
bt_pert_zh: The worst-hit areas, including Spain and France, have implemented lockdown measures similar to those imposed by China in January.

en: As well the EU has closed its outer borders.
zh: 与此同时，欧洲还关闭了其外部边界。
pert_zh: 与此同时，欧洲关闭了其外部边界。
bt_pert_zh: Meanwhile, Europe has closed its external borders.

en: COVID-19 is prevalent also in North America.
zh: COVID-19 在北美也出现蔓延。
pert_zh: COVID-19 北美也出现蔓延。
bt_pert_zh: COVID-19 is also spreading in North America.

en: The borders between Canada, the U.S., and Mexico are closed to non-essential travel, and in many areas bans on big gatherings are in effect (this means places like restaurants are closed, and events are canceled).
zh: 加拿大、美国和墨西哥之间的边境禁止非必要旅行，很多地区还禁止大型集会（餐馆等场所被迫关闭，活动被迫取消）。
pert_zh: 加拿大、美国和墨西哥之间的边境禁止非必要旅行。
bt_pert_zh: The borders between Canada, the United States and Mexico are closed to non-essential travel.

en: Numerous state, county, and municipal jurisdictions have issued stay-at-home orders that require all nonessential businesses to close.
zh: 很多州、县和市司法管辖区也发布了居家令，要求停止所有非必要业务。
pert_zh: 很多州、县和司法管辖区也发布了居家令，要求停止所有非必要业务。
bt_pert_zh: Many states, counties and jurisdictions have also issued stay-at-home orders requiring all non-essential businesses to cease.

en: With lots of flights canceled, warnings issued, and restrictions imposed, flying in the time of coronavirus can be a challenge.
zh: 随着大量航班的取消、警告的发布、限制的施加，疫情期间乘飞机出行面临极大挑战。
pert_zh: 随着大量航班的取消、限制的施加，疫情期间乘飞机出行面临极大挑战。
bt_pert_zh: With a large number of flights cancelled and restrictions imposed, air travel during the epidemic poses great challenges.

en: Some routes are not possible.
zh: 有些航线已经禁飞。
pert_zh: 有些已经禁飞。
bt_pert_zh: Some have been grounded.

en: Others will require more inconvenient connections than usual—multiple stops and long waits between flights.
zh: 其他未禁飞航线也比平时麻烦很多，飞行期间要多次停靠，还要等待很长时间。
pert_zh: 其他未禁飞航线也比平时很多，飞行期间要多次停靠，还要等待很长时间。
bt_pert_zh: There are also more other routes that are not banned than usual, and the flights require multiple stops and long waits.

en: In some cases that means more expensive tickets.
zh: 一些情况下票价高昂。
pert_zh: 一些情况下高昂。
bt_pert_zh: In some cases, high.

en: On the other hand, the good news is that many flights are cheaper than usual due to decreased demand, and there's a decent chance you'll get an empty seat next to you.
zh: 当然也有好消息，有些航线的票价因需求下降，反而比平时便宜，而且你旁边的座位很可能是空的。
pert_zh: 当然也有好消息，有些航线的票价因需求下降，而且你旁边的座位很可能是空的。
bt_pert_zh: There is good news, of course, as fares on some routes have dropped due to demand, and there is a good chance that the seat next to you will be empty.

en: Build in extra time for your connections, especially if transferring from an international flight to a domestic flight and especially if your itinerary involves a country that's seriously affected.
zh: 应预留额外的转机时间，尤其是在从国际航班转为国内航班或行程涉及疫情严重国家的情况下。
pert_zh: 应预留额外的转机时间，尤其是在从国际航班转为国内航班的情况下。
bt_pert_zh: Additional time should be allowed for connecting flights, especially when transferring from an international to a domestic flight.

en: Screenings, temperature checks, extra paperwork, and the associated waiting around can add minutes or hours before you're allowed to continue on your journey.
zh: 一些筛查、体温检测、额外文书以及相关等待可能会使您的旅程拖延数分钟或数小时。
pert_zh: 一些筛查、体温检测以及相关等待可能会使您的旅程拖延数分钟或数小时。
bt_pert_zh: Some screening, temperature checks, and associated waiting may delay your journey by minutes or hours.

en: You may find it harder than usual to buy a ticket to or from a destination subject to warnings and restrictions.
zh: 受警告和限制的影响，你可能会发现购买往来某个目的地的机票比平时更难。
pert_zh: 受警告和限制的影响，你可能会发现购买机票比平时更难。
bt_pert_zh: Due to warnings and restrictions, you may find it more difficult than usual to buy air tickets.

en: This is a real concern if you're trying to get out of an affected area.
zh: 如果要离开疫区，这会是一个头疼的问题。
pert_zh: 如果要离开疫区，这会是一个问题。
bt_pert_zh: This would be a problem if you want to leave the epidemic area.

en: For instance, most aggregators are not selling tickets from China to the United States (presumably to avoid falling afoul of restrictions and being on the hook for a passenger's flight out).
zh: 例如，大部分中间商不会出售从中国到美国的机票（大概是为了避免违反限制，避免航班因乘客出境而被叫停）。
pert_zh: 例如，大部分中间商不会出售从中国到美国的机票。
bt_pert_zh: For example, most intermediaries will not sell air tickets from China to the United States.

en: To buy a ticket for an itinerary like this, you may have to contact the airline or use a lesser-known aggregator.
zh: 要购买这类机票，你可能需要联系航空公司或选择不太知名的中间商。
pert_zh: 要购买这类机票，你可能需要联系航空公司或选择中间商。
bt_pert_zh: To purchase these tickets, you may need to contact the airline or use a middleman.

en: Another possibility is to buy two separate tickets (for instance, a ticket from China to Cambodia and a second ticket from Cambodia to the U.S.), but be careful you won't get quarantined or lose your luggage in between.
zh: 另一种可能是需要买两张不同的机票（例如，一张从中国到柬埔寨的机票和一张从柬埔寨到美国的机票），但要小心，避免转机时被隔离或丢失行李。
pert_zh: 另一种可能是需要买两张不同的机票（例如，一张从中国到柬埔寨的机票和一张从柬埔寨到美国的机票），但要小心，避免丢失行李。
bt_pert_zh: Another possibility is to buy two different tickets (for example, one ticket from China to Cambodia and one ticket from Cambodia to the United States), but be careful to avoid losing your luggage.

en: Connecting flights can be a problem.
zh: 转机也可能存在问题。
pert_zh: 转机可能存在问题。
bt_pert_zh: There may be problems with the transfer.

en: The risk of getting stuck in the connection city is higher than usual right now, due to delays for screening and testing as well as extensive cancellations.
zh: 因筛查和检测导致延迟和大面积航班取消，被困在转机城市的风险现在比平时更高。
pert_zh: 因筛查导致延迟和大面积航班取消，被困在转机城市的风险现在比平时更高。
bt_pert_zh: With delays and widespread flight cancellations caused by screening, the risk of being stuck in a transfer city is now higher than usual.

en: Connecting in an affected area may lead to entry restrictions later on, and if you've been in an affected area recently some countries won't even let you change planes.
zh: 在疫区转机可能还会导致随后的入境限制，如果你最近到过疫区，一些国家甚至还会拒绝为你提供转机服务。
pert_zh: 在疫区转机可能会导致随后的入境限制，如果你最近到过疫区，一些国家甚至还会拒绝为你提供转机服务。
bt_pert_zh: Transiting through an affected area may result in subsequent entry restrictions, and some countries may even refuse to provide you with transit services if you have recently been to an affected area.

en: On certain itineraries there is a risk of getting quarantined somewhere along the way.
zh: 某些路线还存在沿途被隔离的风险。
pert_zh: 某些路线还存在被隔离的风险。
bt_pert_zh: There is also a risk of isolation on certain routes.

en: So book a direct flight if you can, and if not, think carefully about where to connect.
zh: 因此，请尽量预订直达航班，如果没有直达航班，则请慎重考虑转机地点。
pert_zh: 因此，请预订直达航班，如果没有直达航班，则请慎重考虑转机地点。
bt_pert_zh: So book a direct flight, or if there is no direct flight, think carefully about where to connect.

en: In uncertain times, plans can change.
zh: 在此不确定时期，计划随时可能有变。
pert_zh: 在不确定时期，计划随时可能有变。
bt_pert_zh: In uncertain times, plans can change at any time.

en: Many embassies and consulates have evacuated nonessential staff, and some have shut down operations completely.
zh: 很多大使馆和领事馆也已疏散了一些不必要的工作人员，有些业务已完全关停。
pert_zh: 很多大使馆也已疏散了一些不必要的工作人员，有些业务已完全关停。
bt_pert_zh: Many embassies have also evacuated some non-essential staff, and some operations have been completely shut down.

en: Emergency assistance should still be available, though it's possible you may have to contact a further-away consulate if your local one has shut down.
zh: 但紧急援助应该仍然可用，不过你当地的领事馆可能已经关闭，你可能需要联系更远的领事馆。
pert_zh: 但紧急援助应该可用，不过你当地的领事馆可能已经关闭，你可能需要联系更远的领事馆。
bt_pert_zh: Emergency assistance should be available, although your local consulate may be closed and you may need to contact a consulate further away.

en: If you have been stranded due to the pandemic, your nearest consulate may be able to help you find a flight home, arrange an emergency loan so you can buy a ticket, or provide an emergency passport.
zh: 如果因疫情而被困，距你最近的领事馆可能会帮你寻找回国航班，为你安排紧急贷款，方便你购买机票，或为你提供紧急护照。
pert_zh: 如果因疫情而被困，距你最近的领事馆可能会帮你寻找回国航班，为你购买机票，或为你提供紧急护照。
bt_pert_zh: If you are stranded due to the coronavirus, your nearest consulate may be able to help you find a flight home, buy you a ticket, or provide you with an emergency passport.

en: At the very least they can keep you informed about the local situation and notify you about recently introduced travel requirements and restrictions.
zh: 至少他们可帮助你了解当地情况，告知你最近出台的旅行要求和限制。
pert_zh: 至少他们可帮助你了解当地情况，告知最近出台的旅行要求和限制。
bt_pert_zh: At the very least they can help you understand the local situation and inform you of recent travel requirements and restrictions.

en: Ordinary consular services such as visa and passport processing may be suspended or restricted to urgent need, depending on the location and the consulate.
zh: 签证和护照处理等普通领事服务可能会暂停或仅限紧急需求，具体取决于地点和领事馆。
pert_zh: 签证和护照处理等普通领事服务可能会限紧急需求，具体取决于地点和领事馆。
bt_pert_zh: Routine consular services such as visa and passport processing may be limited to emergency needs, depending on the location and consulate.

en: Although some people call the disease "Wuhan pneumonia" (武汉(漢)肺炎/武肺), "Wuhan disease", or "Chinese virus", the use of these terms is considered racist in China and by many people of Chinese origin.
zh: 尽管有人称此病为“Wuhan pneumonia” (武汉(漢)肺炎/武肺)、“Wuhan disease”或“Chinese virus”，但中国以及很多华裔认为使用这些词涉嫌种族歧视。
pert_zh: 尽管有人称此病为“Wuhan pneumonia” (武汉(漢)肺炎/武肺)，但中国以及很多华裔认为使用这些词涉嫌种族歧视。
bt_pert_zh: Although some people call the disease "Wuhan pneumonia", China and many Chinese people believe that using these words is racially discriminatory.

en: It is still common to refer the disease as "Wuhan pneumonia" or "Chinese virus" in places like Hong Kong and Taiwan.
zh: 在中国香港和中国台湾等地，也常听到有人称此病为“武汉肺炎”或“中国病毒”。
pert_zh: 在中国香港和中国台湾等地，也常听到有人称此病为“中国病毒”。
bt_pert_zh: In places such as Hong Kong and Taiwan, China, it is common to hear people call this disease the "Chinese virus."

en: To be safe, use location-neutral terms when referring to the disease, such as "COVID-19", "novel coronavirus", or just "the virus" or "the pandemic".
zh: 为安全起见，提到此病时尽量使用中立词，如“COVID-19”、“新型冠状病毒”，或者直接称“病毒”或“疫情”。
pert_zh: 为安全起见，提到此病时尽量使用中立词，如“COVID-19”、“新型冠状病毒”，或者直接称“病毒”。
bt_pert_zh: To be safe, try to use neutral terms such as "COVID-19," "new coronavirus," or simply "virus" when referring to the disease.

en: Particularly in developing countries where law enforcement are poorly trained, enforcement of curfew, lockdown or stay-at-home orders are often brutal, often using forces not proportionate against crowds.
zh: 尤其是在执法人员受训不足的发展中国家，宵禁、封锁或居家令在执行方面往往比较严酷，经常会通过武力对人群强制执行。
pert_zh: 尤其是在执法人员受训不足的发展中国家，宵禁、封锁或居家令在执行方面往往比较严酷，通过武力对人群强制执行。
bt_pert_zh: Especially in developing countries where law enforcement officers are inadequately trained, curfews, lockdowns or stay-at-home orders are often harsh in their enforcement and enforced on populations through force.

en: Comply with these orders, and avoid crowds in public.
zh: 请遵守这些政令，避免去人多拥挤的公共场所。
pert_zh: 请遵守这些政令，避免拥挤的公共场所。
bt_pert_zh: Please obey these orders and avoid crowded public places.

en: As a result of the coronavirus pandemic, xenophobia has risen in many countries, primarily but not exclusively targeting people perceived to be Chinese.
zh: 冠状病毒疫情导致很多国家开始出现仇外心理，主要针对但不仅限于华裔面孔群体。
pert_zh: 冠状病毒疫情导致很多国家出现仇外心理。
bt_pert_zh: The coronavirus pandemic has led to xenophobia in many countries.

en: There has been a worldwide spike in racist incidents targeting people of East Asian origin, including in major cities such as New York, London and San Francisco.
zh: 针对东亚裔人的种族歧视事件在全球激增，包括在纽约、伦敦和旧金山等大城市。
pert_zh: 针对东亚裔人的种族歧视事件在全球激增。
bt_pert_zh: Incidents of racism against people of East Asian descent have surged around the world.

en: In Hong Kong, Sinophobia, which was already high to begin with, has intensified as a result of the pandemic, with the result that many shops and restaurants are now denying service to mainland Chinese customers and banning Mandarin speakers from their premises (with the exception of Taiwanese).
zh: 在中国香港，居高不下的“恐中症”因疫情而加剧，结果导致现在很多商家和餐馆拒绝向中国大陆顾客提供服务，并禁止说普通话的群体进入其经营场所（台湾人除外）。
pert_zh: 在中国香港，居高不下的“恐中症”因疫情而加剧，结果导致现在很多商家和餐馆拒绝向中国大陆顾客提供服务。
bt_pert_zh: In Hong Kong, China, high levels of Sinophobia have been exacerbated by the pandemic, with the result that many businesses and restaurants now refuse to serve customers from mainland China.

en: Levels of xenophobia have also risen in East Asia, with some restaurants and other businesses in Japan and China refusing service to foreign customers.
zh: 仇外心理在东亚也有所上升，日本和中国的一些餐馆和其他商家也会拒绝向外国顾客提供服务。
pert_zh: 仇外心理在东亚也有所上升，中国的一些餐馆和其他商家也会拒绝向外国顾客提供服务。
bt_pert_zh: Xenophobia has also risen in East Asia, with some restaurants and other businesses in China refusing to serve foreign customers.

en: In China, there have been incidents of foreigners being refused rooms by hotel staff, and foreign residents, particularly black people, being kicked out of their apartments on short notice by their landlords.
zh: 在中国，曾发生外国人被酒店员工拒绝入住，以及外国居民（尤其是黑人）收到房东临时通知，被赶出公寓的事件。
pert_zh: 在中国，曾发生外国人被酒店员工拒绝入住以及外国居民（尤其是黑人）收到房东临时通知的事件。
bt_pert_zh: In China, there have been incidents of foreigners being refused accommodation by hotel staff and foreign residents (especially black people) receiving short notices from landlords.

en: Sources for further information on the coronavirus outbreak include:
zh: 以下方面可提供有关冠状病毒疫情的更多信息：
pert_zh: 以下可提供冠状病毒疫情的更多信息：
bt_pert_zh: More information on the coronavirus outbreak is available below:

en: The US government Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
zh: 美国疾病预防与控制中心
pert_zh: 美国疾病预防控制中心
bt_pert_zh: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention

en: European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (daily updates)
zh: 欧洲疾病预防与控制中心（每日更新）
pert_zh: 欧洲疾病预防与中心（每日更新）
bt_pert_zh: European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (updated daily)

en: United Kingdom government, - Foreign and Commonwealth Office advice for Travellers
zh: 英国政府——外交和联邦事务部给旅行者的建议
pert_zh: 英国政府给旅行者的建议
bt_pert_zh: UK government advice for travellers

en: An online map and dashboard from the John Hopkins University Center for Systems Science and Engineering with live updates
zh: 由约翰·霍普斯金大学系统科学与工程中心提供的在线地图和统计图，实时更新
pert_zh: 由约翰·霍普斯金大学系统科学与工程中心提供的统计图，实时更新
bt_pert_zh: Statistical chart provided by the Center for Systems Science and Engineering at Johns Hopkins University, updated in real time

en: Partial lists of entry restrictions from IATA and The New York Times
zh: 由 IATA 和纽约时报发布的部分入境限制清单
pert_zh: 由 IATA 纽约时报发布的部分入境限制清单
bt_pert_zh: A partial list of entry restrictions published by IATA New York Times

en: A variety of misinformation and conspiracy theories about the virus are being promoted online and even by some government officials, so be careful which sources you check for information.
zh: 有关这种病毒的各种不实信息和阴谋论在网上流传，有些甚至来自政府官员，因此要认真检查信息来源。
pert_zh: 有关这种病毒的各种不实信息和阴谋论在网上流传，因此要认真检查信息来源。
bt_pert_zh: Various misinformation and conspiracy theories about the virus are circulating online, so be sure to check your sources carefully.

en: Ensure that all information and advice you receive has been backed by reputable doctors and scientists.
zh: 确保你所收到的所有信息和建议已获得信誉良好的医生和科学家的支持。
pert_zh: 确保所收到的所有信息和建议已获得信誉良好的支持。
bt_pert_zh: Make sure that all information and advice you receive is from a reputable source.

en: In a crisis, it's natural to want to keep following the latest updates, but it may be better for your mental health to moderate the amount of news that you look at, and stick to reliable news sources.
zh: 在危机中，人们自然会希望关注最新消息，但为心理健康考虑，应适度控制你所查看的新闻数量，仅关注可靠来源的新闻。
pert_zh: 在危机中，人们自然会希望关注最新消息，但应适度控制你所查看的新闻数量，仅关注可靠来源的新闻。
bt_pert_zh: In a crisis, it’s natural to want to stay updated on the latest news, but be moderate in the amount of news you consume and only focus on news from reliable sources.

en: If you normally watch the news twice per day then stick to this schedule and do something else, rather than having the 24-hour news on continuously.
zh: 如果你通常每天看两次新闻，则请保持此频率，尝试做些别的事情，而不要连续 24 小时跟踪新闻信息。
pert_zh: 如果你通常每天看两次新闻，则请保持此频率，尝试做些别的事情，而不要跟踪新闻信息。
bt_pert_zh: If you normally watch the news twice a day, keep that up and try to do something other than follow the news.

en: b'Bat SARS-like coronavirus WIV1 (Bat SL-CoV-WIV1), also sometimes called SARS-like coronavirus WIV1, is a strain of Severe acute respiratory syndrome-related coronavirus (SARSr-CoV) isolated from Chinese rufous horseshoe bats (Rhinolophus sinicus).
zh: 蝙蝠 SARS 样冠状病毒 WIV1 (Bat SL-CoV-WIV1)，有时也称为 SARS 样冠状病毒 WIV1，是从中华菊头蝠 (Rhinolophus sinicus) 体内分离出的一种严重急性呼吸综合征相关冠状病毒 (Severe acute respiratory syndrome-related coronavirus, SARSr-CoV) 毒株。
pert_zh: 蝙蝠 SARS 样冠状病毒 WIV1 (Bat SL-CoV-WIV1) 是从中华菊头蝠 (Rhinolophus sinicus) 体内分离出的一种严重急性呼吸综合征相关冠状病毒 (Severe acute respiratory syndrome-related coronavirus, SARSr-CoV) 毒株。
bt_pert_zh: Bat SARS-like coronavirus WIV1 (Bat SL-CoV-WIV1) is a severe acute respiratory syndrome-related coronavirus (SARSr-CoV) strain isolated from the Chinese horseshoe bat (Rhinolophus sinicus).

en: Like all coronaviruses, virions consist of single-stranded positive-sense RNA enclosed within an envelope.
zh: 与所有冠状病毒类似，病毒体由包裹在包膜中的单链正义 RNA 组成。
pert_zh: 与冠状病毒类似，病毒体由包裹在包膜中的单链正义 RNA 组成。
bt_pert_zh: Similar to coronaviruses, the virion consists of single-stranded positive-sense RNA enclosed in an envelope.

en: The discovery confirms that bats are the natural reservoir of SARS-CoV.
zh: 该发现证实蝙蝠是 SARS-CoV 的天然宿主。
pert_zh: 该发现证实蝙蝠是天然宿主。
bt_pert_zh: The finding confirms that bats are the natural host.

en: Phylogenetic analysis shows the possibility of direct transmission of SARS from bats to humans without the intermediary Chinese civets, as previously believed.
zh: 遗传进化分析表明，与先前认为的一致，SARS 可能从蝙蝠直接传播给人类，而无需经过中间宿主果子狸。
pert_zh: 遗传进化分析表明，SARS 可能从蝙蝠传播给人类，而无需经过中间宿主果子狸。
bt_pert_zh: Genetic evolutionary analysis suggests that SARS may be transmitted from bats to humans without passing through the intermediate host civet cat.

en: b'COVID-19 drug development is the research process to develop a preventative vaccine or therapeutic prescription drug that would alleviate the severity of 2019-20 coronavirus disease (COVID-19).
zh: b'COVID-19 药物开发是研发预防性疫苗或治疗处方药的研究过程，旨在缓解 2019-20 冠状病毒病 (COVID-19) 的严重性。
pert_zh: COVID-19 药物开发是预防性疫苗或治疗处方药的研究过程，旨在缓解 2019-20 冠状病毒病 (COVID-19) 的严重性。
bt_pert_zh: COVID-19 drug development is the research process for preventive vaccines or therapeutic prescription drugs designed to mitigate the severity of the 2019-20 coronavirus disease (COVID-19).

en: The International Clinical Trials Registry Platform of the WHO recorded 536 clinical studies to develop post-infection therapies for COVID-19 infections, with numerous established antiviral compounds for treating other infections under clinical research to be repurposed.
zh: WHO 的国际临床试验注册平台记录了 536 项针对 COVID-19 的感染后临床研究，很多既往用于治疗其他感染性疾病的抗病毒化合物也在临床研究中得到了重新利用。
pert_zh: WHO 的国际临床试验注册平台记录了 536 项针对 COVID-19 的感染后临床研究，很多用于治疗其他感染性疾病的抗病毒化合物也在临床研究中得到了重新利用。
bt_pert_zh: The WHO's International Clinical Trials Registry Platform has recorded 536 post-infection clinical studies on COVID-19, and many antiviral compounds used to treat other infectious diseases have also been repurposed in clinical studies.

en: In March, the WHO initiated the "SOLIDARITY Trial" in 10 countries, enrolling thousands of people infected with COVID-19 to assess treatment effects of four existing antiviral compounds with the most promise of efficacy.
zh: 今年 3 月，WHO 在 10 个国家发起了“SOLIDARITY 试验”，招募数千名 COVID-19 感染者，以评估最有望发挥作用的四种现有抗病毒化合物的治疗效果。
pert_zh: 今年 3 月，WHO 在 10 个国家发起了“SOLIDARITY 试验”，招募数千名 COVID-19 感染者，以评估最有望发挥作用的现有抗病毒化合物的治疗效果。
bt_pert_zh: In March this year, WHO launched the SOLIDARITY trial in 10 countries, recruiting thousands of people infected with COVID-19 to evaluate the therapeutic effects of existing antiviral compounds that are most promising.

en: A dynamic, systematic review was established in April 2020 to track the progress of registered clinical trials for COVID-19 vaccine and therapeutic drug candidates.Vaccine and drug development is a multistep process, typically requiring more than five years to assure safety and efficacy of the new compound.
zh: 2020 年 4 月，一个系统化的动态审查机制建立，旨在跟踪 COVID-19 疫苗和候选治疗药物的注册临床试验进展。疫苗和药物开发需经历很多步骤，通常需要五年以上的时间才可确保新的化合物安全有效。
pert_zh: 2020 年 4 月，一个系统化的动态审查机制建立，旨在跟踪 COVID-19 疫苗和候选治疗药物的注册临床试验进展。药物开发需经历很多步骤，通常需要五年以上的时间才可确保新的化合物安全有效。
bt_pert_zh: In April 2020, a systematic dynamic review mechanism was established to track the progress of clinical trials for registration of COVID-19 vaccines and candidate therapeutic drugs. Drug development involves many steps and usually takes more than five years to ensure that new compounds are safe and effective.

en: Drug development is the process of bringing a new infectious disease vaccine or therapeutic drug to the market once a lead compound has been identified through the process of drug discovery.
zh: 药物开发是通过药物发现确定了先导化合物后，向市场推出新的传染病疫苗或治疗药物的过程。
pert_zh: 药物开发是通过药物发现确定了先导化合物后，市场推出新的传染病疫苗或治疗药物的过程。
bt_pert_zh: Drug development is the process of bringing new vaccines or therapeutics for infectious diseases to market after lead compounds have been identified through drug discovery.

en: It includes laboratory research on microorganisms and animals, filing for regulatory status, such as via the FDA, for an investigational new drug to initiate clinical trials on humans, and may include the step of obtaining regulatory approval with a new drug application to market the drug.
zh: 其中包括对微生物和动物的实验室研究以及监管备案，如通过美国食品和药物管理局，以便开展新药在人体中的临床实验，此外可能还需要申请监管批准，以便将新药推向市场。
pert_zh: 其中包括对微生物和动物的实验室研究以及监管备案，如通过美国食品和药物管理局，以便开展新药在人体中的临床实验，可能还需要申请监管批准，以便将新药推向市场。
bt_pert_zh: These include laboratory studies on microorganisms and animals as well as regulatory filings, such as with the U.S. Food and Drug Administration, to conduct clinical trials of new drugs in humans and possibly apply for regulatory approval to bring new drugs to market.

en: Development of a COVID-19 vaccine or therapeutic antiviral drug begins with matching a chemical concept to the potential prophylactic mechanism of the future vaccine or antiviral activity in vivo.
zh: 开发新 COVID-19 疫苗或治疗性抗病毒药物首先要将化学概念与未来疫苗或体内抗病毒活性的潜在预防机制相匹配。
pert_zh: 开发新 COVID-19 疫苗或治疗性抗病毒药物首先要将化学概念与疫苗或体内抗病毒活性的潜在预防机制相匹配。
bt_pert_zh: The development of new COVID-19 vaccines or therapeutic antivirals begins with matching chemical concepts with potential preventive mechanisms of vaccine or in vivo antiviral activity.

en: New chemical entities (NCEs, also known as new molecular entities or NMEs) are compounds that emerge from the process of drug discovery to specify a vaccine or antiviral candidate.
zh: 新化学实体（NCE，也称新分子实体或 NME）是在药物发现过程中生成的化合物，用于确定疫苗或抗病毒候选物。
pert_zh: 新化学实体（NCE，也称新分子实体或 NME）是在药物发现过程中生成的化合物，用于疫苗或抗病毒候选物。
bt_pert_zh: New chemical entities (NCEs, also called new molecular entities or NMEs) are chemical compounds generated during the drug discovery process for use in vaccine or antiviral candidates.

en: These have promising activity against a biological target related to COVID-19 disease.
zh: 这些化合物有望对抗与 COVID-19 相关的生物靶标。
pert_zh: 这些化合物有望与 COVID-19 相关的生物靶标。
bt_pert_zh: These compounds are promising biological targets associated with COVID-19.

en: At the beginning of vaccine or drug development, little is known about the safety, toxicity, pharmacokinetics, and metabolism of the NCE in humans.
zh: 在疫苗或药物开发初期，人们对 NCE 在人体内的安全性、毒性、药代动力学和代谢知之甚少。
pert_zh: 在疫苗或药物开发初期，人们对 NCE 的安全性、毒性、药代动力学和代谢知之甚少。
bt_pert_zh: In the early stages of vaccine or drug development, little is known about the safety, toxicity, pharmacokinetics, and metabolism of NCEs.

en: It is the function and obligation of drug development to assess all of these parameters prior to human clinical trials to prove safety and efficacy.
zh: 药物开发需承担的职责和义务是在进行人体临床实验之前，评估所有参数，以证明安全性和有效性。
pert_zh: 药物开发需承担的职责和义务是评估所有参数，以证明安全性和有效性。
bt_pert_zh: The responsibility and obligation of drug development is to evaluate all parameters to demonstrate safety and efficacy.

en: A further major objective of drug development is to recommend the dose and schedule for the first use in a human clinical trial ("first-in-human" [FIH] or First Human Dose [FHD], previously also known as "first-in-man" [FIM]).
zh: 药物开发的另一主要目标是推荐首次进行人体临床试验时的使用剂量和使用时间表（“首次人体试验”[FIH] 或人体首次应用剂量 [FHD]，之前也称“首次用于人体试验”[FIM]）。
pert_zh: 药物开发的另一主要目标是推荐首次进行人体临床试验时的使用剂量和使用时间表。
bt_pert_zh: Another major goal of drug development is to recommend a dose and schedule for use in first-in-human clinical trials.

en: In addition, drug development must establish the physicochemical properties of the NCE: its chemical makeup, stability, and solubility.
zh: 此外，药物开发过程中必须确定 NCE 的物理化学特性：化学组成、稳定性和溶解性。
pert_zh: 此外，药物开发过程中必须确定 NCE 的物理化学特性：化学组成和溶解性。
bt_pert_zh: Furthermore, the physicochemical properties of NCEs must be determined during drug development: chemical composition and solubility.

en: Manufacturers must optimize the process they use to make the chemical so they can scale up from a medicinal chemist producing milligrams, to manufacturing on the kilogram and ton scale.
zh: 制造商必须优化这些化学物质的生产过程，以便从药物化学家以毫克为单位的生产规模扩大到以千克和吨为单位的生产规模。
pert_zh: 制造商必须优化这些化学物质的生产过程，从药物化学家以毫克为单位的生产规模扩大到以千克和吨为单位的生产规模。
bt_pert_zh: Manufacturers must optimize the production process for these chemicals, scaling up from the milligram-scale production by medicinal chemists to the kilogram- and ton-scale production.

en: They further examine the product for suitability to package as capsules, tablets, aerosol, intramuscular injectable, subcutaneous injectable, or intravenous formulations.
zh: 他们还要进一步核实相应产品是否适合包装成胶囊、片剂、气雾剂、肌肉注射制剂、皮下注射制剂或静脉注射制剂。
pert_zh: 他们还要进一步核实相应产品是否适合包装成胶囊、片剂、气雾剂、肌肉注射制剂或皮下注射制剂。
bt_pert_zh: They also need to further verify whether the corresponding products are suitable for packaging into capsules, tablets, aerosols, intramuscular injections or subcutaneous injections.

en: Together, these processes are known in preclinical and clinical development as chemistry, manufacturing, and control (CMC).Many aspects of drug development focus on satisfying the regulatory requirements of drug licensing authorities.
zh: 这些过程在临床前和临床开发中统称为化学、制造和控制 (CMC)。药品开发的很多方面都集中在满足药品许可机构的监管要求上。
pert_zh: 这些过程在临床前和临床开发中统称为化学、制造和控制 (CMC)。
bt_pert_zh: These processes are collectively referred to as chemistry, manufacturing, and controls (CMC) in preclinical and clinical development.

en: These generally constitute tests designed to determine the major toxicities of a novel compound prior to first use in humans.
zh: 这些实验通常用于在首次用于人体试验前确定新化合物的毒性。
pert_zh: 这些实验通常用于确定新化合物的毒性。
bt_pert_zh: These experiments are often used to determine the toxicity of new compounds.

en: The Canadian government announced CA$275 million in funding for 96 research projects on medical countermeasures against COVID-19, including numerous vaccine candidates at Canadian universities, with plans to establish a "vaccine bank" of new vaccines for implementation if another coronavirus outbreak occurs.
zh: 加拿大政府宣布拨款 2.75 亿加元，资助 96 个针对 COVID-19 的医学对策研究项目，包括加拿大各大学的很多候选疫苗，同时计划就新疫苗建立“疫苗库”，为下一次的冠状病毒爆发做准备。
pert_zh: 加拿大政府宣布拨款 2.75 亿加元，资助 96 个针对 COVID-19 的医学对策研究项目，包括加拿大各大学的很多候选疫苗，计划就新疫苗建立“疫苗库”，为下一次的冠状病毒爆发做准备。
bt_pert_zh: The Canadian government announced a grant of 275 million Canadian dollars to fund 96 medical countermeasures research projects against COVID-19, including many vaccine candidates from Canadian universities, with plans to establish a "vaccine library" for new vaccines to prepare for the next coronavirus outbreak.

en: Clinical trial programs involve three, multiple-year stages toward product approval, and a fourth, post-approval stage for ongoing safety monitoring of the vaccine or drug therapy:
zh: 临床试验项目涉及三个多年期产品批准阶段，以及第四个批准后阶段，旨在持续监测疫苗或药物疗法的安全性：
pert_zh: 临床试验项目涉及三个多年期产品批准阶段，以及第四个批准后阶段，持续监测疫苗或药物疗法的安全性：
bt_pert_zh: Clinical trial programs involve three multi-year product approval phases, as well as a fourth post-approval phase to continually monitor the safety of the vaccine or drug therapy:

en: Phase I trials, usually in healthy volunteers, determine safety and dosing.
zh: I 期试验通常会借助健康志愿者来确定药物的安全性和剂量。
pert_zh: I 期试验通常会借助健康志愿者来确定剂量。
bt_pert_zh: Phase I trials usually use healthy volunteers to determine the dose.

en: Phase II trials are used to establish an initial reading of efficacy and further explore safety in small numbers of people having the disease targeted by the NCE.
zh: II 期试验用于确定疗效的初始读数，并进一步探索对于少数 NCE 目标人群的安全性。
pert_zh: II 期试验用于确定疗效的初始读数，并进一步探索对于 NCE 目标人群的安全性。
bt_pert_zh: Phase II trials are used to determine the initial readout of efficacy and further explore safety in the NCE target population.

en: Phase III trials are large, pivotal trials to determine safety and efficacy in sufficiently large numbers of people with the COVID-19 infection.
zh: III 期试验是大规模关键试验，用于确定对于大量 COVID-19 感染者的安全性和有效性。
pert_zh: III 期试验是用于确定对于大量 COVID-19 感染者的安全性和有效性。
bt_pert_zh: Phase III trials are used to determine safety and effectiveness in large numbers of people infected with COVID-19.

en: If safety and efficacy are adequately proved, clinical testing may stop at this step and the NCE advances to the new drug application (NDA) stage to begin marketing.
zh: 如果安全性和有效性得到了充分证明，临床试验到了这一步便可停止，相应 NCE 可进入新药申请 (NDA) 阶段，投入市场。
pert_zh: 如果安全性和有效性得到了充分证明，临床试验到了这一步便可停止，NCE 可进入新药申请 (NDA) 阶段，投入市场。
bt_pert_zh: If safety and effectiveness are fully demonstrated, clinical trials can be stopped at this stage and the NCE can enter the new drug application (NDA) stage and be put on the market.

en: Phase IV trials are post-approval trials that may be a condition attached by the FDA, also called post-market surveillance studies.
zh: IV 期试验是批准后试验，可由美国食品和药物管理局附加实施，也称上市后监测研究。
pert_zh: IV 期试验是批准后试验，可由美国食品和药物管理局实施，也称上市后监测研究。
bt_pert_zh: Phase IV trials are post-approval trials that may be conducted by the U.S. Food and Drug Administration and are also called post-marketing surveillance studies.

en: In addition to the tests required to move a novel vaccine or antiviral drug into the clinic for the first time, manufacturers must ensure that any long-term or chronic toxicities are well-defined, including effects on systems not previously monitored (fertility, reproduction, immune system, among others).
zh: 除了首次将新疫苗或抗病毒药物转入临床时所需的试验外，制造商还必须确保任何长期或慢性毒性已得到明确界定，包括对先前未监测的（生育、生殖、免疫系统等）系统的影响。
pert_zh: 除了首次将新疫苗或抗病毒药物转入临床时所需的试验外，制造商还必须确保长期或慢性毒性已得到明确界定，包括对先前未监测的（生育、生殖、免疫系统等）系统的影响。
bt_pert_zh: In addition to the trials required when a new vaccine or antiviral drug is first moved into the clinic, manufacturers must ensure that long-term or chronic toxicity is well defined, including effects on previously unmonitored systems (fertility, reproduction, immune system, etc.).

en: In the United States, this process is called a "new drug application" or NDA.
zh: 美国将该过程称为“新药申请”，简称 NDA。
pert_zh: 美国称为“新药申请”，简称 NDA。
bt_pert_zh: In the United States, it is called a “new drug application,” or NDA for short.

en: A clinical trial design in progress may be modified as an "adaptive design" if accumulating data in the trial provide early insights about positive or negative efficacy of the treatment.
zh: 如果试验中积累的数据提供了有关治疗的积极或消极效果的早期见解，则可将正在进行的临床试验设计修改为“适应性设计”。
pert_zh: 如果试验中积累的数据提供了有关治疗的积极或消极效果的早期见解，则可将正在进行的临床试验设计为“适应性设计”。
bt_pert_zh: An ongoing clinical trial can be designed as an “adaptive design” if the data accumulated in the trial provide early insights into the positive or negative effects of a treatment.
