en: Coronaviruses have been recognized as causing pathological conditions in veterinary medicine since the 1930s.
zh: 自 20 世纪 30 年代以来，冠状病毒一直被认为是引起兽医疾病的原因。
pert_zh: 自 20 世纪以来，冠状病毒一直被认为是引起兽医疾病的原因。
bt_pert_zh: Coronaviruses have been recognized as a cause of veterinary illness since the 20th century.

en: Except for avian infectious bronchitis, the major related diseases have mainly an intestinal location.
zh: 除禽传染性支气管炎外，主要相关疾病大部分发生在肠道。
pert_zh: 除禽传染性支气管炎外，主要相关疾病发生在肠道。
bt_pert_zh: With the exception of avian infectious bronchitis, the main associated diseases occur in the intestine.

en: Coronaviruses primarily infect the upper respiratory and gastrointestinal tract of mammals and birds.
zh: 冠状病毒主要感染哺乳动物和鸟类的上呼吸道和胃肠道。
pert_zh: 冠状病毒感染哺乳动物和鸟类的上呼吸道和胃肠道。
bt_pert_zh: Coronaviruses infect the upper respiratory and gastrointestinal tracts of mammals and birds.

en: They also cause a range of diseases in farm animals and domesticated pets, some of which can be serious and are a threat to the farming industry.
zh: 它们还会在农场动物和家养宠物中引发一系列疾病，其中某些疾病可能很严重并威胁到农业生产。
pert_zh: 它们还会在农场动物和家养宠物中引发一系列疾病，其中某些可能很严重并威胁到农业生产。
bt_pert_zh: They also cause a range of diseases in farm animals and domestic pets, some of which can be serious and threaten agricultural production.

en: In chickens, the infectious bronchitis virus (IBV), a coronavirus, targets not only the respiratory tract but also the urogenital tract.
zh: 在鸡中，传染性支气管炎病毒（IBV）是一种冠状病毒，不仅针对呼吸道，还针对泌尿生殖道。
pert_zh: 在鸡中，传染性支气管炎病毒（IBV）是一种冠状病毒，还针对泌尿生殖道。
bt_pert_zh: In chickens, infectious bronchitis virus (IBV) is a coronavirus that also targets the urogenital tract.

en: The virus can spread to different organs throughout the chicken.
zh: 该病毒可以扩散到鸡的各个器官。
pert_zh: 该病毒可以扩散到各个器官。
bt_pert_zh: The virus can spread to various organs.

en: Economically significant coronaviruses of farm animals include porcine coronavirus (transmissible gastroenteritis coronavirus, TGE) and bovine coronavirus, which both result in diarrhea in young animals.
zh: 可造成严重经济损失的农场动物冠状病毒包括猪冠状病毒（猪传染性胃肠炎病毒，TGE）和牛冠状病毒，这两种病毒都会导致动物幼仔腹泻。
pert_zh: 可造成严重经济损失的农场动物冠状病毒包括猪冠状病毒和牛冠状病毒，这两种病毒都会导致动物幼仔腹泻。
bt_pert_zh: Farm animal coronaviruses that can cause severe economic losses include porcine coronavirus and bovine coronavirus, both of which can cause diarrhea in young animals.

en: Feline coronavirus: two forms, feline enteric coronavirus is a pathogen of minor clinical significance, but spontaneous mutation of this virus can result in feline infectious peritonitis (FIP), a disease associated with high mortality.
zh: 猫冠状病毒：有两种形式，猫肠道冠状病毒是一种临床意义不大的病原体，但该病毒的自发突变可导致猫传染性腹膜炎 (FIP)，这是一种死亡率较高的疾病。
pert_zh: 猫冠状病毒：有两种形式，猫肠道冠状病毒是一种临床意义不大的病原体，但可导致猫传染性腹膜炎 (FIP)，这是一种死亡率较高的疾病。
bt_pert_zh: Feline coronavirus: Available in two forms, feline enteric coronavirus is a pathogen of little clinical significance but can cause feline infectious peritonitis (FIP), a disease with a high mortality rate.

en: Similarly, there are two types of coronavirus that infect ferrets: Ferret enteric coronavirus causes a gastrointestinal syndrome known as epizootic catarrhal enteritis (ECE), and a more lethal systemic version of the virus (like FIP in cats) known as ferret systemic coronavirus (FSC).
zh: 同样，感染雪貂的冠状病毒也有两种类型：雪貂肠道冠状病毒，它可引起一种胃肠道综合征，称为地区性卡他儿肠炎 (ECE)，以及一种更致命的全身性病毒（如猫中的 FIP），称为雪貂全身性冠状病毒 (FSC)。
pert_zh: 同样，感染雪貂的冠状病毒也有两种类型：雪貂肠道冠状病毒，可引起一种胃肠道综合征，称为地区性卡他儿肠炎 (ECE)，以及一种更致命的全身性病毒（如猫中的 FIP），称为雪貂全身性冠状病毒 (FSC)。
bt_pert_zh: Likewise, there are two types of coronaviruses that infect ferrets: ferret enteric coronavirus, which causes a gastrointestinal syndrome called endemic catarrhal enteritis (ECE), and a more lethal systemic virus (like FIP in cats) called ferret systemic coronavirus (FSC).

en: There are two types of canine coronavirus (CCoV), one that causes mild gastrointestinal disease and one that has been found to cause respiratory disease.
zh: 犬冠状病毒 (CCoV) 有两种类型，一种会引起轻度胃肠疾病，另一种被发现可引起呼吸系统疾病。
pert_zh: 犬冠状病毒 (CCoV) 有两种类型，一种会引起轻度胃肠疾病，被发现可引起呼吸系统疾病。
bt_pert_zh: There are two types of canine coronavirus (CCoV), one that causes mild gastrointestinal illness and one that has been found to cause respiratory disease.

en: Mouse hepatitis virus (MHV) is a coronavirus that causes an epidemic murine illness with high mortality, especially among colonies of laboratory mice.
zh: 鼠肝炎病毒 (MHV) 是一种冠状病毒，可引起高死亡率的流行性鼠类疾病，特别是在实验室小鼠群体中。
pert_zh: 鼠肝炎病毒 (MHV) 是一种冠状病毒，可引起高死亡率的流行性鼠类疾病。
bt_pert_zh: Murine hepatitis virus (MHV) is a coronavirus that causes an epidemic rodent disease with high mortality.

en: Sialodacryoadenitis virus (SDAV) is highly infectious coronavirus of laboratory rats, which can be transmitted between individuals by direct contact and indirectly by aerosol.
zh: 大鼠涎泪膜炎病毒 (SDAV) 是一种实验室大鼠的高传染性冠状病毒，可通过直接接触以及间接的气溶胶接触在个体间传播。
pert_zh: 大鼠涎泪膜炎病毒 (SDAV) 是一种实验室大鼠的高传染性冠状病毒，在个体间传播。
bt_pert_zh: Rat salivary gland inflammation virus (SDAV) is a highly contagious coronavirus of laboratory rats that is transmitted between individuals.

en: Some strains of MHV cause a progressive demyelinating encephalitis in mice which has been used as a murine model for multiple sclerosis.
zh: 一些 MHV 病毒株可在小鼠中引发进行性脱髓鞘性脑炎，已被用作多发性硬化症的小鼠模型。
pert_zh: 一些 MHV 病毒株可在小鼠中引发进行性脱髓鞘性脑炎，已被用作多发性硬化症模型。
bt_pert_zh: Some MHV strains can induce progressive demyelinating encephalitis in mice and have been used as a model of multiple sclerosis.

en: Significant research efforts have been focused on elucidating the viral pathogenesis of these animal coronaviruses, especially by virologists interested in veterinary and zoonotic diseases.
zh: 大量的研究工作集中在阐明这些动物冠状病毒的病毒发病机制，这在对兽医和人畜共患病感兴趣的病毒学家中尤为如此。
pert_zh: 大量的研究工作集中在阐明这些动物冠状病毒的病毒发病机制，这在对兽医感兴趣的病毒学家中尤为如此。
bt_pert_zh: Considerable research effort has focused on elucidating the viral pathogenesis of these animal coronaviruses, particularly among virologists with veterinary interests.

en: Porcine coronavirus (transmissible gastroenteritis coronavirus of pigs, TGEV).
zh: 猪冠状病毒（猪传染性胃肠炎冠状病毒，TGEV）。
pert_zh: 猪冠状病毒（猪传染性胃肠炎冠状病毒）。
bt_pert_zh: Porcine coronavirus (transmissible gastroenteritis coronavirus).

en: Bovine coronavirus (BCV), responsible for severe profuse enteritis in of young calves.
zh: 牛冠状病毒 (BCV)，在小牛中引发各种严重的肠炎。
pert_zh: 牛冠状病毒 (BCV)，在小牛中引发严重的肠炎。
bt_pert_zh: Bovine coronavirus (BCV), which causes severe enteritis in calves.

en: Feline coronavirus (FCoV) causes mild enteritis in cats as well as severe Feline infectious peritonitis (other variants of the same virus).
zh: 猫冠状病毒 (FCoV) 可引起猫轻度肠炎以及严重的猫传染性腹膜炎（同一病毒的其他变种）。
pert_zh: 猫冠状病毒 (FCoV) 引起猫轻度肠炎以及严重的猫传染性腹膜炎（同一病毒的其他变种）。
bt_pert_zh: Feline coronavirus (FCoV) causes mild enteritis in cats as well as severe feline infectious peritonitis (other variants of the same virus).

en: the two types of canine coronavirus (CCoV) (one causing enteritis, the other found in respiratory diseases).
zh: 两种类型的犬冠状病毒 (CCoV)（一种引起肠炎，另一种在呼吸系统疾病中发现）。
pert_zh: 两种类型的犬冠状病毒 (CCoV)（在呼吸系统疾病中发现）。
bt_pert_zh: Two types of canine coronavirus (CCoV) (found in respiratory illness).

en: Turkey coronavirus (TCV) causes enteritis in turkeys.
zh: 火鸡冠状病毒 (TCV) 引起火鸡肠炎。
pert_zh: 火鸡冠状病毒引起火鸡肠炎。
bt_pert_zh: Turkey coronavirus causes enteritis in turkeys.

en: Ferret enteric coronavirus causes epizootic catarrhal enteritis in ferrets.
zh: 雪貂肠道冠状病毒可在雪貂中引起地区性卡他儿肠炎。
pert_zh: 雪貂肠道冠状病毒在雪貂中引起地区性卡他儿肠炎。
bt_pert_zh: Ferret enteric coronavirus causes endemic catarrhal enteritis in ferrets.

en: Ferret systemic coronavirus causes FIP-like systemic syndrome in ferrets.
zh: 雪貂全身性冠状病毒可在雪貂中引起 FIP 样全身性综合征。
pert_zh: 雪貂全身性冠状病毒在雪貂中引起 FIP 样全身性综合征。
bt_pert_zh: Ferret systemic coronavirus causes a FIP-like systemic syndrome in ferrets.

en: Rabbit enteric coronavirus causes acute gastrointestinal disease and diarrhea in young European rabbits.
zh: 兔肠道冠状病毒可在欧洲幼兔中引起急性胃肠道疾病和腹泻。
pert_zh: 兔肠道冠状病毒可在欧洲幼兔中引起腹泻。
bt_pert_zh: Rabbit enteric coronavirus can cause diarrhea in young European rabbits.

en: Porcine epidemic diarrhea virus (PED or PEDV), has emerged around the world.
zh: 猪流行性腹泻病毒（PED 或 PEDV）已在世界各地出现。
pert_zh: 猪流行性腹泻病毒（PED 或 PEDV）已出现。
bt_pert_zh: Porcine epidemic diarrhea virus (PED or PEDV) has emerged.
